du zad/ 'di lta sta/ stong pa nyidi nus bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ ngo bo nyid mang pa lanaskya ba med/ 'gag pa med/ 'grib pa mad/ 'bral ba med/ kun nas/
nyon mongs ba med/ rnam par byang bamed pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhan/ gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu / tshor ba ni sgyu ma lta'u/ 'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu / 'du byed rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu / rnam
par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir go/ sgyu mnamang du zadad yul na mi gnas/ phyogs nam gnas paso/ sgyu ma mthong ba ni log par gyur pa ste/ yod pa ma yo ni zhing ngo bo nyid dang
ba/ bral ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi ra rol tu phyin pa la de ltar sod pa ni/ chos gang la'ang skye bar yang dag par rdzas su mi mthong ngo// 'gag bar yang dag pa
rjes su mi mthong ngo// gnas par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// 'grub par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// 'phel bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// kun nas nyon mongs
bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// gzugs la ka dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du
byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yang dag par rdzas su ma mthong ngo// gang la byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de yang dag par rjes su mu mthong ngo// do
ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mang ni bcos ma yin pa'i phyir mos so so tha dad pa de dag na brtags pa sa/ yang dag par rjes su ma yanepa glo bur du btags pa'i ming gis rjes su tha snyad
'dogs te/ ji lta ji ltar rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa de lta de ltar mngon par zhen to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ ming de dag
thams cad ngo bo nyid du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ mngon bar zhen par mi 'gyur ro/// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub bo mas
dba' sa mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ltar yongs su rtog ste/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sams dpa' zhes bya ba de na mang tsam mo//
'di lta ste/ byang chub ces bya ba 'di'ang ming tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas shes byab de ni ming tsam mo// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo//
'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi kha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ces bya ba de na mang tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo// 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/
'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo zhes yongs su rtog go/ shAri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na bdag bdag ces brjod kyang bdag kyang mi dmigs
gnas can dang/ srog dang/ gang zag kyang madamags te/ 'di ltar mang gis tha snyad btags par zad kyi/ ma dmigs pa stong ba nyid kyi phyi'i de dag ni rnam ba thams cad du dmigs su
modAdo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi kha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag bar rjes su mi mthong ngo// rnam par shes
ba'i bar du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// mi gang gis tha snyad 'dogs pa'i ming do'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'chen khongs
ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas ni/ mi dges pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ deb zhin gshegs pa'i shes rab ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
shes rab zil gyis gnon to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang gsamangon par zhen par 'gyur ba de'ang des yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i phyir te/ shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod pa 'i byang/
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dpe ran 'dzam bu'i gling 'di shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu lta
bu'i dge slong sha stag gis 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu rom shing gi tshal lam/ mda' rgyu'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ dril gyi zhing ltar yongs su
gang bar gyur kyang/ de dgagasher gang yin pa des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi brgya'i char ga nga nyibar mi 'gro'o//
stong gi cha dang/ 'bum gyi cha dang ! grangs dang/ chadang/ bgrang ba dang/ dpa dang/ rgyur yang mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gAri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems
dba' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro/ shA ri'i ba gzhan
yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis rol tu phyin pa la srodapa'i shes rab nyin gcig yongs su bsgoms pa gang yin pa des kyang/ nyan thos/

dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab zil gyis non to// shA ri'i bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'ding+gashAri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong sha stag gis longs su gang ba lta zhog gi/ shA ri'i bu gal
stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtan gyi khams 'di ga'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal kyi bu lta bu'i dge slong sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur kyang/ de dag gi shes rab kyis byang chub
sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi nga rol tu phyin pa la stod ba'i shes ba ni gcig bsgoms pa'i brgya'i char yang skye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do// shAri'i bu stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigagyi khams 'di shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong sha stag gis yongs su gang ba lta'ang zhog gi/ shA ri'i bu gal te shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong sha stag gis longs su gang bar gyur cing/ de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ byang
shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang dang/ ga dang/ stang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gI'i klung gi bye ma snyad dag shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu lta bu'i dge
slong sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur kyang/ de dag gi shes rab kyis byang chub gnas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'i shes rab nyin gcig bsgo nas
pa gang yin pa de'i brgya'i char ya nga nye ba'i mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan bshAri'i bus 'daskad ces gsol to/ bcom
ldan 'das nyan thos rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang/ dgrabcom pa rnams kyi shes rab gang lags pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas
rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam sa kyi shes rab gang lags pa 'di shes rab de dag thams cad ni
tha dad pa ma 'gags pa/ dben pa ma skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das tha dad pa ma lags shang/ dben la ma skyes par rang bzhin gyis stong la nitha dad du dbye ba gam khyad
par mi dmigs lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab gdugs gcig bsgoms pa gang lags pa des/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi shes rab zil gyis gnon par 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan bshA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA
mi'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ rnam
ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa// soms can thams cad kyi don byed pas/ bdag gis chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bar byas la/ sems
can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o zhes nyin gcig bsgoms pa'i shes rab gang gis don du nye bar gnas pa ltar/ nyan thego dang rang sangs rgyas thums cad kyi shes rab nye bar gnas
ba yin snyam mam/ shAri'i bus gsol pa/ btsem ldan 'das de ni ga lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ nyan gles dang rang
sangs rgyas thams cad 'di snyam du bdag cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas te/ soms can thams cad phung ngo 'i lhag ma
mod pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyangs su yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam du sems sAm yis// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dasatwen ma la gas so// bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes rab gang yin pa des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos nyin gcig bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod de/ nyanadzes rang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes ba zil gyis gnon par
gi par bya'o// ga 'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad 'di snyam du bdag cag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/ sems can rnams yongs su
sAn par khas la/ sangs rgyas kyi nang yongs su dag par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par
rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par phyes te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/
sams can dpag tu med pa grangs med pa tshad med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o snyam du sems sAm mam/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags
so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sprad de sems
can rnams yongs su smin par byas la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing longs su dag par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi
dang/ so so yang dag par ragi pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'byung
chub mngon par rdzogs bar sangs rgyus nas/ sams can dang ga tu med pa grangs med pa tshad med pa rnams longs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam du sems so// hAli'i du 'di lta ste/ khor
na srog chags kyi rigs me khyer na 'ad snyam du bdagag 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di snang ba ra rgyu zhing/ bdag gi 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling khyab bar bya'o snyam du mi sems// shA ri'i bu de
ba zhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag gas pha rol tu phyin ba drug la spyad de/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas la// sangs rgyas kyi zhang
yongs su dag par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas laM/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa ba zhidang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyus nas/ somasacan dpag tu med pa grangs med
ba tshadatshad b rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o snyam du ma sems so// kab ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar bas ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad snabs khyab
bar byed cing/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad snang bas gsal bar byed do// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po' nga pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/ sems
can rnams yongs su smin par byas la/ sangs rgyus kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/
so o yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te bla na mad pa yong gapar rdzogs nga 'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas nas/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med tshad pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang
ldan b shAri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'da' zhing/ phyir mi ldog
pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'thob pa dang/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 1 tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po soms dang po brgyad phyin chad pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa/
mad pa'i chos rnams la gnas te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis shin tu 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sa 'thob bo// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gang la gnas na/ nyan thos dang rang
sangs rgyas tham sa cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i
bu sams dang po bskyed phyin chad/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shA rol tu phyin pa drug la sbyod pa nas/ byang chub kyi sId bo la 'dug gi bar gyi byung chub sams dpa' sems
dpa' chen po ni rtag bar rgyun du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhan/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po la brten nas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ 'di lta ste/ dgu ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dwang/ yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i tshul khrimU
dang : yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang po/ tshad med pa bzhi ring gzugs med pa'i snyom bar 'jug pa bzhi dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par nga pa bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ ma 'o jigs pa bzhidang/ so so yang dag
bar rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dag pa'i chos de dag
'jig rten du byung bas/ rgyu la rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag yod ba yinaM/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing
sA la chen po lta bu dag yod pa yin/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul
dbang byed dang/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang/ tshangs ris dang/ tshangs 'khor dang/ 'od chung dang/ tshad med 'od dang 3 'od M gsal dang dge chung dang// tshod mad
dge dang/ dge rgyas dang/ 'bras bu che ba dang/ sems can 'du shes med pa dang/ gnas gtsang ma gya nom snang ba dang/ shin tu ma shong dang/ mi tshe ba dang/ mi gdung ba dang
'og min dang/ rnam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang/ ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang 3 'du shes me da 'du shes med
min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod pa yin no// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang/ dgra bcom pa rnams
dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams dang 1 byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten/
du 'byung ba yin no// shAri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan pa yongs su sbyong bar bgyid dam/ 'on te mi bgyid lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nArnam grangs kyis sbyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ shA ri'i bu byang chub
sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// shAri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni spyan pa po yin te/ ci zhig sbyin pa
po yin zhe na/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyi sbyin pa po yin no// dge ba' chos gang dag gi sbyin pa po yi na zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi
lnga dang/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcobargyad kyi bar dag gi sbyan ba po yin no// shA ra'i bus gsol la/ bcom ldan 'das kyang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyis na brtson zhes bgyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang/ 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid dang/
'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyidi dang/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
mig gi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o// de bzhin du rnab dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ 5da kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o// gzugs kyi stong
pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o// de bzhin du sgra dang/ sridang/ ro dang/ reg bya dang/ chos kyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams
kyi stong pa nyade la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ikhams dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang shu lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang//
lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid la brtsonan brtson zhes bya'o// sdug bsngal gyi stong pa nyid la brtsonan
zla brtson zhes bya'o// kun 'byung dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam gyi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o// marig pa'i stong pa nyida' brtse'atshonazhes bya'o//'du byedadang/ rtsom par
shes ba dang/ ming dang gzugs dang/ skye mched drug dang/ rogapa dang/ tshor ba dang/ srid pa dang/ len pa dang/ srid pa dang/ skye ba dang/ ma shi'i stong ba nyid la rtsod na brtson
zhes bya'o// chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid la brtsonan brtson zhes bya'o// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi stong pa nyid la brtsonanabartsonazhes bya'o/ da kaAtI bu
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la brtsonan brtson zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub semasadapalAwa5

dba'achinapodi ltar pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa stong pa nyid bdun po 'di dag gis brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/ byang chub sems dpa'ade stong pa nyid bdun po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
laspyod pa'i tshe/re zhig brtson zhe 'am mi brtson zhes mi brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gzugs skyo ba'i tshes cananam/ 'gag pa'i chos can du yang dag par rjes sumim ngo//
tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byeda rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa skye ba'i chos cananam/ 'gag pa'i chos canadu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
tshes cananam/ rnam par byung ba'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can
nam rnam par byang ba'i ris can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro// shAri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs ni tshor ba dang lhan
cig yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// de bzhin du tshor ba ni 'du shes dang/ 'dushes ni 'du byed rnams dang/ 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa
dang lhan cig yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// rnam par shes pa ni 'du byed rnams dang lhan cig yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
ngo de ci'i phyir zhe na/rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir chos gang yang chos gang dang lhan cig yang dag par 'du ba med pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyi zhen/ shA ri'i bu 'dilta gzugs kyi stong
pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i stongapa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shAri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs su yod pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de tshor bar byed pa ma yin/ 'dushes

kyistong pa nyid gang yin pa de kun tu shes par byed pa ma yin/ 'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de mngon par 'du byed pa ma yin/ rnam par shes ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa darnam par shes par
byedapa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhon/ shAri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhanam yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhanam yin la/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma
yin te/ gablugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba'ang gzhan ma yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes kyang gzhan ma yin la//
stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed rnams kyang gzhan ma yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin la// stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin te/ rnam par

shis pa nyid stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shAri'i bu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mi skyo mi 'gag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med/
rnam par byang ba med la/ 'grib pa med cing 'phel ba med pa ste/ de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ daltar byung ba'ang ma yin pa'i phyir ro// 'di 'dra ba gang yin pa de la
chas/ni gzugs med do// tshor ba med de// 'du shes med do// 'du byed rnams med do// rnam par shes pa med do// sa'i khams med do// chu'i khams med do// ma'i
khams med do// rlung gi khams med do// nam mkha'i khams med do// rnam par she sa pa'i khams med do// mig gis ma red med de/ dgazugs kyis mched
med do// rnaba'i skye mched med do// sgra'i skye mched me dado// sna'i skye mched med do// dri'i skye mchedamed do// lce'i skye mched med do// ro'i skye mched mod do// lus kyi skye mched med do//
ngag bya'i skye mched med do// yid kyi skye mched med do// chos kyi skye mched med do// migag khams med do// gzugs kyi khams med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// na
ba'i khams med do// sgra'i khams med do// rnaba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// sna'i khams med do// dri'i khams med de/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ lce'i
khams med de// ro'i khams med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// lus kyi khams med do// reg bya'i khams med de/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med//
kyi khams med do// chos kyi khams medado// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// ma rig pa med do// ma rig pa 'gag pa med de// 'du byed re/ 'du byed 'gag pa med do//
rnam par shes pa med do// rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med do// ming dang gzugs med do// ming dang gzugs 'gag ba med do// skye mched drug medad// skye mched
drug 'gag pa med do// reg pa medad// reg pa 'gag pa medado// tshor ba med do// tshor ba 'gag pa med do// sred pa medade// sred pa 'gag pa med do// len pa med do// len
ba 'gag pa med do// sred pa med// srid pa 'gag pa med do// skye ba medad// skye ba 'gag pa medado// rgyashi med do// rga shi 'gag pa med do// sdug bsngal med do// kun 'byung
medado// 'gog pa mdad// lam mad do// thob pa med do// mngon par rtog pa med do// rgyun du zhugs pa mdado// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba med do//
lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do// phyir mi 'ong ba me dado// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do// dgra bcom pa nyid med de// rang sangs rgyas medaro// rang byang chub modad// de la sadA
rgyus med do// byang chub med do/// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa bam po gsum pa/// shAri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems

Da dpa'achenapo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la de ltar spyod pa ni brtsonapa zhes bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa de gzugs la brtson zhes bya ba 'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su
0 thimathong ngo// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa 'bartson zhes bya ba 'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// mig la brtson zhes ba
ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// rnab dang/ snadang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid la brtson zhes bya ba 'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes sum mthong ngo//
gzugs la brtson zhes bya ba 'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mimathong ngo// sgradang/ dri dang/ rodang/ reg byadang/ tshes rnams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar
yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// mig gi khams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am/ mipartson zhese bya bar yang dag pa rjes su mimathong ngo// gzugs kyi khams dang/ mig gi rnam par shis pa'i
khams dang/ yid kyi khams kyi bar dang/ chos kyi khams dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// dran pa
nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtsonazhes byang lam: mibartson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba dang/ dbang
po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam rnams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// bden pa bzhi la brtson zhes bya ba 'am/
mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong// de bzhinagashegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ mngonapar

shes pa lnga dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcobargyad la brtson zhes bya ba'am/ mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dgapar rjes su mi mthong ngo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam pa
thams cad kyi mchogadang ldan pa'i bar la brtson zhes bya ba bam/ mibartson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// shA ri'i bu rnam grangs de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bogs
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar brtson pa ni brtson zhes bya bar rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bugazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po shes rab kyis rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa ni stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid dusbyor bar mi byed/ mi sbyor bar yang mi byede/ stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang yang m yin no// mtshan ma med pa dang/ mtshanam med par sbyor bar mi/
byed mi sbyor bar yang mi byed/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor dong yang ma yin no// smon pa med pa dang/ smon pa med par sbyor bar mi byed/ mi sbyor bar yang mi byed de/ smon pa/
med pa'i rnal 'byor dang yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar stong pa nyidani rnal 'byor yang ma yin/ rnal 'byor ma yin pa'ang ma yin zhing/ de bzhin dumtshan ma med pa dang//
smon pa med pa'ang rnal 'byor yang ma yin/ rnal 'byor ma yin ba'ang ma yin pa'i phyir te/ shA ri'i bu de ltar brtsen pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
nyed la 'jug ste/ de ltar 'jug pa nigazugs la sbyor bar mi byed/ misbyor bar yang mi byed do// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams da rnam par shes
pa la sbyor bar ma byed/ mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do// gzugs dang sngon gyi mthar bar mi byed do/ 'di ltar sngon gyi mtha'anyidakyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// gzugs dang

phyi ma'i mthar sbyor bar mi byed de/ 'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha'anyid kyang yang dag par dz+dzes su mi mthong ngo// gzugs dang da ltar byang bar sbyor bar mi byed de/ 'di ltar ltar byang ba nyid kyang yang
dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dang sngon gyi mthar sbyor bar mi byedade/ 'di ltar sngon gyi mtha' da

[]kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// rnam par shes pa dang phyi ma'i mthar sbyor bar mi byed do/ 'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha'anyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mimathong ngo// rnam bar shes pa dang da ltar
byu nga bar sbyor bar mi byed de/ 'di ltar da ltar byang ba nyid kyang gang dag b.rarjes sumamagrongo shA ri'i bu gzhanayang byang chub sems dpa' sems

dba' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa ni/ dus gsum mnyis pa nyid kyi phyir sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar sbyor bar mi byed do// phyi ma'i mtha' dang sngon gyimathar sbyor bar mi byed do/
daltar byung ba dang sngon gyi mtha' 'am/ ma'i mthar sbyor b.rami byed do// sngon gyi mtha' 'am/ phyi ma'i mthar dang/ da ltar byung bar sbyor bar mkhyad do// shAri'i bu de ltar brtson
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtsonab zhes bya'o// shAri'i bu gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di ltar brtson par byed de/ ji ltar brtson par byedan/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid dang 'das par sbyor bar ma byed// 'das ba nyid kyang yang dag par
rjes mi mthongon/ rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das ba dang sbyor bar ji ltar 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma 'ongs pa'i sbyor bar mkhyidad/ ma 'ongs pa nyid kyang yang dag
bar rjes su mi mthongan/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenab nyidam 'ongs ba dang sbyor ba jiltar 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang da ltar byung bar sbyor bar mi byed de/ doltar byung ba nyid
kyang yang dag par rjes su mi ma khron/ ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da ltar byang ba dang sbyor bar lta ga la 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni )
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o// shA ri bu gzhan yod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gzugs
dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/ gzugs nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su me mthong ngo// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang
rnam par shes pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mamathong ngo// de bzhin du mig dang rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/ mig nyid kyang yang dag par rjes sumi mthong ngo// rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid dang/ rnam pa thams cad mi na
ba nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/ yid nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// gzugs dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor b.ram byed de/ gzugs nyidakya nga yang dag par rje
su mi mthong ngo// de bzhin du sgra dang/ dridang/ ro dang/ reg byadang/ tshes rnams dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/ chos nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mo
mthong ngo// shAri'i bu deltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpasems dpa' chen pon/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nga rtson ba zhes bya'o/

bugazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chenapo shes rab kyis rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid du sbyor bar mi byed da/ sbyin

ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjesasum mthong ngo// de bzhinadu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor b.ram byedade/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
dranapa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed de/ dran pa nyibor gzhag pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// de bzhin du yang dag par
srong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags ba'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs ba bzhi dang/ so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang/ sangs

rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byedade/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nyid kyang yang dag par rjesasu mi mthong ngo// shA ri'i bu
de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes ba'o// shAri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa'

chenapo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ sangs rgyas dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mkhyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang sangs rgyas su sbyor bar mi byed de//

sangs rgyas nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// byang nub dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor bar mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang byang chub tu sbyor bar mi byed de/
byang nub nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin/ rnam pa thoms cad makhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas yin/
byang chub nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyang byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro// shAri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni btson pa zhes bya'o/ shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang de sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa ni/ gzugs 'byung ngo zhes bya b.rami sbyor re// gzugs 'jigago zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du/
byada rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa 'jig go zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro// gzugs mi rtag
cos bya ba ma sbyor// tshorab dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa rtagaces bya bar mi sbyor ro// rnam par shes ba mi rtog ces bya bar mi sbyor ro//
gzugasabade zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar me sbyor ro// dbazhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya b.ramigyur ro//
rnam par shes pa sdugabasngal zhes bya bar mi spro'o// gzugs bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro// gzugs bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams
dang rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa bdag mod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro// gzugs zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// gzugs ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor re//
tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// gzugs stong zhes bya ba 'am/ mi stong
mi/ zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am// mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba/
'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro// tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa mtshanam yod ces bya ba bam/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyoraro//
gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am/ smon pa med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro// tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa snonapa yod ces bya ba 'amo/ smon
pa med ces bya bar mi sbyongaro// gzugs sku zhes bya ba 'am/ 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa skye
zhes bya ba 'am/ 'gog ces bya bar mi sbyoraro// gzugs 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// gzugs ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// gzugs da ltar byung ba zhes bya ba'i sbyor
ro/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa 'dus pa zhes ba bar mi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// rnam par so
pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// gzugs snying bo can zhes bya ba 'am/ nyam chung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/
rnam par shes pa snying bo can zhes bya ba 'am/ nyam chung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// gzugs yod ces bya ba bam/ medado zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// de bzhin du tshong ba dag
'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba 'am/ medad zhes bya bar masbyor ro// gang de ltar spyod pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ces bya bar khas
mi lan/ mi spyod ces bya bar khas mi len/ spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar khas mi len/ spyod pa'ang ma yin mi skyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bgabs mi len te/ shAri'i
bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha ro'otu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba'i ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin padang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'id du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
la mi spyod do// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i ched dushes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
par bya ba'i ched dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ched dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ched dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ched dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma

'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// nang stong panyid kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyidadang/ chen po stong pa nyid dang/ don dam ba stong pa nyid ngang/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang/ mtha' las 'das pa
stong pa nyid dung/ thogam dang tha ma med ba stong pa nyid dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad stong pa/

nyid dang/ skye ba med pa stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang/ ngobo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi
sbyodado// de bzhin nyidadang/ sakyi dbyings dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i ched dushes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
chen po las rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ches gang la'ang tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir to/ shA ri'i bu de ltar skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
za ka/ chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson ba zhes bya'o// de lha'i mig gi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// lha'i rnab dang/ pha'o/
gyi sems shes pa dang/ sngon gyiganas rjesasu dranab dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes/
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' lta ci smos te/ rnam pa thams cad du'ang mngon
par shes pa thams cad lta ga la yod/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi b.rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa na brtson pa zhes bya'o/
li'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sridabani/ 'disnyam du bdag gis lha'i migagis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams/
gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes par bya'o// lha'i rnabs de dug gasgra thos par bya'o// de dag gi sems rnams kyang shes par bya'o/
dadag gi sngon gyigs rnams kyang rjes su dran par byas la/ rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'osnyam du mi sems so// de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/
byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lhanub dang/ nub byang dang/ 'og dang/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyedadagan 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi
bzhi ba bo dang skye ba lha'i mig gis shes par bya'o// lha'i rnabs de dag gi sgra thes bar bya'o// dedag gi sems rnamasakyang shes pa bya'o// de dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnams kyang rjesasu
dran par byas la ) rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du ma sems so// Ari'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenango shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod bani
brtson pa zhes bya'o// sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dgakyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das par byed de/ shAri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa la ni bdud sdig can gyis kyang glags mirAdade// 'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa gang ji snyed pa dedag thacad kyang rab tu bsal bar 'gyur ro// shar phyogs kyi 'jig
nagyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag dang/ lhodang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/
lhonub dang/ nub byang dang/ 'og dang/ stong gi phyogs kyi phyogs re'i 'jig rtenagyikhamasagang+gA'i klungagi bye ma snyedadagan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa'isadA
rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar lhung du 'ong ngo zhesasrung pa mdzadad// rgyal
chenabazhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang/ sum cu rtsagasum pa dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams

dang : 'og min gyibar gyi lha gang dag la bod pa de dag kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/ la la zhig bar chad byed du 'ong ngo zhes srung bar byed do// de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba
ts+tshA gang ci yodapa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo desems can thams cad la byams
pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu de ltar dnga'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o//
shAri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni gzungs kyi sgo dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dag kyang tshogs chung dus mngon du
'gyur ro// skye ba'i gnas thams cad du'ang de bzhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur zhing/ blan med pa yang
bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
dba'asems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa nibartsonapa zhes bya'o/ shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa ni 'disnyam du gung chos rnams dang 'du ba 'am/ 'bral ba 'am/ phradapa 'am/ mi phrad par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yod dam snyam du masems
so deci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar desachos gang 'dub 'am/ 'bral ba 'am/ phrad pa 'am/ mi phrad par gyur ba de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te//
ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtsonapa zhes bya'o// shAri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa la sbyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du bdag gas myur du chos kyi dbyings mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par 'gyur ram/ mngon par rdzogs
par rtogs par mi 'gyur snyam du mi samasaso// de ci'i phyir zhen/ chos kyidabyings kyis chos kyi dbyaris mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub/
sems dang sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la de ltar spyod pa nibartsen pa zhes bya'o/// shAri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'/
zla/ sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'khaspyod pa ni chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang yang dag pa ra rjes su mi mthong de// ches kyi dbyings dang ches tha dad du mi
byed do// de yang 'di snyam dus kyi dbyings bde de ltar khong du chud par 'gyur ram/ khong du chud par mi 'gyur snyam du mi sems te/ 'di ltar chos gang gis chos gang khong du chud bar
'gyur ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyiri ro// 'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor/ mi stong zhes bya bar yang mi sbyor te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sem
dpa' sems dpa' chenapo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni brtson pa zhes bya'o// shA ra'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gzugs dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs su mi sbyor ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam
par shes pa dang stong pa nyid dum sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rnam par shes par mi sbyor ro/ shAri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
za tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ mig gi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang mig gi khams sum sbyor/ gzugs kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugasakyi
khams su mi sbyor/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor/ de bzhin du rnaba'i khams dang/ sgra'i
khams dang/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ sna'i khams dang/ dri'i khams dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ lce'i khams dang/ ro'i khams dang/
lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ lus kyi khams/ reg bya'i khams dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ yid kyi khams dang stong ba nyid dum sbyor/ stong ba nyid dang
yid kyi khams sum sbyor/ chos kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong ba nyid dang chos kyi khams sum sbyor/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong
pa nyid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shAri'i bu 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnal
'byor dam pa yin pa'i phyir ro// shA'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa ni nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sarami ltung la// sangs rgyas
zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed cing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// shAri ba rnal 'byor du bya ba gang dag ci'angarung ste// de dag gi nang na shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dini mchog ces bya'o// thu bo zhes bya'o/
phul zhes bya'o// rab ces bya'o// rab mchog ces bya'o// ltag named pa zhes bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni stong pa nyidadang/ mtshanam med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor te/ bla na med pa 'i rnal 'byor yin pa'i phyir ro// shAri'i bu de ltar brtson nga 'i byang chub
sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po ni lung bstan pa 'am/ lung bstan pa dang nye bar gyu par gzung bar bya'o// shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems
canadapag tumedagrangs med tshadamed pa rnams kyi don kyang byed la/ de 'di snyam du bdag la nisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lung ston pa mdzad do// bdag ni lung bstan pa la nye bar
gyur to// bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o// bdag gis sems can rnams yongs su sminapar bya'o// bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
[d. ]mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings la mtshan mar 'dzin cing/
sakyi dbyings ma gtogs par gangashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'am/ gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par bya ba 'am/ gang bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos gzhan gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pham
rol tu phyin pa laskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo de la sems can gyi 'du shes mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems canagatan skye ba/
med cing 'gag pa med// chos rnams kyi chos nyid skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro// gang la skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed
par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ shAri'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa yin/ sems canastong pa nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can dmigs su med pa dang/ sems can dben pa dang/ sems can rang bzhin
shug/ med pa dang/ sems can ngo bo nyid med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ stong nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa yin no// shAri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
rnal 'byor yin te/ des de las gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor gang yin pa rnams zil gyis mnan nas gnas so// shA ri'i bu rnal 'byol 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
zhwa dba'achen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par sgrub bo// mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po
dang ! sangs rgyas kyi chos mdzes pa bco brgyad mngon bar sgrub bo// shA ri'i bu rnal 'byor 'di la gnas ba'i byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po ni ser sna'i semasami spyod
do 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems dang/ gnod sems kyi soms dang/ le lo'i sems dang/ rnam bar ba leng ba'i soms dang/ 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi sems mi skyod do//
de skad ces bka' la pa dang bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du skye bar 'gyur ba lags/
de skad ces gsol pa dang ! bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shAra'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa 'am/dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag nas shi 'phos te
'dir skyes pa'am/ mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par rig par bya'o// ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag nas
gi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la myur bar rnal 'byor snyoms par 'jug ste/ tsha'adi brjes nas kyang ches
zab mo 'di mngonadu 'gyur zhing/ phyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug go/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang ga dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dag
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dang de dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ga mnyes par byed par
ka/ yang 'gyur ro// shA'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen kho gang dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag nas shi 'phos te 'dis byas pa de ni/ skye ba gcig
gis thogs pa te/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug nyams pa med pas na/ gzungs kyi sgo dang ting 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad de la 'dus shing nyams pa med pa yin no// Ara'i bu de la khyad
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo gang ma rnams kyi nang nas A 'phos te/ mi nyid dang skal ba mnyam par skyas ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi'i
mi ldog pa ma gtogs par/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'adebang po rnams rtul ba yin te/ shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la'ang myur du snyoms par
mi 'jug cing// de la gzus kyi sgo dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang mngon dum 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu khyod 'di skad dubyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de 'dinas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur ba lags shes lor ba na/ shAri'i bu byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'irnal 'byor 'dis gnas pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ ganganasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i
wa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ blan mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams drang 'bral
bar mi 'gyur zhing/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mnyes par byed par yang 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems duba' chen po thabs la mi mkhas ba
gang la la dag bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug cing ba rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod kyang/ de dag bsam gtan thob pas lha tshorang po'an du skyes nas/ gal te
mi'i nang du skye ba thob pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed na'ang de dag dbang po rnams rtul zhing ma rno ba dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug cing/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang/ de dag thabs la mi mkha sa pas bsam
gtan rnams spangs nas de dag kyang 'dod pa'i khams su skya pa'ang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rnams rtul ba yin teno
ba ma yin no// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad mad pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
@#/ par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang bo dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub
kyi yan lag dang/ lam rnams la'ang snyoms par 'jug kyang snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing thabs la mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ tshad madra ba dung/
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang ma skyo ste/ gang na sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de drung der skya zhing de dag she
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang ma bral bas/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la khrun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba
dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshang med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bskyed
nas/de dag thabs la mkhas pas bsam gtan dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad las log ste/ 'dod pa'i khams rnams su skye zhing/ rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu
rnams su 'am/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su 'am/ khyim bdag gi ragis shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye ba dag kyang yod do/ yang srid pa 'dod
pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir skyelo/ shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi la'ang snyoms par
'jug/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug la/ de dag thabs la mkhas pas bsam gtan dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms
pa 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skya sto/ de dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang/ 'thab bral drang/ dga' ldan dang/
'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye zhing 3 de dag tu gnas nas sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi
zhi yang yongs su dag par byed ci ngo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed ba dag kyang yod do// shA ri'ibu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po shes rab
kyi pha u0f7cla tu phyin pa la sodacing/ thabs la mkhas pas bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang snyoms
par 'jug cing/ de dog 'di nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skya sto/ de dag der tshangs pa'i tshangs pa chen por gyur nas/ dadag tshangs pa'i gnas de dag tu gnas
te/ sangs rgyas kyi 'de gung dgan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams / bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[= ]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba'i don du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dag
kyang yod do// shAri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyo ba gcig gis thogs pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag thabs la mkhas pas/ bsam
kha tan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhidang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la'ang snyoms par 'jug/ dranapa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ yang dag par song ba dang/ rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang ba dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam rnams kyang sgom/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smonapa
mdo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug la/ de dag de rnams kyi dbang gis kyang ma skyo zhing/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams mnyes par byedal
sta deratshangs bar spyod pa spyad nas mang dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skya ste/ de dag der tsho'i yul ji srid par gnas nas/ dbang bo ma nyams la dran pa
dang shes bzhin dang ldan par/ lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag dums yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas 'dir skye ba bstan nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu
blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu ba dag kyang yod do// shAri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon pa shes ba drug
thob pa de dag 'dod pa'i khams su'ang mi skye/ gzugs kyi khams dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams su'ang mi skya bar/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsti stang du khyed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhinganas sangs kyi zhingedu 'gro ba dag kyang yod do// shA/
ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pomangon par shes pa drug thob pa de dag mngon par shes par drug po de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag/
na sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rangasangs rgyas kyi theg ba su'ang ma grol pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dag kyang yod
do shA ri'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon bshes ba drug thob pa de dag mngon par shes pajug po de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dgan/
#// @#// sems can rnams kyi tsho'i tshod dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu 'gro ba dag kyang yod do// gse'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
za dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gangan sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang/ chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa'i 'jig rten
gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing/ de dag rer song nas kyang sams can la rnams la sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog/ chos kyi sgra sgrog/ dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog cing/
dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dag kyang yod de/ sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang/ chos kyi sgra dang/ dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems rab tu dang bar gyur nas/
de dag shi 'phos te/ gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag tu skya'o// shA ra'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa'achen po sems dang po bskyed phyin
chad bsam gtan bzhi dang/ chid med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob par gyur cing/ dran pa nye bar gzhug pa dang/ mang dag par sbyong ba dang/ rdzu
! 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ 'phags pa'i lam sgom la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/
so so yang dag par rig ba bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa dgu 'dod pa'i khams su'ang mi skye/ gzugs kyi khams su'ang mi skye/ gzugs med pa'i khams
su'ang mi skyal/ de dag tu sems can rnams kyi don byed pa drag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems dang bo bskyod panyid kyis byang
chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par byed pa dag kyang yodado// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po
bskyod pa nyid kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyi
don byas nas/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyis su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang/ de dag gi dam pa'i chos
bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par gnas par byed pa dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dang lasams dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyod pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi

su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dag kyang yod
do shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa bsam gtan bzhi thob ba/ tshad med pa bzhi thob pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms bar
'jug pa bzhi thob pa dag/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam pa du mar rnam par rtse zhing 'dilta ste/ de dag bsam
gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug

bar 'jug go/ de las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/

ci'ang med pa'i skya mchod la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas 'du shes med 'du shes
mdamin skye mched la snyoms par 'jug ke/ de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa dag bsam gtan dang/ chad med pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa de
dag la thed rgyal du snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ yang dag par song ba dang/
