'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/ lan cig/
ka phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyi mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub thob par mi byed par/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol/
tu phyin pa la spyod nying thabs la mkhas pas/ sems can gyi sams kyi rgyun du zhugs pa rnams lam la zhugs par byas te/ rnam par sbyangs nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob
par byed/ lanacig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub thob par byed pa dag kyang yod de/ shA ri'i bu kwan
thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par byed pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' semasadapa'achen po' bzod pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis gnas pa do dag ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa'achen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing/ dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu de dag ni bskal ba bzang bo'i
! byang chub sems dba' sams dpa' chen po yin par rig par bya'o/ shari'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bsam gtan bzhi thob cing/ sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag thob pa de dag ni bden pa bzhi khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir spyod kyang de dag bden pa bzhi rtogs par mi byed pa dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu de dag ni skya/
ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin par rig par bya'o// shAri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pa rol tu phyin/
pa drug la sdod cing/ 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste/ de dag tu'ang sams can rnams byang chub la yang dag par 'dzad snying/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong
sudag par byed pa dag kyang yod do// shAri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa tshad mad/ grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo grwa
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing/ sams can rnams kyi
ched du rtag tu brtson pa dag lan 'ga' yang don mad pa dang ldan pa'atshig mi smra zhing/ don med pa dang ldan pa'i lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las mi byed pa dag kyang yod do// kA li'i bu
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sprod dang/ sems can rnams kyi ched du rtag tu brtson pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro
ug/ zhing sems can rnams kyi ngan song gsum gyi lam gcod par byed pa dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu/
phyin pa drug la gnas shing/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas/ sams can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sgrub cing/ 'di ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la ni
zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom ) me tog dang/ mo tog 'phrang dang/ sngos dang/ byug pa dang/ bdug spos dang/ mal stan dang/ rgyab rten dang/ gos dang/
rgyun dang/ 'tsho ba dang/ khyim dang/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ gsar dang/ dngul dang/ byu ru dang/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba de dag
nye bar sgrub byed pa dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing/ tshul khrims kyi pa rol tu phyin
pa lhur byas nas/ sems can rnams kyi lus dang/ ga dang/ yid sdom pa la 'god par byed pa dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dbu' chen po/
gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas/ sems can rnams khro ba med pa dang/ gnod sems med pa la 'god par byed pa/
rag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pa rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar byas nas/
sems can rnams dge ba'i chos la mngon par brtson pa la 'god par byed pa dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pa rol tu phyin pa drug
la gnas shing 3 bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas ) sams can rnams zhi gnas rtse gcig tu bya ba dang/ 'dod pa la dpen pa la 'god par byed pa dag kyang bod
do nA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa'achin pa gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs
pa' sku 'dra ba de 'dra ba nyid kyi lus mngon bar la nas/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems
can rnams la ngan 'gro thams cad las yang drag par 'da' ba'i phyir/ chos ston par byed pa dag kyang yod do// 'di'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin
pa drug la gnas shing/ sangs rgyas kyi sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba nyid kyi lus mngon par sprul nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad dag tu song zhing sams/
can rnams la chos ston pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dbachos kyang nyanam
dang ! byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag mthong bar byed cing/ de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongasasu
bzung nas/ de bas kyang rgya che ba dang khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang bo yongs su sgrub cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems da ba'
chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag sgrub par byed pa dag kyang yod do// de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ byang shar dang shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub
byang dang/ 'og dang/ steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs rwarer yang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung gi byes snyad dag tu songazhing/ sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang/ de 'dzin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang/ chos nyan pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang/ sangs rgyas
kyizhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag mthong bar byed cing/ de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung nas/ de bas kyang rgya che ba dang khyad par du 'phags
pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing phung po yongs su sgrub cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skya pa gcig gis thogs pa sha stag sgrub par byed pa dag
kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sames dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod rung/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par byas te/
dbang po gsal zhing yongs su dag pa rnams dang ldan par gyur nas/ de dag lus yongs su dag pa de dag gis skye bo mang po 'ga' zhing dang ba spyad par byed de/ de dag skya bo/
mang po'i yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar gyur nas/ sems can de dag kyang sems rab tu dang bar gyur pa de nyid kyi dag ba'i rtsa bas theg pa gsum po dag gis rim gyis yongs sumya
ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dag kyang yod de/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ lus yongs su dag
pa la bslab par bya'o// ngag yongs su dag pa dang/ yid yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po pha rol tu phyin pa
drug la spyod cing/ dbang po gsal ba dag thob par gyur nas/ de dag dbang po gsal ba de dag gis bdag la bstod par mi byed cing/ gzhan la smod par mi byed pa dag kyang yod
do[Ôºö]Ari'i bu byang chub sams dpa' sems dba' chen po soms dang po bskyed phyin chad/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la gnas nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa theb kyi bar du nam yang dbul por mi 'gyur zhing/ na song ngana'agro log por ma ltarwa ba dag kyang yod do// shAri'i bu byang chub sems
dpa'asams dpa'achan po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob kyi bar du nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ma gtong ba dag kyang yod do// shA'i bu byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas sems
tsan rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la 'god cing/ sbyin pa dang snyan par smra bas sams can rnams sdud pa dag kyang yodado// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid du ma yongs su bzung nas/ 'khor lo sgyur
ba'i rgyal srid brgya stong du ma byed du 'jug cing/ de las gnas nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma mnyes par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
0 la lo byad thams cad dang/ mchod pa thams cad kyis bsti stang du byed/ blomar red/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed pa dag kyang yod do// rAhAli'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
sams dpa'achen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas nas sams can log par lta ba'i mun pa can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis snang bar byed cing bdag nyid kyang
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs kyi bar du/ rnam yang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snang ba de dang mi 'bral bar byed pa dag kyang
yod do// shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'byung ba yin no// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las rnams kyi go mi dbye'o/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa bam po bzhi pa/// de skad ces bka' su:la po dang/ bcom ldan 'das la tsho
dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achan po'alus kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang/ ga gi las kha na
ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang/ yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA/
ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe 'di snyam du 'di ni lus yin te/ des lus kyi las rtsom pa byed/
'di ni ngag yin te/ des ngag gi las rtsom par byed/ 'di ni yid yin te/ des yid kyi las rtsom pa byed do snyam du sems na/ shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'
soms dang 'a chen po'i lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las rtso ma pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sum sa dpa' chen po shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ lus mi dmigs/ ngag mi dmigs yid mi dmigs so// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa la/ gal te lus dmigs pa dang/ ngag dmigs pa dang/ yid damigs pa yod par 'gyuran/ da de'i tshe lus dang/ ngagadang/ yid des ser sna'i sems
bskyod paro'agyur zhing/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems dang/ gnod sems kyi sems dang [7 ]le lo'i sa mas dang/ rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems dang/ 'chal
pa'i shes rab kyi sems kyang bskyed par 'gyur nga zhigan/ shA ri'i bu de ltar ni rig par sa bya ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dung 'a sems dang ba chen ngo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi gnas ngan lan bskyod pa de ni gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dang sems dpa' rgan po/
gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni lus kyi gnas ngan len sbyong pa dang/ ngag gi gnas phan len sbyong ba dang/ yid kyi gnas ngan len spong bar byed pa'i phyir te/ shA ri'i
bu de ni byang chub sems dang 'a re ni sa dpa' chen po'i lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol ra/ rtsom
ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong bar bgyid pa lagasu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
bu shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar lus mi dmigs pa dang/ ngag mi dmigs pa dang/ yid mi dmigs pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub
sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong bar byed pa yin no// shA ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dang la se mas dang 'a chen po/
@#// sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs nas gnas te/ nyan thos kyi sems sam rang sangs rgyas kyi soms mi
spyod par/ de rtag par sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sams nye bar 'jog par byed// de lta bu ni byang chub sum sa dang 'a soms dang 'a chen po'i lus dang/ ngeg dang/
yid kyi gnas ngan len songs su dag pa yin no zhes nga smra'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen dor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa// byang chub kyi lam yongs
su sbyong ba na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bus gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po rnams kyi byang chub kyi lam gang
lags/ bcomaldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ri'i bu byung chub kyi lam gang la spyod na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lus mi dmigs/ ga mi
dmigs/ yid mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs 3 bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ bsam ga tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs// nyan thos kyi theg pa mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
theg pa mi dmigs/ byung chub sems dpa'i theg du mi dmigs/ mang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi dmigs pashing/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad dmigs su
med pa 'di'i/ nA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub kyi lam yin te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po lam 'di nas
'gro zhing/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni sus kyang thul bar mi nus so// kashA ri'i bus gsol ra/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
bo ji ltar spyod pa dag sus kyang mi thulaM ba lagis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dung ba sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug
la spyod pa// gzugs la rmem sams su ma byed pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang/ sa'i
khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams dang/ nam mkha'i khams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom/
sems su mi phyed pa dang/ mig rang/ gzugs la rlom sems su mi phyedu ba dang/ rna ba dang/ sgra dang/ sna dang/ dri dang/ lce dang/ ro dang/
lug dang/ reg bya dang/ yid dang// chos la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang/ mig gi khams dang/ gzugs kyi khams dang/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom
sems su mi byed pa dang/ de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang/ sgra'i khams dang/ rna ba'i rnam pa shes pa'i khams dang/ sna'i khams dang/ dri'i khams dang/ sna'i rnam par
shes pa'i khams dang/ lce'i khams dang/ ro'i khams dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ lus kyi khams dang/ reg bya'i khams dang/ lus kyi rnam par
gshes ba'i khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang/ yid kyi khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang/ chos kyi khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang/ yid kyi rnam ra ra shes pa'i
khams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang ) byang chub
kyi yan lag dang/ lam rnams la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson )
'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang/ de bzhinagashegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang/ mi 'jigs/
pa bzhi dang/ so so yang ngag nga' rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyang la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rlom
semag su ma byed pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang/ rang byang chub
la rlom sems su mi byad pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' la rlom sems su mi byed pa dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chung la rlom sems mi byed pa ste/ shAred/
bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel ba ni sus kyang mi thul ba yin no// 'ashA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa'i
po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed cing/ ye shes de dang ldan pas ngan song rnams kyi sgo thams cad
gcod pa dang/ dbul zhing rgud pa'i mir mi 'gyur ba dang lus ngag gis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par
mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa thums cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po ya shes de dang ldan pa ni// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang mthong ngo// chos kyang zhan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang mthong ngo/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
bkod pa rnam par dag pa'ang mthong ngo// de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang dang/
'og dang/ steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgrubcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang mthong ngo// chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mang mthong ngo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam
bar dag ba'ang mthong ngo// ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams nis ngas rgyas kyi 'du shes mi spyod do// byang chub sems dpa'i 'du/
shes mi skyod do// nyan thos kyi 'du shes dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'dupates dang/ bdag gi 'du shes dang/ gzhan gyi 'du shes dang [‚Äù ]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
'du shes ma skyid do// ashes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ de bzhin du tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson
'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod da/ pha rol tu phyin pa dag kyang mi dmigs so// ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang sgom la/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang mi dmigs so// yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang bo dang/
stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam yang sgom la// yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ [‚Äù ]stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan
lag dang/ lam yang mi dmigs so// stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
rnams kyang mi dmigs so// shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/ 'a chen po'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin te/ ye shes de dang ldan
pa'i byang chub nyams dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par rjes
su mi mthong ngo// shAri'i bu byang chub srems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mig lnga thob pa dang/ yongs su sbyong ba dag kyang
yod de// lngagang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sha'i mig dang/ lha'i mig dang/ 'ashes rab kyi mig dang chos kyi mig dang 3 sangs rgyas kyi mig go
shA ri'i bus gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sums dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su ngag pa gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nA
mi'i bu byang chub sems dang 'a sa mas dang/ 'a chen po 'tho'i mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do// byang chub sems dang 'a nyams dang 'a chen po 'ga'i mig gis dpag 3
tshad nyis brgya mthong ba yod do// byang chub snyams dpa'i sha'i mig gis 'dzam bu'i gling mthong ba yod do// byang chub sems dpa'i sha'i mig gis gling gnyis mthong ba yod do//
byang chub sems dpa'i sha'i mig gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// byang chub sems dpa'i sha'i mig gis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams ma rdzong ba yod do/ )
byang chub sems da pa risha'i mig gis stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod de// byang chub sems dang sha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
mthong ba yod do// shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po 'a sha'i mig yongs su dag pa yin no/ [‚Äù ]/shA ra'i bus gsol pa// bcom ldan
'das byung chub sums dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dgu pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 3 ri'i bu rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lta
rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul
dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mag gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshajus pa'i mdunun 'don dang ( tshangs risadang/
tshangs pa kun 'khor dang/ 'od chud dang/ tshad med 'od dang/ 'od gsal dang/ dge chung dang/ tshad med dge ba dang/ dge rgyas dang/ sprin med dang/
bsod nams skyes dang/ 'bras bu che ba dang/ sems can 'du shes med pa dang/ gnas gtsang ba dang/ mi che ba dang/ mi gdung ba dang/
gya nom snang ba dang/ shin tu mthong ba dang/ 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dang sa rab tu shes so// shA ri'i bu byang chub se mas dpa'
sams dpa' chen po'i lta'i mig gang yin pa de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ dgong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig gang yin pa
du ni 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// lha'i mig yongs su dag pa de nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ 'bod pa'i
sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang/ skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ phyogs mtshams
dang 'og dang/ stong gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad dag gi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang/ skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/
shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
dpa' sems dang don chen po ri shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen
po shes rab kyi mig de dang ldan pa ni 'dus byas sa ma/ 'dus ma byas sam/ dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/ kha na ma
thob med pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am zag pa med pa 'am/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas dang 'am/ nyon mongs pa med pa'am/ 'jig rten du 'am/
'jig rten las 'dus pa 'am kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba'i chos gang yang mi shes pa med do// byang chub sums dang 'tshams dpa' chen po'i
shes rab kyi mig de dang ldan pa ni chos gang yang ma yin/ ma mthong ba 'am/ ma thos pa 'am/ mi dran pa 'am/ rnam par mi shes par gyur pa ci'ang med de/ shAri'i
bu de ni byang chub sems dang 'a sAms dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
sa mas dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
chos kyi mig gis gang zag 'di ni da pas rjes su 'brang ba'o// 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o// 'din stong pa nyid la gnas pa// 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la
gnas pa// 'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyis gang zag de'i dbang po lnga po dag skye bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas bar chad med pa'i ting nga/
'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro// bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skyed par 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta
ba dang/ the tshom dang/ tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag de ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o//
des bsgom pa'i lam thob nas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang/ gnod sems srab mor byed par 'gyur te/ gang zag de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya'o// des lam de nyid
shas cher bsgoms pas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang/ gnod sems spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag de ni phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya'o// des lam de nyid shas char bsgoms pas
gzugs la 'dod chags dang/ gzugs med pa la 'dod chags dang/ ma rig pa dang/ nga rgyal dang/ rgod pa spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag de ni dgra bcom pa/
zhes bya'o// gang zag 'di ni stong da nyid la gnas pa ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis dbang do lnga po ngag thob par 'gyur zhing/ bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par
'gyur ro// bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skyed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas/ dgu bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du snga na
bzhin du sbyar ro// gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med da sa dbang po lnga po dag thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas ! dgra
bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// / gang drag 'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa ste/ rnam nga'i thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pas dbang
po lnga po dag thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro// bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas// rnam par grol ba'i )shes
mthong ba skyed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du shes te/ shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar kun 'byung ba'i chos gangon yod pa de thams cad 'gog pa'i chog pa yin no zhes bya bar rtogs
nas dad pa la sogs pa dbang po lnga 'thob par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu de 'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no//
shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dad ra chen po 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
tshu'i khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod rung/ de de nas dad pa'i dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po thob lta 2 de thabs la
mkhas pa dang yang ldan/ dge ba'i rtsa pas kyang brtan pas bsams bzhin du lus yongs su 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sums dpa' chen po 'di ni rgyal rigs shing sA la chen
po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni khyim bdag gi rigasashingasA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur/
'di ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni sum cu rtsa gsum da rnams su/ 'di ni 'phyakha bral du/ 'di ni dga' ldan du 1 'di ni 'phrul dga'/ 'di
gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de der gnas nas so mas can rnams yongs su smin par byed par yang 'gyur te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sems can de dag
0 la nye bar gnas par yang 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par yang 'gyur zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang ga par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ bsti stang du byed par 'gyur 3 bla ma'i byed par 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par 'gyur la/ nyan thos kyis 'a/ rang gangs
rgyus kyi sar ltung bar yong mi 'gyur ta/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du
phyir ldog par mi 'gyur re zhus bya bar rab tu shes ti/ shA ri'i bu de'ang byang chub semasA dpa' sems dang 'a chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
sems dpa' sums dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i
sams dpa' chen po 'di dag ni lung ma bstan pa'o// 'di dag ni nges pa'o// 'di dag ni ma nges pa'o// 'di dag ni lung bstan par 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni lung bstan par
mi 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'o// 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ma yin pa'o// 'di'i mngon pa shes pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs so// 'di'i mngon pa la shes pa
rnams ni yongs su ma rdzogs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed/ bsnyen bkur byed/ bsti stang du byed/
bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed do// de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ byung dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang dang/
'og dang/ stong gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams ga ra klung gi bye ma snyad dag tu song zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgru bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas
rnams mnyes par byed/ bsnyen bkur byed/ bsti stang du byed/ blo mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed do// 'di ni man par shes pa rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro//
'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams 'thob par mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni bzod pa thob pa'o// 'di ni bzod pa ma thob pa'o// byang chub sums dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs
rgyas kyi shing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang
ldan pa'o// 'di ni smon lam chen po dang mi ldan pa 'o// 'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par byas so 3 'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par ma byas so// byang
chub sems dad 'a sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsngags pa brjod pa mdzad do//
'di la ni bsngags pa brjod par mi mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ 3 'di
dag ni nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i tsho ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro// 'di'i chen dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ 'di'i 'od dang/
dbyangs dang 2 dwage slong gi dge 'dun ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// 'di'i ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa/
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas// byang chub sems dang/ 'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'di ni ldan par mi 'gyur ro// 'di
ni dka' ba spyad pa spyod par 'gyur 'o// 'di ni spyod par mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa'o// 'din srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no// 'di ni byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug
par 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'dug par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po 'di dag la ni bdud 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di dag la ni 'byung
bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te// shA ri'i bu de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no// shA ri'i busaM
gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang 'o samasA dpa' chen por sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shAring/
bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi 'jug thogs su rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nus/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidi thob
par byed do/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
bco brgyad dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa dang ldan pa yin no// de ni de'i mig yin te/ mig de dang ldan
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong ba 'am/ ma thos pa 'am/ mi dran pa 'am/ rnam par mi shes pa ci'ang med de/ shAri'i bu de ni
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin/
shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po'i mig lnga po ngas su sbyong bar 'dod pa dang/ thob par 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o//
de ni'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar dag ba'i chos thams cad dang/ nyan thos kyi chos thams cad dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cud dang/ byang chub sems
dpa'i chos thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa der dag pa'i chos thamang/
cad 'dus so zhes yang dag par smra bas smra na yang dag par skyabs smra ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin
pa thams cad mig lnga po de dag skyed pa ste/ mig lnga po de dag la bslabs pa'i byang nub su mas dad 'a sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
par 'tshang rgya byar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni mngon par shes nga'i pha rol tu
phyin pa 'thob cing/ des rdzu 'phrul bya ba rnam pa du ma myong bar 'gyur te/ desa'ang g.yo bar byed do// gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ba dang/ mang por gyur
nas kyang gcig tu 'gyur ba dang/ snang bar 'gyur zhing ma snang bar 'gyur ba'ang myong bar byed do// rtsig pa la'ang thad kar 'gro'o// ra ba la'ang thad kar 'gro'o// ra la'ang lus ma
thogs par thad gar 'gro ste/ dparan nam mkha' la bya ba bzhinano/ nam mkha' la'ang skyil mo krung bcas nas 'gro ste/ dper na 'dab chags bzhin no// sa la'ang steng du/
'byung pa dang byi'u zul byed de/ dpar na tshul bya ba bzhinAno// tshula'ang ma nub par 'gro ste/ dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no// du ba 'thul bar yang byed/ 'bar bar yang byed ro/
dpar na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no// bya ba dang nyam 'di ltar rdza 'phrul che pa/ 'di ltar mthu che ba/'ad ltar gza brjid che ba 'di dag la nga lag pas nom zhing kun tu nyug
par byed do// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'ang lus kyis dbang sgyur ro// ngo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang/ ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang/ dro bonyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir des
gang gis rlom sems su byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul re'ang mi dmigs/ gang rlom sams su byed pa dang/ gang gis rlom sams su byed pa de'ang ma dmigs te/ de rnam pa thams cad
0 mkhyen pa nyare yid la byed ba ma gtogs par rdzu 'phrul du sems pa 'am/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa'i sems pa'ang ma nyid do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul bya ba mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub bo// des lha'i rna ba rnam/
par dag pa mi las 'das pas/ 'di lta ste/ lha dang mi'i sgra rnams thos te/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang/ ngo bo nyide kyis dben pa nyid dang ngobatad kyis skye ba med pa
nyid kyi phyir 'di ltar des sgra de'ang ma dmigs pa/ bdag gis sgra thos so snyam du lha'i rna ba des rlom sems sum byad do// de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyide yid la byed pa ma gtogA
par lha'i rna ngas sems pa'ang ma skyod cing ma dmakas so// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar sbyod pan lha'i rna ba mngon
sum du bya ba'i mngon pa/ja khas pa mngon par sgrub pa// des sems can gzhana rnams dang ) gang zag gzhan dag gi sems kyang sems kyis yang dag pa ji ltar
bzhin du rab tu shes te/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la'ang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dod chags dang bral
ba'i sems la 'a nga 'a dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin du zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang/ zhe sdang dang
za pral ba dang/ gti mug dang bcas pa dang/ gti mug bral ba dang/ srid pa dang bcas pa dang/ sred pa dang bral ba dang/ len pa dang bcas pa dang/ len pa med pa
dang/ bsdus pa dang/ rnam par g.yangs pa dang/ chung du dang chen por 'gyur ba dang/ mnyam par ma gzhag pa dang/ rnam par grol ba dang/ rnam par mgrol ba dang/
ba bag pa dang/ raMcas pa dang/ drag pa med pa dang/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang/ nyon mongs pa med dang/ bla na yod pa'i sams la'ang bla na yod pa'i sems su yang dag pa
ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bla na med pa'i sems la'ang bla na med pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shas so// 'di ltar sems de 'ang sems ma yin pa ste/
bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir des rlomasams su mi byed de/ dus gang gis rlom sems su ma byed pa'i sems de nyid kyang ma dmigs te/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyidi dang/ ngob
nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang/ ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyi'i/ bdag gis shes so snyam du rlom sams su mi byed do// de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma
gtogs par sems la sems pa'ang mi skyed do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sam dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi
sems kyi spyod pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub bo// de sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa'i shes pa mngon sum du rgyu ba'i mngon
par shes pa'i shes ba mngon par sgrub ste/ des sams gcig gam/ sems brgya'i bar du nga rjes su dran no// zhag gcig dang/ zhag brgya'i bar dang/ zla ba gcig dang/ zla ba brgya'i bar
dang/ lo gcig dang ! lo brgya'i bar dang/ bskal ba gcig dang/ bskal pa brgya'i bar dang/ bskal pa brgya phrag du ma 'am/ bskal pa stong phrag du ma 'am/ bskal pa//
'bum phrag du ma nA/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du ma'i bar du rjes su dran zhing sngon gyi mtha' mur thug pa'i bar du'ang rjes su dran te/ bdag nigag mo zhig na
'dug 'dug ste/ ming ni 'di zhes bya/ rus na 'di zhes bya/ dgis na 'di zhes bya/ khu was na 'di lta bu zhig za za/ 'tsho bani 'di 'dra ba zhig/ yunani 'ad srid cig
tu 'dug 'dug/ tshig mtha' na 'di tsam zhig tugyur/ de nas shakhongs nas ni ga ga mo zhig tu skyo// de nas sha 'phos nas na 'dir skyes so zhes/ de ltar rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs
0 @#// dang bcas/ gtso las gyur pa dang bcas bas/ bdag dang gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no// 'di ltar shes pa de'ang shes pa ma yin pa ste/
bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyi'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa des kyang rlom sems su ma byed do// des gang gis rlom sems su byed pa'i shes pa de nyid kyang
ma dmigs te/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang/ ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang/ ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir)bdag gis gos so snyam du rlom sems sum byed do// de
rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yodi la byed pa ma gtogs par rjes su dran pa'i shes par sems pa'ang ma skyed do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa
kyi ra rol tu phyin pa la de ltar srid pa ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du bya pa'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub bo// de lha' mig rnam par dag pa
ma'i las 'das pas/ sems can rnams mthong ste/ sems can 'cha' bo ba dang/ skye ba dang/ kha dog sngag pa dang/ kha dog mi sdug pa dang/ bzang po dang/ ngan pa dang 2/
bde 'gro dang/ ngan 'gro dang/ las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba dag rab tu bas so// sems can 'di dug na lus kyi nyis par sodapa dang ldan po/ ngag gi nyes par med pa dang/ yid
kyinyis khar sbyod pa dang ldan pa dang/ 'bags pa la skur pa 'debs ra// log par lta ba can yin te/ log par lta ba'i las kyi gzhi dang rgyus lus zhig nas sha ba'i 'og tu ngan song
ngan 'gro 'dog par gyur go/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi lags par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi legs par sbyod pa dang/ yid kyi legs par sbyor pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa//
rnams la skur pa ma 'debs pa/ yang dag pa'i lta ba can te/ de dgo lus dang/ rag dang/ yod kyi legs par spyod pa'i gzhidang rgyu lus zhig nas/ badre 'gro mtho si
kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klus
pa 3 nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na 'gro ba drug gi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dung skyob yang dag paji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shas so// 'di ltar mig de ni mig/
ma yin pa ste/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i phyir des kyang a sams su mi byed de/ des gang gis rlom sems su byed pa'i mig de ni mi dmigs te/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid
dang ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang/ ngogonyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir/ bdag gis shes so snyam du rlom sems su ma byed do// de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par mig tusems pa'ong gi skyed do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ lha'i
ma'i mngonosum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub go/ de zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa 'angashes pa'ang mngon par sgrub la
nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang ma lhung// blun mad pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par chos gzhan gang la'ang
son pa mad do// de mngon par shes pa res rdo rdzolta bu'i ting nge 'dzani la brtenanas bag chags dang/ mtshams sbyor pa dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad slong bar byed do//
'di ltar shes pa de ni shes pa de ni shes pa ma yin pa ste/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i skyes khag pa zad pa mngonasam du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub pa'i da//
bdes rlom sems su mi byed do// de shes pa de nyid ma dmigs te/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid dang ngogotod kyis dban pa nyid dang/ ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa nyid kyi
phyir bdag gis shes so snyam du rlom sems su ma byed do// de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyare yid la byed pa ma gtogs par shes pa de la sems pa'ang mi skyed do//
Ara'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar srid pas na zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon ra ra shes pa'i shes pa mngon par sgrub bo//
shA ri'i bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar byed pa ni mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/
yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag ras/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// shA ra'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
dba' chen pos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod pa gang dag mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i phyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong bdag kyang yod do// shA'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pho rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtha' las
'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ltung ba mi 'byung ba dang/ lhag par ltung ba mi 'byung ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/ shAri'i bu byang chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis 'khrug
pa med pa'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu ne pa la gnas te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems/
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byed pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus ma btang ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyonapa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ra/
mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis rnam par g.yeng ba med pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do//
shA ri'i bu byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems ma dmigs pa'i phyir/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa dang/ 'dzan pa med pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la gnas te rnam
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong b.rakhyed do// sbyin pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa yod pa'i phyir gdags so// tshul khrims na tshul khrims 'chal ba yod pa'i phyir gdags/
so bzod pa ni 'khrug pa yod pa'i gdags so// brtson 'grus ni la le yod pa'i phyir gdags so// ting nge 'dzan na mnyam par ma bzhag pa yod pa'i phyir gdags so//
shes rab ni shes rab nashas rub 'chal ba yod pa'i phyir gags te/ de na brgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// sa brgal te zhes bya bar rlomasams mad do// sbyin pa dang
sar sna zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// tshul khrims dang tshul khrims ma yin pa zhes bya bar rlom sems med de// bzod pa dang 'khrug pa zhes bya bar rlom sems ma da de//
brtson 'grus dang la la zhes bya bar rlom sems mAd do// mnyam par gzhag pa dang mnyam par ma gzhug pa zhes bya bar rlom sems mad do// shes rab dang shes rab 'chal pa zhes
bya bar rlom sems med do// bdag la sres so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// bdag la phyag byas so zhes bur rlom sems med do// bdag la bsti stang byas sa nas bya bar rlom
soms med do// bdag la bsti stang ma byos so zhes bya bar rlom sams mad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na gshAri'i bu 'di ltar skye ba med pa ni bdag la sngos so zha rlom sems su mi byed/
phyag byas so zhes rlomasams su mi byed/ bdag la bsti stang byas so zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ bdag la bsti stang ma byas so zhes rlom sems su mi byed pa'i
phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na rlom sems thams cad gcod pa'i phyir ro// shAri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i yon gtan gang yin pa de dag ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med de/ ra na yon tan de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed cing/ sems
can rnams kyang yongs su snyan par byed sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par byed do// shA ri'i bu gzhan
yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sred pa ni/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems skyod par byed de/ des sems can thams
cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sams bskyed pas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// des chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob pas/ soms can thams cad chos
thams cad mnyamapa nyid la 'god par byed do// de tshe 'di nyid la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sdug cing thugs su byon par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' tham cad dang//
nyan thos thams cad dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad la'ang sdug cing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ de gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang dar rnams kyang mig gis gzugs yid du mi 'ong ba rnams /
mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// rna bas sgra yid du ma 'ong pa rnams thos par ma 'gyur ro// sAs dri yid du mi 'ong ba rnams tshor bar mi 'gyur ro// lces ro yid du mi 'ong ba rnams myong bar ma 'gyur
ro/ lus kyis ngag bya yid du mi 'ong ba rnams reg par mi 'gyur ro// yid kyis tshes yid du ma 'ong pa rnams shes par ma 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sams
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar skyed pa ni/ man med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams par ma 'gyur ro/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di bshad pan/ dag slong sum brgyas gos kyi gyon pa rnams / bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol te// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
byang chub sems kyang bskyod do// de nas de'i tsho bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag
ba gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsug te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad kyis
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par
za 'dzum pa ma mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ kun dga' po dge slong sum brgya po 'di dag ni 'di nas ha'aphos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sgyu sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyurataM ) de dag bskal pa drug cu rtsa gcig na bskal pa skar ma lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tog chen po zhes bya ba drag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu drug khris kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dge bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'ang mnyes par byed par 'gyur te//
de nyid du rab tu byung nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur zhing/ de bzhin galashogs pa byams pa des kyang/ de dag bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro/// de nas deb tsho sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor bzhi po de dag gis 'di nas shar phyogs na sangs rgyas khra bzhugs pa mthong ngo//
phyogs bcu'i khor yug gi bar du'ang sangs rgyas grwa lnga mthong ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod
pa gang dag snang pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bkod pa de dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dzin ma snang ngo// de nas 'khor de las srog chags khris bdag cag kyang las 'di lta bu
byas te/ las de byas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa
thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams na rgyu ma mchis skyon ma mchis par 'dzum pa me mdzadan/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags ]rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa// kun dga' bo srog chags khri po 'di dag khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa// kun dga' bo srog chags khri po 'di dag na 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ nams kyang de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur la/ phyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa'i
rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ nye bar brtag pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/

tsho dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'agu gong po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po
dang 8 de dag dang/ gzhan yang dag slong dang/ dag slong ma dang/ dag bstan dang/ dge bsnyen ma mngon pa shes pa mngon par shes pa dag dang ! byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam kyi
pha rol tu phyin pachen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yangs pa lags so/
[/ ]bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog lagaso// 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa khyad par du
phags pa lags so// 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa ba dang/ rab mchog dang/ gya nom pa lags so// 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rgyan ma mchis pa lags so// 'di ni pa rol tu phyin
pa grong na ma mchis pa lags so// 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa ma mchis pa lags so// 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags so// 'di ni pha rol/
tuphyin pa zhi ba dang dul ba lags so// 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ ]'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa dpa ma mchis pa lags so// 'di ni pa rol tu
khyen pa nam mkha' lta bu lags so// 'di ni rang gi mtshananyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// 'di ni yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so//
bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thub pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so//
bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa stsal ba lags so//
de dag gis ni ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sman pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi lags so// de dag gis nam mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus
thob lags so// de dag ni 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi chos mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa thob par 'gyur lags so// de bzhin du ma mnyam pa dang
mnyam pa'i tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab bsgoms lags so// de dag gis ni mnyam dang mnyam pa'i lus thob
lags so// de dag gis ni 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi chos mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i spyad pas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs pas par gyur lags so// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du
lta byed rnams dang/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa banas par gyur lags so// ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags so//
mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi'akhor lo bskor lags so// de bzhin du 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la sbyad pas/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur lags so// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
lags so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi pha rol
tu phyin par 'tshal ba rnams kyis khas ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyi'o/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
'di la spyod pa gang lags pa de dag ni lta dang ) ma dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po de rag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rab tu mang po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi ru
dag ra de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// 'gas kyi bu dag khyed ji skad bur ba bzhin te byang du dusams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi ya tsetu phyin pa la
spyod pa gang yin pa de dag ni lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya ba'i gnas yin no// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po la/
brten nas 'jig rten du mi'i 'jig rten 'byung ngo// 'jig rten du lha'i 'jig rtan 'byung ngo// de bzhin du rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang/ bum
ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dug dang/ 'khor la sbyar ba'i rgyal po lta bu dag dang/ rgyal chan bzhi'i ris kyi lha
rnams drang/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dar/
tshangs ris dang/ tshangs 'khor dang/ 'od chung dang/ tshad mar 'od dang/ 'od gsal dang/ dag chung dwang/ tshad mad dig dang dgargyus dang/ 'bras bu chadang/
sams can 'du shes med pa dang/ gnas gtsang ma ma tshe dang/ shas tu mthong dang/ gya nom snang dang/ mi gdung dang/ 'og min dang/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du
nya par 'gro ba dang/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du zhu bar 'gro ba dang/ ci'ang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang/ 'du shes mang 'du shes med min sku mched du 'gro ba
'gro ba lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang/ lan cig phyir 'o ba rnams dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ rang
chas sangs rgyas rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo// shA ri'i
bu byang chub sems dpa' la brten nas/ dkon mchogagasum 'jig rten du 'byung/ 'jig rten pa'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad bra dang/ skom dang/ mal cha dang/
snyan dang/ na pa'i gsos sun dang/ 'tsho chas dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ bai DUr+ya dang/ dung dang/ man 80la dang/ bya ru rung/
dngul dang/ gsar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo// shA ri'i bu lha rnams dang/ mi rnams kyi bad ba yo byad ji snyid pa rnams dang/ srid pa'i bar pa rnams dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba
dag thams cad kyang/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten te 'jig rten du 'byung ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhes 3/ shA ri'i byang chub sems dpa' na byang chub
sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ) pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la gnas te/ bdag nyid kyang spyin pa sbyin par da la ) gzhan dag kyang sbyane pa la sbyor bar byed/ bdag nyid
kyang tshul khrims srung la/ gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed/ bdag nyid kyang bzod pa sgom la/ gzhan dag kyang bzod pa la sbyor bar byed/ bdag nyid
u@#// kyang brtson 'grus rtsom la ) gzhan dag kyang brtson 'grus la sbyor bar byed/ bdag nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams skyed la/ gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan rnams la
sbyorab r byed/ bdag nyid kyang shes rab sgrom la/ gzhan dag kyang shes rab sgom pa la sbyor bar byed pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems
can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyir pa khri brgya stong pa las/ mi mnyam pa dngamanyam pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa bam po lnga pa////de nas de'i tsho bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po byung nas/ stong gsum
gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par mdzad do// de nas ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od 'phro ba kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs byung// de byung nas shar phyogs su
'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bya masnyad dag snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ byang shar dung/ shar lho dang/ lho
nub dang/ nub byang dang/ 'og dang/ stang gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad dag snang ba chen pos khyob par gyur to// de nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten
gyi khams gang+gA'i gi bye ma snyad po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu mang grangs med pa dag gis 'od kyi bkod pa de mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par gda' ba 'di su'i mah+phu lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
de dag gis/ sbyong chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni nub phyogs legs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya bzhig yod
de don de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ dus 'di lta sta/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir lcags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ phyogasabacu dag tu phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyang po 'di dag
snangab chon pos khyab par mdzad do// de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dpa/ byang dang 3 'og dang/ stong dang/ phyogs bcu kun gyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
[H]ma snyad dag tu'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la
blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang/ bsnyad bkur bgyi ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen po phyogs bcunas 'dus pa de dag kyang blta ba dang/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mnyan pa'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchibar 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i
dus la bab par shes na deng zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi zhabs
la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ phyogs bcu nus gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba danadang/ ma tog dang/ me tog 'phreng dang/
spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang ! nabaza' dang/ gsar gyi ma tog dang/ dngul gyi me tog rnam pa du ma dag khyer nas/ sal snyan dang/ phag rdob pa dang/
rol mo'i sgra dang chas te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ngo// de nas rgyal
chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis lha'i me tog dang me tog 'phreng dang sa nag pad no phye ma dang/ lha'i me tog ut+tha
la dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu dAdang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ man dA ra ba dang/ man dzAr ba chen po dang kA shing ma tog dang/ ngo ma 'daka' u0f7c ma rnams khyer te/ bcom ldan
'das de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ngo// de nas byang chung sams dpa' semasadapa' chen po de dug dang/
lha de dag gis ma rtog dang/ ma rtog 'phung dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mchan dang ba ngan de dag gis/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gtor/ mngon pa/ nga ra monapar rab tub/ don ngo
de nas me tog la sogs pa de dag steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten khams 'gengs to a ki khang pa brtsegs pa gru pa'i lham pa
ka ba bzhi zug pa/ chamanyam pa/ shin tu rnam par phyu ba/ nyams dga' ba/ yid du 'ong ba zhebatupada'adug ma ka te gsu'akhor nga las srog gas
bya ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol/
to bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos ji lta bu dag b.ris pa'i chos de lta bu dag bdag cag gis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
thob par gyur cig/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar chos ston pa de bzhin du nyan thos kyi dag 'dun la lung 'bog cing/ 'khor 'di lta bu dag la chos ston pa ra yang gyur cig/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rogs kyi bu do dag gi bsam pa shugs su chud de/ chos thams cad skya ba med pa dang/ mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang/ chos thams/
cad 'byung ba med par bzod par gyur par mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skadaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
'dzum po mdzad pa'i rgyugang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'khor 'di las srog chags bya ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis mi skye ba'i
chos la bzod pa thob ste/ 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba phrag drug cu ba'i na bskal pa me tog 'byung gnas shes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas byang chub kyi yan lagagi ma tog ces bya ba dug 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ ! shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ ljags kyi dbang po'i le'u zhes
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyisaM/ tshongang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
chos kyi gtam bya ba khyod spobs par gyis shig de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang/ nyan thos chen po de dag dang/ lha'i bu de dug
'di snyam du sems te/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di rang gi shes rab dang spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i go chas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab
kyi ba rol tu phyin pa ston par byed dam/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston par byed snyam mo// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang/ nyan thos chen po de dag dang/ lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyis yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
nga@#// ri'i bu la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams sba ba dang ston pa dang/ brjod pa gang ci'ang rung ste/ de/
dag thams cad nid bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin no// de bzhin gshegs pas chos ston pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad nichos nyid dang mi 'gal lo// rigs kyi bu do dag chos
ston pa de la slob na'ang chos nyid de mngon sum du byed do/ shAri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa nyid thabs la mkhas pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston gyi/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po thams cad ni/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par mi nus te yul ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'dus/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de chos gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/
bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i ming gi chos de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong sta/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems ]
dpa' chen po de dag dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming de'ang bdag gis yang dag parim mthong lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams par bgyi/ rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dilta ste/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming de ni ming tsam du zad du/ ming de'ang nang na'ang mad/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka med par
yang mi dmigasaso// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dpar nasams nyanasams can zhes bya bar ming du brjod kyang sams can gang yang mi dmigs te/ de ni ming du btags pa tsam du zad la//
btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la niming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du bdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/ 'gag pa mad do// dbazhin du bdag dang/ srog dang/ skyo ba po dang/
gso bdang/ skyes bu dang/ gang zag dang/ shes las skyes dang/ shad bu dang/ byed pa po dang/ byed du 'jug pa po dang/ slong ba po dang/ kun nas slong ba po dang/ tshor ba
po dang/ tshor bar byed du 'jug pa po dang/ shes pa po dang/ mthong ba po de dag thams cad kyang btags pa'i chos yon la/ btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni skye ba med/ 'gag pa med
de: 'di ltar ming dang badzatsam gyis tha sAdadu gdags par zad do// ming de'ang nang na'ang med phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so//
[„Äë ]rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa'i ming gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni bdagos pa'i chos
yin la/ brtags pa'i chos de la ni ming dang brdas thasnyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba mad// 'gag pa med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na rang gi lus gang yin/
pa de la gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/ chos su btags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba mad/ 'gag pa med de
ming de ni nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so da bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du shes rnams dang/ rnam
par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni chos su btag pa tsam du zad la/ chos su btags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdugs pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/
a ming de ni nang na'ang med// phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka med bor yang ma dmigs so/ rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang//
byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya ba de dug thams cad btags pa'i chos yin la/ brtags pa'i chos gang yinab de la ni ming dang brdzatsam kyis tha snyad du gdugs pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/
'gag pa mad do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ mig ces bya ba de ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/ chos su bdags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdugs pa ma gtogs
par skye ba mad/ 'gag pa mang do// 'di lta ste/ mig ces bya ba'i ming de'ang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so//
rang 'byor de bzhin du rnab dang/ sna dang lce dang/ lus dang/ yid ces bya ba de ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/ chos su
btags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyadadu gajugs par skye ba mad/ 'gag pa med do// 'di lta ste/ yid ces bya ba'i ming de'ang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med//
gnyis ka med par yang ma dmigs so// rab 'abyor gzugs shes bya ba da ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/ chos su bdugs pa de la ni mong dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags
pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/ 'gag pa mang de/ ming de'ang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi demigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du sku dang//
dri dang/ ro dang/ rig bya dang/ chos shes bya ba de ni chos su btags pa tsam du brad la/ chos su btags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha
snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba mad/ 'gag pa med de/ chos shes bya ba'i ming de'ang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so//
rab 'byor mig gi khams shes bya ba de ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad la/ chos su brtags pa de la ni ming dang brdatsum gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/ 'gag

su brtags pa tsam du zad la/ chos su thata gas pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skyo ba mang/ 'gag pa med do// gzugs kyi khams shes
bya ba'i ming de 'anganang na'ang mad/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya ba de ni chos su brtags
pa tsam duthad la/ chos su btags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad dugadags pa ma gtogs par skyo ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
khams shes bya ba'i ming de'ang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang/ sgra'i khams
dung rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ sna'i khams dang/ dri'i khams dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ lce'i khams dang/ ro'i khams dang/
lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ lus kyi khams dang/ reg bya'i khams dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ yid kyi khams dang// chos kyi khams
dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya ba de ni ches su btags pa tsam du 'du la/ chos su btags pa de la ni ming dang brdasaMm gyis tha snyad du gdugs pa ma gtogs par
skya ba mde/ 'gag pa med de/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya ba'i ming de'ang nang na'ang mdu/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so//
rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya ba de ni 'di ltar
btags pa'i chos yin la/ gtags pa'i chos de la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sam sa dpa'i ming zhes bya ba de'ang nang na'ang med phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis

byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya ba de dag thams cad ni btags pa'i chos yin la// btags pa'i chos de dag la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba mad/
'gag pa med de/ ming de'ang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol ma'ang mad/ gnyis ka mang par yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na phyi rol gyi myu dang/ shing dang [}]
yal ga dang/ lo ma dang/ 'dab ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ngag thams cad ni ming sna tshogs kyis tha snyad du gdags par brad la/ ming de dag kyang ming dang brda tsam gyis shA sAd du gdags
pa ma gtogs par skyab med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming de dag kyang nang na'ang med// phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya ba de dag thams cad ni btags pa'i chos yin la/ bdags pa'i
chos de dag la ni ming dang brda tsam gyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba med/ 'gog pa med de/ ming de'ang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka med par ang
mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dpar na 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan ni ming dang brda tsam gyis bya snyad du gdags pa ma gaNo gas par skye ba med/
'gag pa med de/ mtshan de dag kyang nang na'ang med/ phyi rol na'ang yod ) gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na rmi lam dang/ brag cha dang/
mig yor dang/ sgyu ma dang/ smig rgyudang/ chu zla dang/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa zhes bya ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni btags pa tsam du zad la/ btags pa de dag la
ni mang dung ban+datsam gyis tha snyadadu gdugs pa ma gtogs par skyab med/ 'gaka pa mad de/ ming de'ang nang na'ang yod/ phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis

sems dpa'i ming zhes bya ba'i chos 'di dag thams cad ni btags pa tsam du zad la// btags pa'i chos de dag la ni ming dang brdasaMm kyis tha snyad du gdags pa ma gtogs par skye
ba med/ 'gag pa med de/ ming de'ang nang na'ang med// phyi rol na'ang med/ gnyis ka mad par yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas/ ming dang brdar brtags pa dang/ gdams ngag tu brtags pa dang/ chos su btags pa la bslab par bya'o//
rab 'abyor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ gzugs rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// gzugasami
ra rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag yod ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya
[n ]bdang/ mazhi zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya ba da/ mchanam yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa yod ces bya ba dang/
smon pa med ces bya ba dang/ 'dus byas zhes bya ba dang/ 'dus ma byas zhes bya pa dang/ skye ba zhes bya ba dang/ 'gag pa zhes bya ba dang/ dben pa zhes bya ba dang/ me
dbon pa zhes bya ba dang/ dge ba dang/ mi dge ba dang/ kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa dang/ kha na ma tho ba med pa dang/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ zag pa mdapa dang/
nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang/ nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'dus pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba dang/
gzugs 'khor ba zhes bya bar yang dag pa rjes su mi mthong ngo// gzugs mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes
dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa rtagaces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// de bzhin du bde ba
dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag yod pa dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ ma zhi ba dang/ stong pa dang/ mi stong pa dang/ mchan ma yodapa dang/ mtshan ma mang
