nyidi dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongasasu gzung ba ma mchis pa lags so// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ da ni mtshan ma ra brjodapa ma lags te/'di ltaramtshanamani nyon
mongs pa lags pa'i slad du 'o// mtshan ma gang lags shes na/gzugs ni mtshan ma lags so// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa ni mtshan
malags so// mig ni metshan ma lags so// rnab dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yod na mtshan ma lags so// gzugs ni mtshan ma lags so// sgra dang/
dra deng ro dang/ reg bya dang// chos rnams ni mtshan ma lags so// mig gi rnam par shis pa ni metshan ma lags so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/
lce'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam pa shes pa dang/ yidelinem par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma lags so// rnaba'i
'dus te reg pa dang/ sna' 'dus te reg pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te rig pa ni rtonam lags so// mig gi
'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma lags so/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ lce'i
'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dong/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma lags so//
ra sa'i khom+pan mtshan ma lags so/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams dang/ nam mkha'i khams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ni metshan ma lags so// ma rig pa
nu men ma lags so// 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ ming dang gzugs dang/ skye mched drug dang/ rig pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ srid pa dang/ len pa dang/ srid pa dang
skye ba dang/ rga shi ni mtshan ma lags so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ yang dag par song ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang
chub kyi yan lag dang 3 lam dung/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
'dres pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang/ son pa ma mchis pa dang/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos nyid
dang tshos skyon med panyid dang/ ting nge 'dzani dang Da gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma lags so// yi ge rnams ni mtshanam lags so// gcig brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags
so gnyasi brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ tha dang pa brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags so/ mngon par shes pa na maNon ma lags so// tadeng 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo
thams cad ni mtshan ma lags te/ de ni nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi'o// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mtshan mar gzung bar bgyi ba zhig lags na ni/ kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs bstan/
pa 'dire thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de la dad pa thob par ma 'gyur lags so// dad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pa/
dang rtog pa dang/ mos pa dang/ rtan pa dang/ sems pa dang/ 'jal ba dang/ dpyod pa ste/ de'ang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags/ mtshan ma mchis pa'i tshul du 'ang ma
lags so// da ltar de ni mtshan ma dang/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang/ gzung ba ma mchis par gzung bar bgyi ba lags te// kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyang thams cad mkhyan pa'i
sprul shes 'di la mos nas dad pas rjes su 'brang bas chu tshob shes pas zhugs te/ de zhugs nas gzugs yongs su ma gzung/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/
'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yongs su ma gzung lags so /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des rang gi mtshananyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin
pa po ma dmigs pa'i slad du'o// de yang ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar dus shes pa de thob pa dang/ mngon par rtogs pa 'gas par nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ phyi rol tu yang
dag par rjes su ma mthong/ shes pa de thob pa dang/ mngon par rtogs pa lags par phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong (shes pa de thob pa dang/ mngon par rtogs pa lags
gzhan du 'ang yang dag par rjesasu ma mthong ba'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang gis rtogs par bgyid pa dang/ gang rtogs ra ra bgyid pa dang/ gang rtogs par bgyid
pa'i chos de ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ shes pa de gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ shes pa de tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/
rnam par shes pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ shes pa de gzugs kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ shes pa de tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed
rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ shes pa de gzugs kyi nang dang phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ shes pa de tshor ba dang/ 'du
shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dung/ rnam par shes pa'i nang dang phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma Athong/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de gzugs las gzhan du yang dag par
rjes su ma mthong Da shes pa de tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa 'a sa gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o// de bzhin du
shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar rgya nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ shes pa de yang dag pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ phyi nang stong pa de kyi slad du shes pa de yang
dag pa 'a mtha' las gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o// rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs mos par gyur te/ de 'dur mos nas dad/
za pas rjes su 'brang bas chos nyid tshad mar bgyi ste/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du nam ra 'a med du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidikyi [‚Äù]shes la zhugs par gyur te/ de de ltar mos nas/
'a des chos gang yang mtshan ma mchis par yid la brgyad pa'i slad du/ chos gang yang yongs su gzung ba ma mchis lags so// chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis pa dang/ btang du ma mnaM
tshapa'i slad du des gang yongs su gzung bar bgyi de 'am ) gtang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs te/ chos thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du/ de ni mya ngan las 'angs
pas kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba ma mchis lags so// bcom ldanu'adus chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang/ tshor ba
dang 'du shes dang/ 'dubyed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang/ chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar
du yongs su mi 'dzin pa de ni gzhan gyi pha rol tu mchis pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen poTashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so/ de ni sgo na lam dag yongs
sum rdzogs shang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las ma 'da' lags so// deci'i slad du zhe na/smon lam
de dag smon lam ma lags/ stobs de dag stobs ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa de dag mi 'jigs pa ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag so so yang dag par rig pas legs shing/
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres nams kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags te// de dag na tshos kyang ma lags/ chos ma lags pa'ang ma lags pa'i slad du'o/
bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang/ yang dar pa' mtha'i bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa de ni gzhan gyi pha
rol tu mchis pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so//// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong
pa bam po bdun pa// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod pas 'di ltar yongs su bcug par
bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu 'di ni gang gi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
zhig nazhes yongs su brtag par bgyi'o// de de ltar yongs su rtog cing/ de ltar nges par sems pa'i tshe/ gal te chos ma mchis shing mi dramoges pa gang lags
pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags par yang dag par rjes su mthongan/ de legs par mthong ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma dmigs shing mi
tsa dmagres pa'i slad du'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bus/ tshadang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces sus so// tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor chos grang dag med
cing ma dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nong stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang 3 chen
laM bo stong pa trid dang/ don dam pa stong pa 'di deng/ 'dus byas stong pa nyidre dang/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid+de dang/ mtha' las 'dus pa stong panyid dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med
pa stong pa nyid dang/ dor ba mad pa stong pa nyid dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad stong ba nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ mdamigs pa stong pa nyid dang

dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po yodapa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyede dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so//
khri brgyad stong la
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so/ tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chung stong pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so// tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang med
tshang ma dmigs so// tshod ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ gzugs med cing mi dmigs so// tshodAng
ldan pa shA ri'i bu blos pa dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa med cing mdamigasas// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du med cing maM
dmogs so// mngon par shes pa med cing mdamags so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du med cing mdamigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhinanyid mang cing
mi dmigs so// tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos nyide dang/ chos kyi dbyings dung/ chos gnas pa de dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med cing
dpa' dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'ang med cing mdamigs so/ nang stong ranyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ thams cad/
[„Äë ]shes pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmiges so/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med cing mdamigs so// tshodang ldan pa shAri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang medatsang mdamigs so//

'a tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa gal te sams ma zhum mi'i gong la/ mi skrag tshadengang zhing dngang ba ma 'gyuran/
( byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyide dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// de nas tshodang ldan pa shAra'i bus/ tshadang ldan pa
rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshadang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa tham+bacad makhyen pa nyid dang ma bral bar rig par bya/ rab
'byor gyis sbas pa// tshodang ldan pa shAri'i bugazugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpachen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas
de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab shes so// tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rong

bzhinadang bral ba'o 'tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu/
phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o//
yang dag pa'i mtha' yang yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral pa'o// shA ra'athus smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yon/ tshor ba dang//
'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ tshadang ldan pa rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du rang bzhin ji lta bu yaMn/ rab
'byor gyis sbas pa/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dengos po med pa'o// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dung/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i
rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa sta/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i'u rnam grangs desan 'di ltar gzugasazhi
gzugs kyi reng bzhin dang bral ba'o// chor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral
ba'o de bzhinedusang dag pa'i mtha'abar ni yang dag pa'i mtha' rang bzhin dang bral bar rig par bya'o// tshodang ldan pa shA ra'i bu gzhan yang gzugasanagazugasakyi mtshan
nyid dang bral ba'o// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes panornam par shes pa'i etshananyid dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du ang dag pa'i mtha'abar na eng dag
[‚Äú] pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhanedang bralaba'o// mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ shA ri'i
bus sas pa[7 ]tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grang bslab pa 'di la slobal de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram//
rab 'byor gyis sbas pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni rnam pa/

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshodang ldan pad+d+hashA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes shing byung ba med pa'i phyir ro/ AraM'obus smras pa/
tshadang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ma skyes shing nges par 'byung ba med nga yan/ rab 'byor gyis skyas pa/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong sta/
de la skye ba dang 'byung ba mi dmigasaso// de bzhin du tshor bdang/ 'dushes dang// 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa ni rnyem par shes pas stong ste/ de la skyo ba dang 'byung ba mi dmigs/
so de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar na yang dag pa'i mtha'i stong ste/ de la skya ba dang 'byung ba mi dmigasaso// tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'aphyang chub dang nye ba yine no// de ji ltajilta bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang lhabar
gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yongasasu dag pa dang/ ngag yongs su dag pa dang/ sems yongs su dag pa dang/ mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub
sems dpa' saMms dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar lus yongs sudag pa dang/ ngag yongs su dag pa drang/ sems yongs sudag pa dang/ mtshan yongs su dag pa 'thob par
'gyur ba de lta de ltar 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sams mo skyid do// zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang/ gti mug dang ldan pa dang/ nga rgyal dang ldan padang/ sgyudang g.yo dang ldan pa
@#@#/// dang/ phradog dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang/ chags pa dang ldan pa dang/ lta ba dang ldan pa'i sa mas ma skyod do// de 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i me skyodatsang/
za zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dung/ nga rgyal dang/ sgyu dang/ g.yo dang/ phrag dog dang/ sar sna dang chags pa dang/ lta ba dang ldan pa'i sams mo sbyad pas/ nam yang ma'o
mngal du mi skye zhing rtag par rgyun du rdzus teskye bar 'gyur ro// sems can yongs su snyan par bya ba'i ched ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su ma skye'o// de sams can rnamA
rgyur yongs su smin par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cinge/ sangs rgyas kyi zhonge nas sangs rgyas kyi shong du 'gro ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras rnams dang 'bral bar ma 'gyur ro// tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'
sams dpa' chen po yon tan dang phan yon de dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa 'di la brtson pa ma gtang bar spyad par bya ste/ tshodang ldan pa'apa'i bu byang chub semA dpa'i

sa mas da pa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ne pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no// shes rab kyi khe rol tu phyin pa khri brgyadastong pa las kun
[/]tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyi le'u zhes bya sta brgyad pa'o/// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang
chubs mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la sbyonganamtshan ma la stod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tuphyone pa la spyor ba ma la bcas so// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la sbyong na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags [‚Äù]te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa ma lags so// gal te gzugs la rtag ces bgyi ba 'am ma rtagatses bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod pa 'gasato/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/
tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la rtagaces bgyi ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bgyi bar sbyongan mtshanam la spyod pa lags to/ shes rab kyi pha rol
du phyin pa la stod pa ma lags so// gal te gzugs la bde zhes bgyi ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar sbyongan/ mtshan ma la sdod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang/ 'du shes
dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la bde zhes bgyi be 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar rtsod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la bdagaces bgyi ba 'am
bdag ma mchis shes brgya bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam parngashes pa la bdag ces
bgyi ba 'am/ bdag ma mchis shes bgyi bar stong na mtshan ma la stod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am/ ma zhesabargyabar stong tsa lan ma la sdod pa lags//
gal tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la ni zhes bgyi ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshanas la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs
sgyur la dbenazhes bgyi ba 'am/ mi dben zhes bgyi bar go dan yatshanam la smod pa lags/ galatre tshor bradang/ 'du shes dang/ 'dubyed rnams dang/ rnam par
shes pa la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mi dban zhes bgyi bar stod na mtshanapa la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyane pa la spyod pa ma legs so// bcom ldan dus
[/ ]byang chub sams dpa' sums dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod pa thabs la mi mes pas/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi tshos sum cu rtsa bdun la sdod na mtshanas la
[‚Äú ]spyod pa lags 3 de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ mige lnga dang/ stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jiges pa rnams dang sangs rgyas )
[4) ]kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dag la song na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'/
sems dpa'achen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngod pa gol te 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de sAm du sems nadamigs pa la spyod pa logasate/ byang
chubs mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po da na mtshan ma cha de la spyod pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po gal te 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa
de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no snyam du sems na/ de mtshanamanyid la spyod pa lags te/ de ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thebs la mi mkhas pa rarig par bgyi be lags so// shA ri'i bus sUs pa/ tshodang ldan par rab 'byor ri'i phyir 'di byang/
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya ba yon/ rab 'byor gyis sbas pe/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ltar gzugs la gnas nge kun tu shes te mos/ tshor ba dang ) 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes
@#// pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la sbyod pa yin/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par
za shes ba mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/ de ni de'i skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/
'tsha bod mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa byed pa yin no zhes kho bo sa'o// gzhan yang byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da lo spyod pa thabs la ma
mkhas pas gal te log la gnas shing kun shes kyi chos/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lci dad/ lus dang/ yid la gnas shang kun tu shes te mos/ gzugs la gnas shing kun
chu shes de mos/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya dang/ chos la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ rna ba'i rnam
par shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes ba dang/ lce'i rnam bar sa dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ yid kyi rnam pa' shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shos te chos
gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ ad kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun tu shis tu mos//
gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'in gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba lam ) sdug bsngal 'ad ma yan/ 'das 5na bkas dbyug da86 3/
gal te rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'ang ma pa ni//
bde ba'ang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi ros sum shu rtsa bdun la gnas shing kun tu[‚Ä¶ ]aT+Ta ya ga lnga dang/ mdon par shes pa//
drug dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang : gzugs chod pa'i sems par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa 'i stobs bcu la gnas shade kun tu shes te mos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas shad kun tu shes te mos/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang sangs
rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang ) sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos na/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod
da ni skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ sgo sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa dag las yongs su
dam thar zhing sdug bsngal la sogs la las yongs su mi 'grol lo nyis kho bo snya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dad 'de na nyan thos kyi sa
lam rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon sum du bya ba'i skal ba'ang mdun/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshad rgya pa lta ga la 'gyur te de ni gnas med do/
tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu byang chub bams dba' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mi mkhas pa ra rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bus
snyas pa tsho dad ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dba'achen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rdo ltar spyod na thabs la mkhas par rig par bya/ rab 'byor gyis
smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tsho gzugs la mi spyod chor ba dang/
'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la ma spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod ) tsho ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam
par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ gzugs rtag ces bya bar ma spyod/ de bzhin du gzugs ma rtas/
0 ces bya ba dang/ bdag mod ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa rtag nyes bya ba dang/
mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhe zhes bya bar ma sod/ gzugs
stong zhes bya bar mi smod/ ma stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa yod ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya
bar ma spyod/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma yod ces bya
ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ sgom pa yod ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med kyi bya ba da/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dungon zhes bya bar ma gyod//
tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dben nyes bya bar mi spyod/ ma dben zhes bya bar ma spyod na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'/
sa mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nas de ltar sbyod pa ni thabs la mkhas par rig pa 'phyo'o// de ci'i bu'i zhi na/ tshe dang ldan ba shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa
danyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs mad/ gzugs las gung na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ gzugs nyid kyang/
stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs lane ba dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i stong ba nyid gang na ba de'ang rnam par sa/
mtshapa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ad stong pa nyid med de/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid spyad
rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang/ skye mched rnams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs
kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang/ ma 'jigs pa rnam dang/ so so
yang dag par rig pa rnams dung/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams ma yin/ stong ba nyid las gud na'ang
sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mnal/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rnams

[zo]kyang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyi'i de/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa la de ltar sbyod pa ni thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o//

tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu byang chub sems dang 'a sems dwad 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de gal te chos 'ga' zhig khas len nA/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngod ba ma An no//
khas mi len na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khas len yang len la/ khas mi len kyang mi len na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no//
khas len pa'ang ma yin/ khas mi len pa'ang ma yin na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin do// shA ri 'i bus snyas ba/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dang 'a
sams dad 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas hu'o phyi'i khas na len/ rab 'byor gyis snas da/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo
nyid med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ de ci'i phyir zhe no/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri 'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems
dba' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sdod pa ni spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ ma spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ spyod kyad son/
ma spyod kyang ma spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ spyod ba'ang ma yin/ mi sdod pa'ang ma yon zhes bya bar khas mi len te// rteci'i phyir zhes na/ 'di ltar dug chos thams cad dngos po

med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud cid sa blangs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nyo ba yin no// rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen nyid de'ang chos thams cad dngos po med ba'i ngo bo nyid du mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med cig gnyis su dbyar chad de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rnamasakyi nga de 'dzin
chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ste/ rgya che ba/ phul du bya ba/ tshad mad pa/ nges pa/ rma 'phrog sa pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa ste/ ting nge
'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzo gas par 'tshang rgya'o// shA ri'i bus/sa pa/ tshe dang
ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di kho nas gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'a byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am//
'on te ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag dgis kyang 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis gnas bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs byang chub mngon pa ra rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// shA ri'i bus sa de// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting de 'dzin gzhan
dag gis gnasaM pas byang chub sogs dang 'a sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs nga na 'tshang rgya ba de dag gang yin/ nyab 'byor/
rgyas sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting de 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yo de zlatung nge 'dzin des gnas pa'i byang
chub soms dpa' sems dba' chen po no myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
dang sang ga rnam pa ra rtsa ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad las

shon tu 'phags pa zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang dmy-igatsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos kyi dbyings su nges
ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdorje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad la 'jug

pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po ltar shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ dpung bkod pa zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin dang/ rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ brtson 'grus gyi stobs shes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin dang/ tshig bla dgas la 'jug
pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ brjod pa chod pa zhes bya ba'o
ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i teng nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhig
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ dbang po'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting
(nge 'dzin dang/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ snel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rin po che spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin dang/ rnam par snang ba/
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rtsol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'dzin dang/ gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sams med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

drang dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ kun tu sman pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin da/ dag ba dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin dang/ zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ ma 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ zad pa dang bra la
ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mi gso ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin drang 3 zla/

ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang//
bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang 3 tsha shes rtog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i tid de 'dzin dang/ sams pa gnas ba zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos dam pa'i
phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thamasacad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dad/ dga' ba stong ba zhes bya ba'i ting de'adzin dang/ chos kyis 'dags nyid rdzogs pa/

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dad/ rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cud kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i tong de 'dzin dang/ ya gi mnyam bar 'god pa zhes bya ba'i tad de
'dzin dang pa gi dad bral ba zhes bya ba'i tad de 'dzin dang/ dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'gyur ba bod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin dang/ ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ gnas mad par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ spyod pa dang ldan
pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ yul las brgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa
) zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dad/ dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dgu ba zhes bya ba'i dong nge 'dzin dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa
zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin dang/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i nga de 'dzid dang/ chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dad/ rnam nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ( gnas su bya ba smad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i teng nge 'dzin dung/ rnam pa gnyig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dud/ rnam pa dor ga
med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rtogs pas srid pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin dang/ brda dang sgra thams cud la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
dang sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ ma sgron zhes bya ba'i ting 'a 'dzin dang/ mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dad/ bzod
pa rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam ba thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan ng zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga'
[z/ ]bya@#// ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang/ zad mareshes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i tingeng 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi blo gros bsubya ba'i ting nge 'dzan dang/ yang
za ga pa dang 'khog pa thams cud yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan dang/ 'gal ba drang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhu ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mthun pa drang 'gul

tsha bamed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'od drame mad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinadang/ zla ba nya ba'i 'od dri mamed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin dang glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'jig rten thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ ting nge 'ashi
ma nyam pa 'di ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sgra med pa dang sgra dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par
'du ba zhes bya ba'i nge nge 'dzin dang/ ten mongs pa med par lung dag 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ gnas la brten pa med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin dang/ de bzhin nyid la gnas shange sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ ngag gi[E]
[j]skyon rnam par 'jigs pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing/ med [‚Äú ]ku 'depe e dzi'i dag
yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mo/

dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po 'a teng nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa8u0f7a na pa na myur du bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya sta/ gang la babs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du thun med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang/ gzungs kyi sgo tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus
tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sa la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas
pa de ni/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i yongs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan cing/
da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung ga bye ma snyad ngagan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang
dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dug gsekyang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung
ston par rig par bya sta/ ting de 'dzin de dag gas pa des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjesasumamathong ngo// bdaganasnyoms par zhugs so// bdaganasnyems par
'jug go/ bdagan sAms par 'jug par 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlomasams su 'gyur ba'ang mad de/ byang chub sems dbabasams dpa' chen po du ba rnam
par rtog pa de dag thams cad med cing mo 'byung ngo// shAri'i bus sas pa// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dang bsamasadapa'achen po la/
tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan du yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis sasam/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu den med de// de ci'i
phyir zhen/ tshe dang ldan pa shAra'i bu shes rab kyil rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyi gzhan zhing/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhesakhyab med kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin la/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i dus skyes pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi
phyir ting nge 'dzami kyang gzhan su yon la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dba' yang gzhanam yan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin te/ ting nge
nga 'dzani nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yani/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/ ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis sbas pa// tshe dang ldan papashA ri'i
bu den ma yin no/ shAri'i bus smras l/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu des ci ting nge 'dzan de dag kun tu shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smyos pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kun tu
shes pa med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar kun tu shes bamad/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan par hA 'di ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed pa ltar ro/
shA ri'i lus sbyas pa/ ji ltar rnam par rtog par ma byed/ rab 'byor gyis sbas pa// chos thams cad mad pa'i phyir de ltar ting de 'dzin de dag la rnam par rtog par mi byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa

gshAri'i bu rnam grangs des na rigs kyi bu des tang 'dzan de dag rnam par ma shes shing kun tu mngeshesaso// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyiren des rnam par mingeshes shang
kun tu mareshes/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin de dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de med pa de nyid kyi phyir rnam par
mi shes shang kun tu mi shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyis/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor ji ltar ngas nyan thos nyon mongs pamed/
[& ]par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa khyod kyis bshad pand yin te/ tshig de dag legs par sa pan legasas lags so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa'
chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o// bsam gtan gyikharol phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bo dag la bslab par bya'o// sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la'ang de ltar bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo de ltar slob pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shAra'i bu byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pani shes rab kyi pharel tu phyin pa la slob pa yin te/ de'ang ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob lo// de bzhinye du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
dang brtson 'grus kyi la rel tu phyin pa dang/ brjod pa 'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob sa/ de'ang mi dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi tshes sum cu rtsa bdun po dag la slobs/ de'ang mi dmigs pa 'i tshul gyis slob bo// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
pa rnams kyi bar la slobaste/ de'angami dmags pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
dkA ra'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ponashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yanen// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'des ci zhogam demagos pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shAri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdagami dmigs so// shes pa po dang mthong ba pa'i bar dag mi
dmags so/ shan tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
bya'i sdug bsngal mi dmigasaso// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba drang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam mi dmags so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams dang/
gzugs kyi khams dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams ma dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dgam dmigs so// shin tu rnam
bar dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ma demags so/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
lan cig phyir 'ong ba drang/ phyir ma 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang sangs rgyas mi dmigasaso// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang/ byang chub
dang sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi dmigs so// shAri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra'i bu chos
thams cad skye ba mar pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam par byang bamed pa dang/ 'byung ba med pa dang/ dmigs su med pa dang/ mngon bar
'du bya ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dres de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dag la slob pa lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sepas dpa' sems dpa' chen pon chos gang la'ang ma slob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ Ara'i bu chos 'di dag
na ji ltar byas pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen pa de lta bu r yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das chos 'di dag ji lta bu r mchis pa lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shAri'i bu ji ltaramed pa de ltar yod la/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas des phyiramarig pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bus gso la pa/ bcom ldan 'das
ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa lam rig pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' la ba/ 1ri'i bunang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar bya phyir
gzugs yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po yod pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yod
pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir khams dang/ skyemached dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams
yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos re med ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gum cu rtsa bdun yod pa ma yin/ nang stong
za pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i do bo nyid stong ba nyid kyi bar gyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'aco brgyad kyi b.radag yod pa ma yinan/ de la byis pa gang dgamarig pa dang/
'a srad pa gangadag gis mngon par zhen pa de dag gis yod pam yin pa la brtags te// yod pa ma yin pa lamangon par zhon nas/ 'di lta sta/ rtag pa dang tshadapa'i mjul gnyis
la chags bsan// de dgan mi shes mumathong ba sta/ de dag gis chos gang dag yod pa ma yin pa'i chos dedag yongs su brtags bas/ ming dang gzugs lamangon bar zhin cing dran
pa na bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon bar zhen nga nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dresapa bco brgyud kyi bar dag la'ang mngon par zhen to// de dag de ltar mngon nga razhen pas na yod pa ma
yin pa'i chos rnams la rtog par byed pa'i phyir deduganami shes mi mthong ba yin no/ daci zhigami shes mi mthong zhen/ gzugs mi shes mi shong ngo// tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/
'du byed rnams dang/ rnam pangashes bami shes mi mthong ngo// khams dang/ mchod dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang/ byang chub kyi phyogasakyichosa rnams
mi shes mi mthong ngo// sangs rgyas kyi chosam 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag mi shes mi mthong bas/ de'i phyir byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no/ de dag ni nges par 'byung/
bam yin te/ gang nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhen/ 'dod pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs kyi khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs
mang pa'i khamasanas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// tan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nges par 'byung nga ma yin no// de dag ni ma dad pa yin te/ ci zhig la ma dad ce na/
gzugasani gzugs kyis stong zhes bya par ma dad pa nas/ byang chub ni byang chub kyis stong zhes bya ba'i bar dag la ma dad pa yin no// de dag ni mi gnas pa yin te/ cizhig la mi
gnas she na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
bsam gtan gyi ba rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la mi gnas so// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la mi gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la mi gnas pa
yin te/ de'i phyir byis pa rnams shes bya'o// de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te/ ci zhig la mngon par zhen pa yin zhen/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no// tshor ba/
dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin no// mig la mngon bar zhen pa yin no// rnam dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/
ze lus dang/ yid lamangon par zhan pa yin no// gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no// sgra dang/ dri dang ro dang/ reg bya dang/ chosa rnams lamangon par zhen pa yin//
phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams la mngon par zhan pa yin no// 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// lta par gyur
b rnams lamangon par zhen pa yin no// byang chub kyi las dag la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir de dag ni khyis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa//
bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a slob pa ma lags shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba
zla lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// shAri'i bus gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
) la slob pa ma lagagashing/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma 'a gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis laka' stsal pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems/
dpa'achen po thabs la mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags nas na ngon par zhen par byed/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pa
rol tu phyin pa dang/ 'bod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ chul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags nas mngon par zhen par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
thams cad dang/ thams cad shes pa nyid dang/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi par dag la brtogasanas mngon par zhen par byed de shA
ri'i ngu rnam grangs desan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slong pa ma yin zhing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin
no Ari'i dus gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slong pa'i byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa'achen po shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma lags mod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shAri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po ni shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba yin no// kaA'i bus gsol da// bcom ldan
tha 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po ji ltaran shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags shing/ ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadu nges bar 'byung ba/
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shAri'i bu byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin
pa mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthongan/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs ba'i tshul gyis
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dunges par 'byung ngo// dbazhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ byang chub kyi bar dag mi dmigs/ yang
dag par rjes su mimathong thams cad shes pa nying dang/ lam gyi rnam shes pa nyid dang/ rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi
mgrong na/ shA mi'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar sor pa ni shes rab kyi las grol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin te/ mi dmi kas pa'i
tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rjes nga ra 'byung// shAri'i bus gsol pa// bcom ldan 'angs ci zhig mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi nges par 'byung ba' gas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul rgyus nges par 'byung ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe
dang ldan po rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri sta/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams
cangamakhyen nga nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par
bgyid bzhin du ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi parol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi ba rol tu phyin pa dang/
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la nga glabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyan ba nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ngam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zheng thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom/
ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la bslabs
laza nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges nga ro 'byung bar 'gyur ram// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nganyid thob da ra 'gyur ma zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad
bstan par nga rgya de ba com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de khyod nyidal dris// khyod kyis ji ltar brjod pa de ltar lan thob cig/ rab 'byor 'di ji gam du sam/
sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyamamam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan zhig yin/
snyom las/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'dras de ni ma logs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'khyor 'di jisnyamadu sums/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ mig kyang
gzhan zhig yin snyamanam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la ) rnang dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyang gzhan zhig yin sAmamam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin
sAmamam/ sgyuma'ang gzhan la 3 sgradang 3 dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya dang/ chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin sAmamam/ stsama'ing gzhan la/ migagi rnam par shes pa'ang
gzhan zhig yin snyamamatsha/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam nga ma shes padang/ yid
kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam sgyu ma'ang gzhan la// mig gi 'dus te reg pa 'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam 3 sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ rna ba 'dus te reg pa dang/
sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan zhig yinasnyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma dang gzhan la ) mi kri 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba/
kham sdug bsngal pa las/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin/ bde ba'ang yin pa'ang gzhan zhig yin sAmamam/ stsa ma'ang gzhan la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor bdang da

sna'i 'dus te reg nga 'i rkyen gyis tshor bdang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg nga 'i skyon gyis tshong ba dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba/
kham sdug bsngal ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'angag yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka'astsalang/ rab 'byor 'diji snyam du srams/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bo dag kyang gzhan zhig yin

gzhanal/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyamamam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ mtshan mchod pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgyuma'ang gzhan la/ smonapa mid pa'ang
gzhanazhig yin snyama'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor 'di rdzisAm du sams/
sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gzhan zhig yinasAmamam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyud kyi bar dag kyang gazhan zhig
yin sAmamam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di jisnyam du sems/ sgyu
ma'ang gzhan la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yinasnyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de nim lags so// bcom
ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhanam lags/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sbyam lags la/ snum nying kyang gzugs lags so/// bcom ldan
'das sgyu ma'ong gzhanam lags/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byad rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'ang gzhanam lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
sbyam lagaMsal/ sgyum nyid kyang rnamapar shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'dras sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma/lags 3 mig kyang gzhan ma 2 gas te/ bcom ldan 'das mig zhed kyang sgyu ma
logasal ) sgyu marjid kyang mig lags so// bcom ldan 'das smrama'ang gzhan ma lags rna ba dang/ sna dang lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyang gzhan ma lags te
bcom ldan 'das yodi nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyum nyid kyang yid lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags 3 gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags Sha/ bcom ldan
'dus gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma 'gos la/ snum nyid kyang gzugs lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyum 'ang gzhanam lags/ dang/ dri dang/ rodang/ regabya dang/ chosa rnams
kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyang sgyum lags la/ snum nyid kyang chos rnamasa' gas so// bcom ldan 'das smrama'angagazhan ma lags/ mig gi rnam par
shes pa 'ang gzhanam lags te/ bcom ldan 'dasamig ginam par shes pa nyid kyang skya ma lags la/ sgyum nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa lags so//
za bcom ldan 'das skya ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ rnaba'i rnam pa shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ yid
kyi rnam par shes nga 'dra gzhanam lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sbyam lags la/ sgyumanyid kyang yid kyirnam par shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das
sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ mig gi 'dusate reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan M 'dasamag gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyum lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus
terig pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ sna 'dus derag pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus
regapa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te'i ga pa'ang go'an ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang skyam lags la/ snum nyid kyang dkyi 'dus te rag pa la gas so//
bcom ldan rgyama'ang gzhanam lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'arkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am// sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'ong ma lags/ bde ba'ang ma lags
pa'ang gzhan ma la gas te// bcom ldan 'dus megashegs 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma lags/ bde ba'ang ma lag
pa nyid kyang skya ra lags la// snum nyi dkyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sngagabasngal ba'ang ma lags/ bde ba'ang ma
lags pa lagos so/ le ge tso bang ) las ke'angasaMte rag nga 'i sman gyis tshor ba dang/ yid kyi dus te lag pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba bde ba 'an da sa ga nga 'a ba 'am/ sdug brgyal
bcom ldan 'angs skyama'ang gzhanama'ags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba drang/ sna'i 'dus te reg ra'i rkyen gyis tshong pa dang/ lce'i'adus
pa'ang ma lags/ bde ba'ang ma lags pa'ang gzhanam lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ stsa go bsngal ba'am/ sngag ngesngal ba'ang
ma 'a gas/ bdaba'ang ma 'a gas pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am snyal bsal ba'ang mi
lags/ bde ba'ang ma lags pa lags so// bcom ldan 'angs sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma lags da byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang gzhanam legs te/ bcom/
#// ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ stsamanyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum curtsa bdun lags so// bcom
ldan 'dis sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags 'a/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nying lags so//
bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma lakas/ mtshanamam mchis pa'ang gzhanam lags te/ bcom ldan 'dasamatshonam mamachis pa nyid kyang skya ma lags la/ skya ma nyid kyang
mtshan ma mamachis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa'ang gzhan ma 'gas te/ bcom ljon 'das smon pa ma mchis pa nyid kyang/
sgyu ma lags la// sgyum nyid kyang ston pa ma gachis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das skya ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i stobs bcu'ang gzhan ma lags te/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nyid kyang skyam lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobasa rnams lags so// bcom ldan 'angs sgyu ma'ang gzhan
ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba bco brgyad kyi bar dgo kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag kyang sbyam lags la/ sgyum ]
nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam sa kyi bar dag lags so/ bcom ldan 'das smra ba 'ang gnyan ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad na khyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan
'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma 'gas la/ sgyum nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab
'byor 'di rje snyam du sams ) sgyum la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yod sum mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni ma ma ches lags so//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po ) rong 'byor 'di ji sAm du sams/ rgya ma la skya ba 'ag/ 'gag pa yong sAmamam rang 'byor gyis gsol ja// bcom ldan 'das
de mamachis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems ) gang la skya bamar pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs
pa med pa dang/ rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur snyam mam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur snyam mam rang 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa
dalas/ mtshanama'i le'u ste dgu pa'o/// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa bam po brgyad pa/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rang 'byor 'di dzi sAm du sams/ 'bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'drilta ste/ byang nubasams dang la bya bar ming dang brdas tha snyad du
gdags su yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol kha bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di jisAm du sams/ mang
dang brdas tha snyad du gdags pa tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag gi skye ba 'am/ 'gag ba ma/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnamapar byang ba dag tshags su yod dam/
zlarab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di jisnyam du sems/ gang la ming dngamtshanam
mang pa dang/ brdamad pa dang/ gdags pamed pa dang/ tha snyad mad pa dang/ ming med pa dang/ ming du gdags med pa dang/ lus med pa dang/ lus kyi las med pa dang/
ngagachod pa dang/ ngag gi lasamad pa dang/ yid med pa dang/ yid kyi las med pa dang/ skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam
pa ra byang ba med pa dngashes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
ba la 'gyur sAmagag/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni 'gyur 'a gas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor byang chub sems
dpa' soms dang 'chen posami dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslangs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ rnam
ba thams cangamakhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nga la de ltar
slob cing/ bla na mad pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'tshal bsani/ sgyu ma'i skyes bus bsrubs pa ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang nu ba la
bslang par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po gangadug logs pa de nyid sgyu ma'i skyas bur rig bar bgyi ba lags pa'islang du'o// bcom ldan
'angs kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di dzisAm du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges
bya/ bur 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/ rnam pa sbrams cad mkhyenapa nyidra 'thob par 'gyur snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi
'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po dag ni dngosapo ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin
de'ang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'byung
lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'dus 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang nga zhin lags la// dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de'ang dmigs su
ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'de rje snyam du sems// brag cha lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag dang/ mig yor lta bu dang/
chu zla lta bu dang/ sgyu ma lta bu dang/ smig rgyu lta bu dang/ sprul pa lta bu dang/ gzugs b.ran lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing/
[z/ ]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar brag cha ni dngos po ma mchis nga 'i rang bzhin/ mig yor yang dngos bo ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ chu zla'ang dngos bo ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/
skyama'ang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ smig rgyu'ang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sngal pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ gzugs b.ran yang
dngos bo ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la// dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de'ang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
gzugs ni spyamalta bu / tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byang rnams dang/ rnam par shes pan sgyu ma lta bu lags te/ rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de ni dbang po drug lags
shing de dag ni phung po lnga po dag lags la// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyis dmigs su ma mchis shing/ dngos po mang ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis dmigs su ma mchis
pa'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thag pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na skag ste dngang zhing dpang bar mi 'gyur lags grang/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa//
rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa'ang yin la/ thangs la'ang mim las par rigs/ dag nga'i
bshes gnyen gyi lag tu'ang ma song na skyag cing dngang la dngang bar yang 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas bstan pa 'di thos nas/ masag mi dngang zhingadangang bar ma 'gyur ba'i grangs la mkhas pa gang lags/ bcom
ldan 'adas kyis raka' stsal pa// rang 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam ra thams cad na khyen pa nyid dang/
ldan pa pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la mi rtag pa'i rnam par sosor rtog sta/ de'ang mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa la yid la bya ba dag gis
tshor nga dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la mi rtag pa 'i rnam ra ra so sor rtogaste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// rab 'abyor 'di ni byang chub sems
07 dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod panaM/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi de la bya ba dag gis gzugs la sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang/ bdag med pa'i rnam
pa dang/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang/
dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog sa/ de'ang mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang ) 'du byed rnams
dang/ rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang/ bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang/ shi ba'irnam ba dang 3 stong pa'i rnam pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang/ smon pa med
pa'i rnam pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang/ dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor don byang chub sems dpa'asams dpal
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ ra ba 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyir pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 'di la bya ba dag gis gzugs la mi rtag ces bya bar sosor rtog ste/
spyi de'ang mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag kasi tshor ba dang ) 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa lami rtag ces
bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la da pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/
rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/ 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la sdug bsngal shes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang ) 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la sdug
bsngal zhes bya bar so so'i rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang/
ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang ) rnam par shes pa la
