ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la zhi zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste ) de'angami dmagisaso/ tshor bo dang/ 'du shes dang ) 'du byed rnams dang )rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes
bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmags so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sad pa ni/ rnam pa/
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs la stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang//
rnam par shes pa la stangazhes bya bar so sor rtog ste de'ang mi dmigs so// gzugs la mtshanam med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang )'du sa
dang 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la mtshan ma med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// gzugs lasmon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog// de ltar
mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so/ kazugs la mngon
par 'du bya ba med ces bya khar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// tshorapa dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la
mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// gzugs la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste de'ang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/
'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la dpen zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'atshan po shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yanin// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de ltar so sor ga pan 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gas semasacan
thams cad lakazugs mi rtag ces bya bar mos bstan par bya ste/ de'ang tshomigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes rang/ 'du byed rnams / rnam par shes pa
mi ka abya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang ) bdag med ces byab dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ stong
gnan zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces khyo ba dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya bar saMbastan par bya ste/ de'ang tsho dmigs
[s/ ]pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba/ stong zhes
bya ba dang )mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya ba dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i
tshul rgyas bya'o snyam du sems so ba 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po mi
snyan mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos rang rang sangs rgyus dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la
byab dka kas gzugs mi rta ga ces bya bar yid la byed de/ de'ang mi dmikas pa'i tshul gyis byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor
ba dang/ 'du shes dang ) 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shApa ma ga ces bya bar yong la khyad de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang
ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag kasi gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rnam par shes pa'i bar du sdug bsngal zhes
bya bar yid labyed de// de'ang ri dmakas pa'i tshul gyis byed do// gzukas bdag med ces bya ba dang ) gzugs 'a zhes bya ba dang/ gzugs stong
za zhes bya ba dang/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang ) gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang/ gzugs dban zhes bya bar
'di la byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dgamed ces bya ba dang/ rnam par shes pa
zhi zhes bya ba dang/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pas bya ba dang/ rnam par shes pa mngon
par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang/ rnam par shes pa dban zhes bya bar yid la byed de ) de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rang 'byor pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dang zhang dang da bar mi 'gyur ro/ rab 'byor
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ chos gang dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang/
bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang/ stod pa'i rnam pa dang ) mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa
dang : dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog cing bzod la 'dod pa de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems
dang ba chen po mi skrag mi dungang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa/ )/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog sta/ de'ang mi dmiges pa'i tshul gyis byed do// gzugs stog bsngal
zhes bya ba dang/ gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang/ gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang/ gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang gzugs mtshanam med ces bya ba dang ) gzugs smon pa
med ces bya ba dang/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med dus bya ba dang ) gzugs dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// tshor ba dang/
'du shes dang ) 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang ) zhi zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang
mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya ba dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang ) ban zhes bya bar so sor rtog cing/ de'ang mi dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis byed de/ de'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yidi la bya ba rnams mi gtong zhing brtson pa mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang 'ang dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ rab 'byor/
kazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshi ) nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang/ de las
gnyan pa mi dag ba'i chos gang byang chub kyi bar du gcod par byed pa de dag gi skabs mi 'byed po da ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar ma 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan/
yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha lo tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di ltaro so sor rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin kyi )
gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang ) rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes/
pa stod bam yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ mgo gi stong pa nyid kyis mge stong pa ma yanikyi mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid
de stong pa nyid kyang mig go rna ba dang/ sna dang )lce dang/ lus dang yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yade stong pa ma yan gyi 2 yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yod do//
gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin kyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra dang/ dri dang ) ro dang rig bya dang/
chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis tshesa rnams stong pa ma yin kyi/ chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos rnams so// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mgo gi
rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin kyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par
zhes pa dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin kyi/ yid kyi rnam par
shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yade kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma
yan kyi/ mag gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa dang ) sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang ) lce'i
'dus te reg pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus tu ga pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin kyi/ yid kyi 'dus rta rag pa nyid kyang stong
pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa dkyis mgo gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi//
mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mgo gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/
sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ lca'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ) lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang 1 yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen
kyis tshor ba'i steng pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba de kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yod
kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar gzhig pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi ) dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
nyid kyang stong pa nyade do// stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sa// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs
rnams dang/ byang rgyab kyi yan laka rnams dang lam kyi stong pa nyid kyis lam stong pa ma yin gyi/ lam nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lam mo// stobs dang )
mi 'jigs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi blos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa'
saMms dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa lani te/ thabs de dung ldan n byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di thos nas mi
skrag mi dngad zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dgo ba'i shes kanyen gang dag gis longs su zanin :]ba kyi pha la tu/
phun pa bstan pa 'di thos na mi skag mi dngang zhing dad bar mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dag ba'i dgas ga nyan de dag gang lags ) :
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag ni gang dag de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar chos
ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am ) rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
yongs su mi spro ba dang de bzhin du tshor ba dang 2 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang )rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de' nga mi dmagis pa'i tshul gyis ston
cung de dag ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am ) rang sangs rgyus kyi sar 'ongs su mi spro ba ste ) rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dag ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang de la gzugs
sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ston/ bdag med ces bya ba dang ) zhi zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang// mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bu ba dang/ mngon par 'du bya bamed
ces bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya bar ston te )de'ang mi dmigs pa'i la gyis ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa bde dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di ma gtokas par nyan thos kyi
sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi so ba dang ) de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shis pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ston)
bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya ba dang/ mngon par 'du bya bamad cis bya ba dang ) dban zhes bya
bar ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston rung/ dag ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidi ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis ma/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
su mi spro ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dag ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dang 'a chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyenani gang dag de la migami rtag ces bya bar ston/sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang ) zhi zhes bya ba dang/ stong
zhes bya ba dang )mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang ) smon pa med ces bya ba dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba mad ces bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya bar ston te/ do'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston
tsang : dug ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am )rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba dang/ de
zabazhin du rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhizhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/
gtsi mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya ba dang ) mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang/ dban zhes bya bar ston ti de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing/ dgo ba'i rtswa
ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sto ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i dag ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dka ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la
gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang )smon pa med ces bya ba dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba
u// med ces bya ba dang/ dbon zhes bya bar ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogos par nyan thos kyi sa 'tsho/
rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sdob dang ) de bzhin du sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya dang/ chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang )sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dung ) bdag med ces bya
ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang ) mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya ba dang )mngon par 'du bya ba mad so bya ba dang ) dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de'ang
mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston rung/ dag pa'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'amo ) rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su ma sngo ba ste//
ba 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa'
chen po'i dge ba'i bsheseganyan ni gang dag de la mgi gi rnam par shes pa dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi rtagacesab bar ston)/
sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang ) mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya ba dang ) dben zhes ba bar
chos ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul kyis chos ston tsade ) dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi ma gakos par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar yod
su mi rtogs b.rung/ de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dwang/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ de bzhin du sna dang/
lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang 2 padi kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ led kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar skyon/ sdug bsngal zhes
bya ba dang/ bdag med dus bya pa dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshanam med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya ba dang/ dpon zhes bya bar ston te/ de'ang
mi dmags pa'i tshul gyis ston rung/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma ka rtogs par nyan thos kyi se 'am ) rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba ste/
rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du ragi par bya'o// ba 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen
po 'i dag ba'i bshes gnyin nigang dag de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston rung/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang/
a rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongos su mi sngo ba dang/ de bzhin du yang dag par song ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa/[.]
dang dbang po dang ) stobs dang ) byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston rung dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang//
rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyidi ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sang yongs su mi sngo ba dang/ de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa
rnams dang stobs rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston rung/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidim gtogasapar nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su mi skyo ba ste ) rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams te/ de dag gis yongs su brin pa ni bstan pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs la mi mkhas pas sag pa'i grogs po'i sag
par mchis shing dge ba'i bshes gnyan gyis yongs su spangs nas ) shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thosan skag sa dngang zhing dang bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan/
pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs ) shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sams su byed pa dang/ de bzhin du bsam katan gyi pha rol
tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 2 tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs
tesbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yade la bad )gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yade la byed )kazugs phyi
nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byang )gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa/
nang stong pa zhes bya bar yadi la bod ) rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yade la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med
pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing )nang stong pa nyid du'ang mi dmigs ) phyi stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa de de'ang mi dmigs/ dngos po med
pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de'ang mi dmigs te dmigs pa'i tshul kyis rlom semasu byed pa dang/ mgo nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed ) mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yade la
byed mig phyi nang stong pa zhes ba bar yade la bed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i/ pa tu yid la byed rung/ stong pa nyid de dag kyang yagos te ) dmigs nga 'i
tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yade nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed ) 'di phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yi da phyi nang
stong pa zhes bya bar yade la byed ) yade dngos po med pa'i ngobo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yid la byed cing 3 stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te ) dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su bud
pa dang/ de bzhin du gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang re ga bya dang/ chos rnams la'ang bya'o/ de bzhin du mag gi rnam par shes pa dang/ rna ba dang ) sna
dang lce dang/ lus dang ) 'di kyi rnam par shes pa dang )mig gi 'dus te rig pa dang rna ba dang/ sna dang ) lce dang ) las dang ) de kyi 'dus rag pa dang meg gi 'dus
te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang ) lus dang ) yid kyi 'jus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yadi la

byed: phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yadi la bad/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo di stong pa de cas bya ba'i bar du yade la byed cing/ stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/
khaM megs pa'i tshul gyis ma sems su byed pa dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te ) ma rig pa dang/ rga shi'i bar du nang stong pa zhes bya bar yadi la byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi
nang stong pa zhes bya bar yade la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing ) stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmagos pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis
kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thums cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan/
pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom zhing/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul sad dka gas kyang ma sems su
byed pa dang/ de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang ) rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan
lags dang 'phags pa'i la ya na dag brgyad pad de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang )sangs
rgyas kyi sa la 'as pa'aco brgyad kyi bar dag sgom zhing de ngas kyang dmigs te dmags pa'i tshul kyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu pAn pa la de ltar sprod bas la mi mkhas pa mi shes lta ba kyi rol yin pa bstan pa 'di thos na sa ste dang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ro
rab 'byor gyis kasol pa/ bcom ldan 'od s ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdeka pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis te/ sdig pa'i grogs
po rjes yongs su zin pas ) shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba lags ) bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor
'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni gang 'di skad du ) 'dini de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyasi
gsungs pa ma yin gyis/ 'di la bslab par mi bya'o// 'di dag ni snyan dngags mkhan gyi rang bzo yin pas 'di dkani mnyan par mi bya'o// gzung bar mi bya'o// kun chub
par mi bya'o/ bcang bar mi bya'o// bkrug par mi bya'o/ bsgom par mi bya'o tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o/ kazhan dag la'ang bstan par me bya'o//
zhes shis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed/ bsamakatan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed pa ste/ rab 'byor don byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po'i sdig pa'i grogs
por rig par bya'o/ ]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan/
gyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya) bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims
kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod ci zhig bya zhes zar zhing 'bral bar byed do// zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston cing
bdud kyi nyes pa dag mi rjod pa gang yin pa ste ) rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ rab 'byor gzhan yang
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig can sas rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cang 3 byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung
du 'ongos nus nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo'i sde dang ) dbus kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang/ lung du bstan pa'i sde dang/ de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang/ skyes pa'i rabs kyi sdedang/
gleng gzhi'i sde dang ) gas pa brjod pa'i sde dag ston par byed )rab tu ston par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed )gsal bar byed yang dag par rab tu ston par byed rung/
bdudakyi las 'di lta bu de dag skyed par 'gyur ro// zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i
grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grokas po ni bdud sdig can sas rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur
cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas ) 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod lan byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med do// khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa'ang ma yin/
khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so zhes zer ro// zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag da
lami rjod me ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ ba 'byor gzhan yang bdud
sdige can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur rung/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'osanas/ 'di skad du pags kyi bumake ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo// rna ba dang/
sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid ni bdag dang bdag gse stong ngo// gzugasani bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo// sgra dang )dri dang ) ro dang/ reg bya dang/ chos rnams
bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo// mika gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang/
lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo/ lag gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gse stong ngo ) rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang/
sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te rig pa dang ) lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ 'di kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag kase stong ngo/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang ) sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang [Ôºâ ]lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/
lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gse stong ngo// de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ) bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ) bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
sho pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo// dran pa nyabarakazhig pa rnams ni bdag dang bdag kas stong ngo// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po/
rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang bya nga chub kyi yan lag rnams dang ) lam rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi chosam 'as pa rnams kyi bar ni bdag dang bdag kas ston//
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas ci zhake byazhes zer ro// zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa ste/ rab
'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems pa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bad sdeka can rang sangs rgyas kyi cha bya du bsgyu rung//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du dkis kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byung
chub sems dpa' rnams dung/ nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste ) 'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med ) nyan thos kyang med do// de bzhin du phyogs
bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dad ) byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas kyang med// byang chub sems
yang med/ nyan thos kyang med do zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sIka pa'i grogs por rige
par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can nyan thos kyi cha byad du bskyar rung/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag zlog cing/ nyan thos dang rango sas rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag la 'doms te rjes su ston par byed do// zhes
bdud kyi las de lta bu da dkami rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/
rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdake na mkhan po dang slob dpon kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ bang chub sems dpa'i
spyod pa dang 'bral bar byed la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yidi la bya ba dag dang 'bral bar byed tsang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor bar byed ) 'phags
pa'i lam yan laka brgyad pa'i bar dka la'ang sbyor bar byed/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la'ang sbyor bar byed cing/ 'di skad du
dzagis kyi bu khyod kyis chos 'di dag sgoms la nyan thos kyi sa mngon sum du gyis shig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis ci zhig bya zhis zer ba'i bdud kyi las da lta bu
de dag gi rjodomi son pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdake pa'i grogs por ragi par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
bdung srikacan pha dang ma'i rlu bud du bskyar rung ) byang chub mes dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs na/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu gang gi don du bskal pa tshad mdagras
med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing/ lag pa gcad pa dang/ rkang pa gcad pa dang ) mgo gcad pa dpag tu med pa dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing/ blun med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i bung ba mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ kang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byer yod pa de la

ba dang jub pa rjes su dran pa dang ) 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang ) lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang/ skyo ba rjes su dran pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i dku ba'i
chos rnamasashes ba'og 2rabo 'byor gyis gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dag ba rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa// rab 'byor 'jig rtan pa'i chos mi dge ba ni srog gcod pa dang ) ma byin par len pa dang ) 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang/ brdzun du smra ba dang/ phram dang )
ngag rtsub po dang/ tshag 'khyal pa dang/ brnab sems dang/ gnod sems dang/ log par lta ba dang/ khro ba dang/ khon du 'dzin pa dang/ 'chab pa dang/ 'tshig pa dang/
za rnam par 'tsho ba dang/ phrag dog dang/ ser sna dang/ nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor de dag na 'jig rten pa'i chos ma dge ba rnams shes par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
khra bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las na lung du ma bstan pa'o// ngag gi las na lung du bstan
pa'o/ yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// 'byung ba chen po bzhin lung du ma bstan pa'o// dbang po lngan lung du ma bstan pa'o// skye mched drug na lung du ma bstan pa'o//
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhin lung du ma bstan pa'o// phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// rnam par smin pa ni lung du ma
lce/ bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor 'du degan lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o/ ) gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ phung po lnga dang/ skye mched bcu gnyis dang/ khams bco brgyad dang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams
dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par//
'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag na 'jig rten pa'i rnams par shes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa' chos rnams
gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid/
dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang/ ma shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang/ kun shes pa'i dbang po dang/
kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mi rtog mi spyod pa'i
ting nge 'dzin dang/ rig pa dang/ rnam par grol ba dang/ dran pa dang/ shes bzhin dang/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugA
can gzugs rnams la blta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs la blta ba 'dan rnam par thar pa gnyis
pa'o// sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'ad ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'dus te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams
nub par 'gyuratsang/ snatshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yad la ma byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar
pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'dus te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas skye
mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'dus te/ ci'ang med do snyam nas/ ci'ang
med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnan pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i sku mched las yang dag pa ra 'dus nas/ 'du shes mang 'dus
mdaman skye mched bsgribs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// denam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes dang tshor ba
'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di nirnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag na rnam par thar pa brgyad do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/
'dod pa dag los dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dega' ba dang bde ba can
bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang/ de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa mad
pa'i ting nge 'dzin las smyos pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang/ de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shang/ dran
pa dngashes bzhin can yin te bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa lam bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/
dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bskyabs te gnas pa dang/ de bde ba'ang sngangs/ snganas sdug bsngal yang spangs shang/ yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba'ang nub
pas: bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongasu dag pa bsam gtan bzhapa paskyabs te gnas pa dang/ de rnam pa thams
cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed
pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang/ de rnam ba thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las
yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtho' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang/ de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha'
yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das to/ 'ong med do snyam nas/ ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang/ de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched
las yang dag par 'dus nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med mni skya mchod bskyabs te gnas pa dang/ de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med mni skye mched las yang
dag par 'dus te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ de dag mthar gyis gnas pa'asnyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o// nang stong pa nyid nas/
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa ba zhi dang/ sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams te/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o// de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta
sto/ phung po lnga dang/ skye mched bcu gnyis dang/ khams bco brgyad dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa' snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la zag pa med pa' chos rnams gang zhe na/ dran pa nye bar gzhug pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong
ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang// stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ stobs
bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos
rnams shes bya'o// de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang/ gzugs kyi khams dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams dang/ de ma
yan pa'i gzhan gang dag 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang yin te/
[j]@#// de dgan 'dus byas kyi chos rnams shes bya'o/// de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang zhen/ chos gang dag la skyo ba dang// 'jig pa dang/
gzhan du 'gyur ba mi snang ba dag ste/ 'dod chags zad pa dang/ zhe sdang zad pa dang/ gti mug zud pa dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ mnor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin
ba de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings nyid dang/ chos gnas pa nyid dang/ chos skyon med pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag na 'dus ma byas kyi chos
rnams shes bya'o// de la thun mong gi chosa rnams gang zhe na/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/
mngon par shes pa lnga sto/ de dgan thun mong gi chos rnams shes bya'o// de la thun mong ma yin pa'achos rnams gang zhen/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
lto dang stobs bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rag pa bzhi dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar
dug sto/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos thams cad la rtog
dbamad pa dang dpyod pa med pa'i phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa dang yod pa ma yin par bslab par bya'o// chos thams cad gnyis su med
pa'atshul du khong du chud par bya'o// denas bcom ldan 'das la: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba tsa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor soms can gyi phung po chen po dang
sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi phul bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi tshogs chen po ni gang lags/ sams can gyi ris phal po chenan gang lags//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor soms can gyi tshogs chen po zhes bya ba na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi sa dang/ brgyad pa dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang/
lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ soms dang po bskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang/ phyir ma log pa'i/
@#/ )sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag go/ rab 'byor den soms can gyi tshogs chen po dang/ sems nyan gyi ris bal
po che zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na da na phul du byed par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta ngu'i sems bskyed
de/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang/ sams can gyi ris phal po mo'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta
bu'i sems bskyed pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'ad la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'di ltar skyod de//
'khor ba dpag tu med pa'i sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o// bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o// bdag gis sems
na thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can
thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang/ sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa mad pas/ chos thams cad skyob med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa
0 bdag gis rtogs par bya'o// bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams/
cad kyi rjes su song ba'i chos rtogs pa yongs su grub pa la bslab par bya'o// chos rnams tshul gtsag tu bskyabs pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o// bdag gis chos dpag tu med/
pa'i bar dag bsgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bsub par bya'o snyam du sams bskyod do/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed/
pa rdo rje lta bu dang/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang/ sems can gyi res phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur te/ de'ang ma
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sams 'di ltar skyod de sams can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i/
skyo gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du bdag gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de nyams su myong bar
bya'o snyam du sems skyed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du sams 'di ltar bskyod par bya ste/ bdag gis samos can de dag phung po'i lhag ma yod ba'i
mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzlas par ma gyur gyi bar du sems can gcage ga don du'ang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang
bor sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o// zhes thabs de lta bu s sems can de dag phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su
khongs su mya ngan las bzlas par ma gyur kyi bar du sems can thams cad kyi ched du bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de nyams su myong bar bya'o// phyis gdod
bdag ga don du dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyod de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du byang chub kyi tshogs bsags lo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyod par bya'o// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyod pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas
nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po' sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang/ sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba'i sems rlabs po che rtag par rgyan du bsAng par ba'o//
de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po chan gang mas dang po bskyod panas gzung ste/ 'dod chags kyi sems ma skyid/ zhe sdang gsems
ma skyod/ gti mug ga sems ma skyod/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems mi skyod/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sams mi skyod pa ste/ rab 'byor de na byang chub sems dpa'
sams dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po cha yin te/ des sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed cade/ des rlom sems su'ang ma byed do// rab 'byor gzhan
yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma skul ba'i soms su bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po' sems ma skal ban 'di yin te/ gang
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rlomasams su ma byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de na byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po'i sems ma stsal ba'o//
rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir sams bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sams
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i sems ni 'di yin te/ gang sams can thams cad skyob cing/ sems can thams cad yongs su ma gtong la/ des
rlom sems su'ang mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phen pa dang bde bar bya ba'i sems so// rab 'byor byung
[2 ]chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa na/ sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de'ang ma dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par rgyun du chos 'dod par bya'o// chos la dga' bar bya'o//
chos la kun tu dga' bar bya'o// chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o// de la chos gang zhen/ 'di lta sta/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste// de ni
chos shes bya'o// de la chos 'dod pa gang zhin/ gang ches 'dod cing mos pa ste/ de na chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la dga' ba gang zhesan/ gang tshes la dga'
la zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ den chos la dga' b zhes bya'o// de la chos la kun tu dga' ba gang zhin/ gang chos la yon tan dang phan yon du lta ba ste/ dan chos la kun tu
dga' ba zhes bya'o/ de la chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhen/ chos de nyid la sgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ den chos la kun tu dga' ba'arnal 'byor
0 la brtson pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang/ samasu
can gyi nas phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de'ang ma dmags pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes/
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang/
sems can gyi nas phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de'ang ma dmags pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sdod pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas/ stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rage
pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang/ sems can gyi ros phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya
sta/ de'ang ma dmags pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pas/
rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhung gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te// rdo rje lta bu'i tang nga 'dzin la
sems can gyi/ zla tshogs chen po dang/ sams can gyi ris phal bo che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de'ang ma dmags pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos de dag la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang/ sams can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir
byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgya stong pa las/ khrel yod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gcig pa'o//
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi
ba la bdag spobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra'i bu don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la khyod srobs par gyis
shag shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba spang ba'i sladadu sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang/ de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang/ srog tu lta ba dang
gang zag tu lta ba dang/ gso ba dang/ skyes bu dang/ shed las skyes dang/ shed bu dang/ byed pa po dang/ byed du 'jug pa po dang/ slong ba po dang/ kun nas slong ba po dang/
tshor ba po dang/ tshor bar byed du 'jug pa po dang/ shes pa po dang/ mthong ba por lta ba dang/ nad par lta ba dang/ rtag par lta ba dang/ yod par lta ba dang/ mad par lta ba
dang/ phung por lta ba dang/ khams su lta ba dang/ skye mched du lta ba dang/ dben par lta ba dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang/ byang
chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang/ stobs dang ma 'jigs par lta ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba dang/ sams can yongs su snyan par bya bar lta ba dang/ sangs
rgyas kyi shing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang/ byang nub tu lta ba dang/ sangs rgyas su lta ba dang/ tshes su lta ba dang/ dge 'dun du lta ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor la skor bar lta ba dang/
yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta ba spang ba'i slad du ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can rnams la chos ston te/ don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/
de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu ni'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas/
za kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ shA ra'i bus smas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
'tsha spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas gzugs la dmagis shang dmags pa'i tshul gyis lta ba spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la
dmigs shang dmags pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du dmagis shange dmagos pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tsho dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub
soms dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas lta ba de dag spang ba'i phyir ma dmags pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
! 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang slobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
zachas bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyodasbobs par gyis shag/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems/ zag pa med pa'i soms/ mnyam ba mad pa'i sems/ mi
mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i soms/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'isoms gang lags pa'i sems dela'ang chags pa ma mchis pas don des na/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shang khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa lags te/ thams cad mkhyen/
pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchasashang/ khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa'i soms de la'ang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhig bgyi ba'i gradra
sumachi'o// denas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'asoms mi

mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sams de gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'ad la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po sems dang po bskyad phyin chad chos gang la'ang skya ba 'am 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ 'grib pa dang/ 'phel ba dang/ 'ong ba dang/ 'gro ba dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam
par byang bar yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang laskyo ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ 'grib pa med pa dang/ 'phel ba med pa dang/ 'ong ba med pa/
thadang 'gro bgad pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyisoms med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sams med/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems med/ yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas kyi soms med do// tsha dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu den byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po' soms ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mongam lan

pa'i sems so// shA ra'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa gang yin pa 'asams de la'ang chags pa
mad ces smras n/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyang chags pa med pa yinanam/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam bar shes pa'ang chags pamad pa yan nam/ rab 'byor gyis
s+yAs pa/ tshadang ldan pa shAra'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ ma par shes pa'ang chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyog

kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ stobs dang/ ma 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du'ang chags pa med do// shA ra'i bus smras pa/ tsho dang ldan

00pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyisoms gang yin pa de'ang zag pa medatsang khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no zhes sbas na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byas pa so so'i skye bo rnams

kyisoms kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kya soms dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang

rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yinanam/ rab 'byor gyis sbas pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu de de bzhin no// shA ra'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor

de gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cange khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin gyis stong

pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis sbas pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhinano// shA ra'i bus snyas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi

chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ stobs bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhan gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir

zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yinanam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ byas pa so so'i skyo bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid
kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyisoms dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong

pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cange khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang rang bzhi

gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogA pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sumanu rtsa bdun dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs

rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zagab med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// shA ra'i bus smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis gang
'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir sams de la'ang chags pa med ces smos na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med dam/ tshor ba med pa'ang tshor ba la chags pa med
dam/ 'du shes med pa'ang 'du shes la chags pa mad dam/ 'du byed rnams med pa'ang 'du byed rnams la chags pa med dam/ rnam par shes pamad pa 'ang rnam par shes pa la chags pa mod dam/ rab

'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shAra'i bu de de bzhin no// shA ra'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med pa'ang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la
0wa/ chags ba med dam/ sangs rgya kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis sa pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de
de bzhin no// ji skad smas pa de bzhin te/ gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med do// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes
ba la chags pa med do// khams rnams dang/ skye mched rnams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ stobs dang/ ma 'jigs pa dang/ so so
yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa mad do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems mamanyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad mi

dmage pa 'a tshul gyis rlomasams su 'gyurab med/ mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med de/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/
lta ba spang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o/// denas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das donagang gis
u@#// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bas bdag kyang spobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang bo khyod spobs par gyis shig/ gang
za bos gsol pa/ bcom lda 'das sems can de ni gi cha chen po bgos pa lags/ sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags/ sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas
pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i rgyud du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pashA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams mnyi bu gang po la

ba di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang pa ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chenal na nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te sbyin pa sbyin pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams

cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing spyin pa sbyin par byed do// ti'i sems can rnams kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can

thams cad kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo// nyi'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te bzod pa sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems

can thams cad kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod rung bzod pa sgom par byed do// nyitsho' sems can rnams kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas de brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/

sems can thams cad kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rtsom mo// nyi'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te bsam gtan sgom pa ma

yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan rnams skyed do// nyi tsho'i sems can rnams kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te shes
rab sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du shes rab kyi b.rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rapa sgom par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni
phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasasu yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cage ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhe 'am/ sems can 'di/
snyed cig ni byang chub 'al dgod par bya'o// sems can bde snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par mi bya'o zhis/ sems can yongs su dpag pA go chami gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi ched du go mkhyen no// de 'di snyam du sems te// bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang/
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bgrod pa na pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o

'a: snyam mo// tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyin pa'i pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yi de la bya ba dag
gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams rud mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid l bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thunamong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sde ba de ni/ modang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// dang

ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing/ nyan thos

dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi spro ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa sbyin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshodang
ldan pa 'di'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa gang/

yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa go cha'o/ ) tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ brtson 'grus ma gtang ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa 3

sems dpa' chen po sbyin te pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpan+tarje na pa

sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyus dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed pa

gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpartsa chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pasbyin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing/ de gcig pa la dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing sbyin pa po'ang mi dmigs ! sbyin
[@ } ]/ pa'ang mi dmigs// len pa po'ang mi dmigs pa de ni/ byang chub sems dub sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa sbyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
pa'i go cha'o// tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dgul

mchon mar mi 'dzin cing mi dmigs pa ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa go chachen po bgos par rig par bya ba yin no/
tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang nasems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dam
gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing/ de'ang sems ru thams cud dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su snga ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpan sems dpa' chenapo

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba nyan thos
dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la'ang 'dod pa med na so so'i skye bo sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa3sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cud mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
yid la bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khris kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pan+ti yid 'bya
ba dag gis brtson 'grus ma nyams mi gong ba gang yin pa re ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
ba'o dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
dag gis gnas pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byad cing/ sems bskyed pa de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su snga ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par sbyod pa'i bsam
@# ](gtanakyi pha rolatu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stod pa rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa de dang ldan pa yodi 'bya ba dag gas/ chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ rang gzhan gyis stong pa de kya pa'i tshul khrims des rlom sems su'ang mo byed la dmags

bden/tshe dang ldan pa shA gu byang chug soms dang 2sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu byang chub sems dpa'/
soms dba' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu ni sa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyi'i go chen po bgos pa zhes ba'o/

tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa3sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'apha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yide la bya ba dag gas sbyin pa sbyin zhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thunamong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
chub tu yongs su sdob de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bod pa'i pha rol tu ni pa la sprod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus rgya phe rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhinano// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'ibu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod gnyan thos dngarang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'ang da lo bya ba dgags ma yin gyi/ shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang/
ldan pa'i mod labya ba dgags ) sangs rgyas kyi chos thams ud yang dag par sgrub pa dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sbyor te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems
can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas ) bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu
phyin pa la sprod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson gus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
gnas te/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan nga'i yid la byas dgags ma yan gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang lung ba dag gis snyan pa sbyin zhing/ dgaba'i rtsa
de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas taM bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya ru tu yongs su sde de ni/byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa'an pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'i snyan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sdod pa'i tshul khAms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'apha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi yarel/

tu phyin pa'ang de bzhinano//tshe dang ldan pa shAra'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang bsams dang 'o chen po brtson 'grus gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i/
de la bya ba dgag me yinagyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pad da ldan pa'i/de la bya bdagagis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing/ gaba'i rtsa ba de'angasams can thams cad dang thun
mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'aphyang chub tu yongs su sngo bde ni/nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chon po btsogags kyi ye rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi ba
rol tu phyin pa'o/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi pha rolaM tu phyin pa la gnas te/nyan thos dang rang sangs
rgyas dang ldan pa'o yodi la bya ba dag gis ma yan gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid dang ldan pa' yodi la bya dgags snyanapa sbyin zhing/ dgabakaM rtswa sa de'ang sems can thams cad dang
thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/byangunub sems dpasems dngagachen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod pa'i sbyin pa'i

rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan@# pha rol tu phyin pa la stod pa'-itshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinadzad dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bshacheno// tshodang
ldan pa shA ra'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rgya ye rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing/ chos thams cad la skya
mas byas pa'i'adu shes skabar 'jog sta )de'ang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'ayodi la bya ba dag gis ma yanegyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dang ldan pa'i yod paspyashadag gesi
byed tsang/ dge ba'i rtsi ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'aphyang g tu yongs su so bden ) chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
chenapo bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin la srod pa'i shes rab kyi pho rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes chab kyi pha rol tu zhaning la gnasato nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan dka yod pasu 'a dag gse ma yinagyi ) rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pad dang ldan pa' sade la bya ba dag gis//
'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin zhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du dus to 3 bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chupa tu yongs su sngo bde na
byang chub sems dang sems dang ba chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i spyo depa' pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sod pa'atshul

za khrims kyi pha rol tu pa nad dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsemagatan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no// tsha dbaldan pa shA ra'i bu gzhan yang
'tsha byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sprod pa shes rab kyi pha rel tu phyin pa sgomathang/ du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang/ chos thams cad la sgyu ma
dang rmi lam dang/ mig yor dang/ brag cha dang/ gzugs brnyan dang/ sngal da lta bu'i 'du shes bar gnas pa yin te/ de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa' yod labya ba deg
rdzo gas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba dgags gnas shing/ dge bat+ta ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang stun mong byas te) bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'aphyang nub tu yongs su snga ba de na/ byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa'achen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de lta byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do
tshodang ldan pa shAri bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nabasam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug la/bsam gtan rnams kyi re chung bar ma byed pa'i
de dag gis kyang ma rtogs 'di dag ga debang gas kyang mtshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la'ang snyoms pa ra 'jugal/ ro myang bar yang byed cing/ de dgags
kyang ma phrogasal/ de dag gi dbang ga kyang masla sta/rtsi dang ldan pa shA 'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
thunang ra rog par bya'o// tshadang ldan pa shA tsarebu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa'achen po ni bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
bar 'jug pa dag la dbyen bar mthong nas gnas/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ stsonapa med par mthong nas gnas kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon gsum du ma byed de/
du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis rol tu phuning la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas ba'age cha chen po yin te/ tshadang ldan pa shA ra'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tsho dang ldan pa shA ri'i bubyang chub sems dpa' mas dpa' chen po de ltar go chachen po bgos pa la ) phyogs bcu dag na
byabya// bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang 'jigarten gyi khams che ge mo zhes bya ba zhige na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po
bgos pa zhig sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed ) sangs rgyas kyi shong yang yongs su dag par byed ces ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing/ bsngags pa'ang gsung la/ ming yang
yongs su sgogasashang/ byang chub sems dpa' de'asgarjod pa'ang mdu la/ byas rjes su sgrogs pa'am da do// ) shA ra'i bus smras pa/ ) tshe dang ldan pa
gang po de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dwadza' na po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin

gang pos sbas nga// tshe dang ldan shAra'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin padrug la spyod cing/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na 'dod pa dga' sa dbenapa/
sdig pa mi dgaba'i chos rnams las dban pa/ rtogs pa dbacas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas
pa dang/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang/ gsum ba dang/ bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang/ de byams pa dang ldan nga' sims yangs pa/ 3 rgya chen por
gyur pa/ tshad med pa// ma gnyis pa/ khon mad pa 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa ]shani t+tabasgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyangs kyis klas
pa namakha'akhams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs su khyab par byas te gnas pa dang/ de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang/ dga' ba dang ldan pa dang/ btang
snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa 1 tshad med pa/ mo gnyis pa) na med pa 'gran zla med pa/ 2 gnod pa med pa/ ni tu
bsgoms pas 'ag nas kyi debyas kyis klas pa// nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab parnaphyas te gnas pa dang/ de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas
snyamached dang/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang ]so'ang mad pa'i skye mched dang/ 'du shes med 'du shes med mni skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas de ni 1 byang chub
soms dpa' sems dpa' chen po'obasam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang dgags med pa'asnyoms par 'jug pa rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i
chen po snyan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi nam mkha' rnam pa dang rtags dang/ mtshan ma rnams kyis bsam gtan de dag dang/ tshad med pa de dag dang )
dgazugs med pa de dag la snyams par 'jug cing ldang ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thamasar du dang thunamong du byas nas/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod da 'i rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa la'ang gong ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
bsam gtan de dag dang/ tshad med pa de dag dang/ gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa de dag gis gnas shing/ de bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs
zla med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug la/ ltang ba nanam mkha'i rnam pa dang/ rtag dang/ mtshan ma rnams yod la byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang/ gzhan dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yode la bya ba dag gis/ sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du byas nas/ bla na
med pa la nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sde bar byed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen legal chen pa yin te de ltar na byang chub
sems dad 'asems dad 'a chen pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chung sems dad ra sems dang 'tshon pa byams pa
dang ldan pa la sems yangs pa ) rgya chen por gyur pa// tshad med pa/ ma gnyis da/ khan med pa// 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi
dbyings kyis klas pa// nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs gcig khyad par byas te gnas shung/ phyogs danu'i bar du khyab par byas te gnas pa dang/ sang rje dang ldan pa dang/
dga' ba dang ldan pa'ang de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen pa btang sAms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa// rgya chen por gyur pa/ khyod
med pa/ ma gnyis pa/ khen med de// 'gran zla med pa/ ) gnod du med pa// shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis kus pa// nam mkha'i khams kyi
mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer khyab par byas nas gnas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin a bya'o/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpar chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems sare rje chen pa sngon du 'gro bas sems can thams cad kyi nyon/
tshungasapa bsal ba'i phyarab sam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyomasapar 'jug pa rnams gzhan dag la rjodatsang sten te/ rab tu 'tshal la rnam par 'byed de gsal bar
byedatsor/ de dag gi ro myang ba dang/ nyes dmags dang/ des par 'byung ba'ang tshul bzhin du ston pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag nyid kyis/ bsam gtan dang pa dang/ bsam gtan bzhi ba'i bar dag gnon cing sgom ste// bsam gtan dang pa dang/
bsan gtan bzhi pa'i bar de la'ang gnas la/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sems sum/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed ba gzhan dag gi skabs sa 'byed pa de ni/
byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
yod la bya ba dag gis gnas pa de 'ad snyam du sems te/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i ri chos bstan te skam nas yin la byed pa de dag la 'ded pa dang/ bzod
