nang stong pa nyid mang ngo// dngos po med pa'ang re 'ang stong pa khyed kyib 2 las gung na'ang ming med la/ ming la'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo'ang stong pa nyid kyi bar dug medade/ rnga'i phyir zhe/ tshe

dang ldan pa shA bi'i bu 'di ltar ma nga gang yin pa dang/ nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ ming gang yin pa dang/ dngos po med pa 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa de gas ka'ang med cing/
mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangasades na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhesabya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// tshodang ldan pa'i sde'i
bu 'a di lta ste/ dranang 'bar gzhag pa rnams shes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las kung nu'ang mong med la/ ming la'ang dran paskabar gzhag pa/
rnams med de// de ci'i phyir zhen/ podang ldan pa shA 'du 'di ltarami nga gang yin pa dang/ dran pa nyapar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka'angamed cing ma dmigs pa la phyir ro// de bzhin
du yang dag par sbyong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi tang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang 3 stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang ) 'phags pa'i lam yan lagabargyad pa/
dang stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pabazhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyasakyi ngos ma'adres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba de dgas glo bur du ming du btags paste/ sangs rgyas

kyichos rnams las kud na'ang ming med la/ming la'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA'i bu 'di lta ming gang yin pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang yin pa

de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigasapa'i phyir 'o// dang ldan pa shAsI'i bu de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ ting nge 'dzinicasabya ba dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes bya ba dang/ rnam pa thamasacang mkhyen pa nyidacesabyaba'i bar
ma/dga' glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las nyung na'ang ming med la/ ming la'ang rmas pa thams[f]mkhyen pa nyid med do// de ru'i phyir zhe na
bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang/ rnamapathams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyiba'agang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mgas pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri bu gang l+yang lapaskad du/ rdo dang
ldan pa 'ba'abyoratshe'i phye 'di skad du 'di lta ste// dper bgyin bdagabadag ces bgyi'ang nga ngag mngon par grub pa nyigs mam tshis lags so zhes zhesazer ba'i 3 rlo dang ldan pa 'i 'u/
bangag gtanamed cing ngam gsan/ ngo mngon pa ra 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yo da 1 tshe dang ldan pa shA'i bu sems canadang/ srog dang/ skye ba nga dang/ gso ba dang ) skyes ngang :
kung zag dang/ shes las skyes dang/ shedabu dang/ byed pa po dang/ tshor ba po dang/ shes pa po dang/ mthong ba ngo kangun me nga rang ma dmigasan/ nge mngon par grub pa/ gyur ba lta ga/
la yod tshe dang ldan pa shAtso'i bu gzukas gtan med rung ma dmigasan/ de mngon par 'grub nga 'a 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshor ba dang// 'du shes ngang/ 'du byeng rnams dang rnar pa
shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs// de mngon par 'grub pa'i 'gyur blta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA'i bur ga gtan med ming ma dmigs 2/ demangon pa 'grub par gyub blta ga
dal yod/ de bzhin du rna ba dang/ snadang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid gtan med cing ma dmigs na/ de dgamangon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang
ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugasakatam med cing mi dmigasan/ ngemangon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du sgra dang dri dang/ ro dang/ zekabya dang/ chosa rnams gtan med cing
mi dmagasan/ de dag mngon par grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan bshAtsA'i bumagagi rnam par shes pa gtanamedacing mi dmigasan/ dmangon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la
yod rnab dang/ snadang lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigasan 3 de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshodang ltanapa shA ri'i bu mig
gi 'dus te 'gapagatan med cing mi dmigasan// de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du na ba dang/ snadang/ lce dang/ lus drung/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gtan med
cing mi dmigasan/ de dag mngon par 'grubapar 'gyur bltag la yod/ tshodang ldan pashA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gtan med cing ma dmigs na/ da mngon par
'grub par 'gyur blta ga la yod/ rnab dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gdon med cing mi dmigasan/ de dag mngon par 'grub pa3
'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gdanameng nying mi dmigs// de mngon par 'grubapar 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshul khrims kyi tharol tu dang
dang/ bzod nga 'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam kang+ka kyi pol tuTI nga dang/ shesa'ab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gangan medatsang ma dmigs3/ de dag
mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod tshodang ldamapa shA'i ba nang stong pa nyid gtan med rung ma dmigasan/ nge mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dngos med pa 'i ngo be
nyid stongang nyid kyi bar du gtan med cingayi dmigs na/ de dag mngon pa 'grub pa lnga 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA tra'i bu dran pa nye bar kazhag pa rnams gtan med cing mi dmakas
de dag mngon pas 'grub la 'gyur blta la da ) yang dag par spong ba rnams dang rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dung/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ngang 22kas
pa'i lam yan lag brkyang pa dang/ stobs bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par gang rnalas dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyang katab med cing mingamigs te/
ngag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshodang ldan pa shA ra'i bu ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ kazungs kyi sgo rnam sagatanamed cing dmigs//de dag mngon pa 'grub par 'gyur blta ga la yod/
nyan thos gtan med cing mdamagasan deman par 'grub par 'gyubu ba lta ga la yod/ rangasangs rgyas gtan med cing la dmagasan/de mngon par 'grub par
'gyurakhalta ga la yod/byang chub sems dpa' gtan medaphying mi dmigasan/de mnabar 'grub par 'gyur blta gal yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag pa rdzogasapa 'isas
rgyus gtan medacing me dpikasan/demangonapar 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs desan bdagubadag ces bya'ang badragamangon par grub pa ni gtan med nga
yacheno// tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu gzhan yang khyed 'di skad du ci'i phyir chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags n zhesas zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shAbri'i bde de bzhin

no/de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyi'o// shA'i'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang gi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo
nyidamed/rab 'abyor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa'apa'i 'gazugs kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam pa shes pa'i 'dus

b.las byung ba'i ngo bo nying med do// tshodang ldan bshA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus pa lasabyung ba'i ngo bo nyidamadado// de bzhin du zla ba dang/ snadang/ lce dang sbrulus dang/ yid kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i

ca00 ngo bo nyid med ngo// tshod ldan pa shA ri bu de bzhin du gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya dang/ chos rnams dang/ ma ga gi rnam nga shes pa dang/ rnab dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang
yid kyi rnam pa'angashes pa dang mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang 3 mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang/ rna ba dang/

sa dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i 'dus su byu ba'i ngo bo nyid medungo// tshe dang ldan par k+Sha yi bu sbyan pa'i pha rol tu nang 'i 'dus pa las byung b+hawe
ngo bo nyid medang// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i 'brel du phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pa tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pa sel du phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi ra se'i

phyin pa 'i 'dus pa'as byung ba'i nge bo nyid med de// tshe dang ldan pa shA seng+ge ngung grangs des chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid na// tshe dang ldan pa shA sI'i bu gzhan yang sa larwa
cad ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas mayin no// shAsI'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan parngab 'byor chos thams cang ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin pa gang yin/ rang 'byo
gyis smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugagasani rtag pa ste/ gang dang pa nga bral bas ma yin no/ tsho dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang 3 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/
rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag bste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA 'i bu 'di ltar mi rtag pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po/ mkha'ashasanamatub//
med pa'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sdugabasngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshanamamed pa dang/ smon pa med pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// de
ci'i phyir zhe na/tsho dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltabasmon pa med pa gang yin de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o// tshodang ldan pa shA ra'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad ni dge ba dang/ khanam thob
'tshe med pa dang/ zag pa med pa dang/ nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang/ rnam par byang ba dang/ 'dus ma byas pa// gang dang yang bral bsam yin no// de ci'i phyir

zha natshadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'dusam byas pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ tshadang ldan pa'i bu rnam grangs desan chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste/ gang
dang yang bralakhasam yo'o// tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu gzhan yang chos thams cang nithob zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jigapa ma yin no// shAba'i bus sbas pa/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor nye'i
phyir chos thams cad ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin/ rab 'byor gyisany+tsas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bugazugs ni thob zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jigapam yin no// de
[/j]su'i phyi'i zhen/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyi'o// dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byeng rnams dang/ rnam bshos pa ni theb kazu tu gnas pa ma yin/ ngag pa//
ma yine no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyu'i 'o// de bzhin du dgab dang/ mi dge bdang/ khan ma thob dang bcasapa dang/ lan ma tho bamed pa dang/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang/
zag pa med pa dang/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa ngang/ nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang/ 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas dang/ kun nas nyon
mos pa dang/ rnam pa 'byung ba'i chos rnams dang/ 'khor ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no// de su'i phyi'izhe na/ de'i 'ang bzhin de
yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA'i bu rnamagrangs des chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yanyeno// tshe dang ldan pa shAsI'i bu gang yang khyod 'ang skad du/ ci'i phyir gang mno
par grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags ) gangamangon pa'i grub pa'i tshor ba dang/ 'du shes ngang ) 'du byed rnams dang/ gangamangon pa'i grub pa'i rnam paT chos de gang lags shes pa zhes zer/
ba'i tshadang ldan pashA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs mngon pa'i 'dus ma byas pa'o// tshor bdang ) 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam parngashes pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas/
pa'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shI 'i bu 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni mnabar 'dus ma byas/
pa'o deci'i phyir zhen ) 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir 'o// tshe dang ldan pashA'i'i bu de bzhin du rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ ying ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa//
de ci'i phyi'i zhan du 'di ltar mnopar 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro// dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya dang 3 sa rnams nAmago par 'dusam
byas bgo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta'amangon pa2 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyi'o// chosathams cad kyi bar du'ang lan pa 'dus ma byas pa de ci'i phye zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du
byedapa po mdamigs pa'i phyogo/ tshodang ldan pa shAri'i rnam grangs des gzugs dang/ chor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa rnams mngon par ma grub pa
zhes bya'o// dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir gang mngon par ma grub pa de gzugasama'ags/ gang man par ma grub pa de tsho'abadang/ 'du shesadang/ 'du byed rnams
dang mapar shes pa ma lags zhes zhesazer na/tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin to/ de de bzhin no// dang ldan pa shAtra'i bu 'di ltar gzugs ni rab zhin gyis stong ste/rang bzhin gyis stongapa
gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do// skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa gang yin de la gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnamasadang/ rnam
par shes pa nibangabazhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pade la skye ba med cing 'jig pa mang ngo// gangal skye ba med cing 'jig pamed pa de lagazhan du 'khrub bamed do// chosas

cad kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gang dag rang bzhin gyis stongs re dag la skye bamed cing 'jig pamed ngo// gang dag la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de dag la gzhamadu 'gyur bamang nge/ rnamagrangasades
gaman pa'am krung pa de gzugasam yin no// gangamangonang 'am grub pang na bdung/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa ma yiyo// tshe dang ldan pag po'ibu gang yang khyod 'di
skad du ci phyir/ rimangon par ma grub pade mngon pa'am grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin palagadams pa'abagyi zhing rjes su bstar nga ra bgyi 'gas sam zhes zhesazer ba ni 3 tshe dang ldan

shAri'i bu 'di ltaramangon par mgrub pakang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes thabakyi srol tu phyin pa gang yin pade'i mngon bar ma krub pa ste/ de lta na ngon pa'amagrub pa dang/ shes

rab kyi ba latuphyi pade gnyisas med cing gnyisasudabyer mede/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnamagrangs des kho bos 'di skad du mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par mgrub pa'ishes rab kyi pha rdzol tu phyin pa lagaya
dwaphar bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smras so// tshodang ldan pa shA ri bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyi mno ba'am grub pa las nyung na'ang/ gang yang byung
chub kyi slad du spyod pa 'khyang bsems dpasems dpa'achapo dam gsasumamachis lags so zhes sma zhes the bani/ tshe dang ldan ng shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byung bsems dpa' sems dpa' chenango
shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyodabs mnabaramagrub pa'ang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhesabya bar yang dag par rjesasumaMmathong ste/da ltaranaman par mgrub pa dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' zhes bya bden gnyisasu med cing gnyis su dbye'amangado// mngon ba'amagrub pa las gud gzugs yang ngag pa brjes su yimathong/ mngon pa'am grub palas gudagatshol ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du
byedarnamasadang/ rnam par shesapa yang dag par rjes sus mthong ste de ltar mngon bar ma krub ba dang/ gzugs de gnyis su med cing gnyisasu dbyer medado// de ltar na mngon bar ma krub bdang/ tsho'i
ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes padi ni gsasumed cing gnyisasu dbyer med do// de bzhin du mngon pa'am grub b.las khungan chos thams cad kyi bar du yang dag par rjes
su mamathong so/ de ltapanamangon pa'am grub pa dang/ chos thamasacad kyi bar de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ tshod lta' ba 'a'i bu rnamagrongs des na mngon par ma grub pa/
las dam gang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa yin no///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pabam pobatu
bdunang/ gatsho dang ldan pangaHhA ba'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du phyir phyi gal te de ltarab stan pa'i tsho/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems mi zhumami geng zhing/
yid khyad par mi 'gyural/ miskag mi dngangazhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o zhesasmazhes

zer bani/tshe dang ldan pa dri'i chu 'di ltar byang gsemasadapa'asemasadapa' chen pos chos thams cad gayo ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing/ chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang/ sgyu ma lhab

dang smig rgyu lta bu dang/ brag cha lta bu dang mika yo'o lta bu dang/ gzugs brnyan lta bu dang sprul pa lta bu r yang dgapar rjesasumathong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA'i bu rnam grosangesanabyang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bal spyod pa'i bstan pa 'di shes/ mi sag mi dngang shing dang bar mi 'gruba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshadung ldan pa rab 'byo da sa
'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshi/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rjelatu phyin palaspyod cing/ chos de dag la de ltar 'bar rtog pa
de'i tshe/ gzugs khas mi len cing ma ba dzan la gnas bar ma bgyid de/ mngon bar zhen bar cha 'gyute cang/ 'di ni gzugs so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so//
de'i tshe tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ ba du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa khas mi lan cade ma 'dzin la gnas par mi 'gyod de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cad/ 'di ni rnam
par shes pa'o zhes bdagos par ma bgyid lags so// de bzhan du da'i tsha tshage khas ma len pa'i mi dzan la gnas par zhu brgyud de/ mdon par zhen par sku 'gyed cid/ 'di ni mig gi zhabs 'dog
par mi 'gyid lags so// de bzhin du de'i tshe na ba dang/ sa dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid khas mi len cing ma 'dzan la gnas par ma bgyid de/ mdon par zhan bar ma bgyid cing
'di na yod do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// de'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cang ma 'dzani la gnas bar mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par ma bgyid cing/ 'di ni
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// de bzhin du de'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cing ma 'dzan la gnas par ma bgyid da/ mngon par zhen par ma bgyid cing/ 'di
nishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par ma bgyid lags so// de'i tshe nang stong pa nyid khas mi len cing me 'dzin la gnas pa ma brgyud de/ mngon par zhen par 7 brgyud smade/
'di ni nang stod pa nyid do zhes 'dogasapar ma bgyid lags so// de bzhin du de'i tsho dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du khas mi len cing ma 'dzin la gnas par oM brgyad de/ man
par zhen par mi bgyid cing/ 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stod pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par ma bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams khas ma len cung ma 'dzan la gnas bar mi bgyid de 1 mdon par zhen par ma bgyid cing ) 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
rnams so zhes 'dogs par ma bgyid lags so// de bzhin du byang chub sams dpa' de'i tsho yang dag par sbyong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang//
stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 2 stobs bcu dang da mi'ajigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad khas ma len cing me 'dzin la gnas par ma 'gyod de/ mngon par zhen par ma bgyid cing/ 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams /
so zhes kha dog la bar mi bgyid lags so/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan ya de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyon pa ni/
ting nge 'dzin kyi sgo thams cad dad/ gzudas kyi sgo thams cad khas mi len cid ma 'dzin la gnas par ma 'byed de/ mngon par zhen par ma 'gyed cing/ 'di dag na ting nge 'dzan dang/
gzungs kyi sgo rnams so zhes 'dogs khar mi bgyid lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyil rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gzungs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ de bzhin du phung po dang [. ]khams dang/ skye mched rnams yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
sum cu rtsa bdun yod dag par rjes su ma mthong/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ sangs rgyus kyi chos ma 'dres ba bco brgyad dang rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
bar tu yad dka bar rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni ma skyes ba lta/ gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags
pa'i slad rtago/ de ltar na gzugs dang skye ba ma mchis pa de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skya ba
na mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o// tshor ba dang/ bdu shes dang/ 'du byon rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam
bar shes pa ma lags so// mgi ga skya ya ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni mig ma lags so// rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yod kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags ba den
yid ma lags so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so// tshul khrims skyo ba rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i kha rdol tu
sbyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi kha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags da gi shes las kyi ya rol tu
phyin pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shad gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// nang stong nyidigyi skyo ba

ma mchis pa gang lags ba de ni nang stong ba nyade a lags so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pakyi 'an gyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stod pa nyid ma lags te
de ltar na da dos po med pa'i ngo bo nyidi stod la nyid dang/ skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
kyi skya ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar kazhag ba rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag ba rnams dang/ skye ba ma mchis pa de na gnyis su
ma mtshes dang gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de bzhin du yang dag par song ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang bo dang/ stobs dang 1 byang chub kyi yan lag dang//
( lam dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ stobs bcu dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skya ba ma
mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang/ skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis
lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis ba gang lakAs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das
'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni ma skyes ba ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de na de bzhin nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na de bzhin nyid dad/ skye ba ma mchis pa de na ginyese
su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skya ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags ) mad po ma lags pa'i slad du ste//

0 de'i slad du de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags so// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/
chos gnas pa nyid dang/ chos skyon mad pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i zhub dang/ bsamagyis ma khyab pa 'i dbyings kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ma lags so//

de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpyidas dang/ skye ba ma mchis pa den gnyis su ma mchis shang gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du 'o// bcom ldan ba dus byang chub dang/ rnam kha

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis kha ga nga lags kha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang/ skya ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis
shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis kha na gcig ma lags/ ang bo ma lags pa'i slad du skye/ de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad ma
pa nyid dang/ skyo ba ma mchis pa de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// khacom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni mi rtag ba lta/ gzugs kyi 'grub pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs
cha lags so// tshor ba dang/ bdu shes dang/ bad byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i 'grel pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ de ltar na phung po rnams dang/ 'grib pa de tshigs
su ma mchis share gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grub pa gcig ma lags na nad po sna lags pa'i slad du'o//
khams dang/ skye mched rnams kyi 'grub pa gang lags pa de dag na khams dang/ skye mched rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na khams dang/ skya kachad rnams dang/ 'gra'i pa de na gnyis su ma
mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa gang lags pa de na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa dang/ 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing ga3su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pa

rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha srol tu phyin pa'i 'khri ba ba gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
'grib ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bgrab pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po a lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so// bcom ldan bdag nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags te/ da ltar

ma na nang stong pa nyid dang/ 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'a das 'di ltar 'gras pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i

srid du ste/ de'i slad du nad stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni na da stong pa nyid ma lags so// de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stod pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de na de ngos po med pa'i do
'o 'di stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos po med pa'i do bo nyid stong pa nyid dang/ 'grub pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shang gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan

'das 'a de ltar bkral ba ni gcig la lags/ mang bo ma lags ba'i slad du sku/ de'i slad du dngos bo med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid kyi 'gu'i ba gang lags de ni dngos bo med pa'i ngo bo nyidi stong ba nyi de na
lags so// bcom ldan 'das dran ba nyo bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grub pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang/ 'gyig
pa de na gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa na ga cig ma lags/ mad bo a lags pa'i slad du ste//
ti'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag ba rnams kyi 'grub pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams a lags so// yang dag par song ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang bo
rnams dad/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grub pa gang lags de ni lam ma lags te/ de ltar na las/
dad 'grub pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lagus mad pa ma lags ba'i slad da ste//
de'i slad du lam gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de nA len ma lags so// de bzhin du mdon par shes pa rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ stobs bcu dang/
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'drwa pa rnams dang/ 'grig
pa de na gzhis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du sku/ de'i slad du

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang yang gzugs shes brgya pa de nyiganyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs

su bgyis pa lags so/de bzhin du gang yang tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma gas pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so// ga de yang rnam pa thaN+Da
mtsha ]cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i khar de 'ang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i gras su bgyis pa lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong ba las/ gnyis su med pa'i le'u zhes bya
ste nyi shu pa'o/// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa tshos 'di dag la ni ji ltar bar rtog/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yani/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na gang yin/ 35 la rtog pa ni

gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis sa la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu chung khyed 'di skad du wang chub sems dpa' na gang yin zhes zer ba na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub gang yin pa nyid sems dba'i
yin bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya// byang chub des khyad chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te da chos de dag la mngon par zhen pa 'ang med do// chos gang dag de rnam pa shes she na/
gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes ste/ de la'ang 'don par zhen pa
med do// de bzhin du khams rnams dang/ skye mched rnams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la'ang mngon par
zhen pa med do// stobs rnams dad/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rnam pa shi te/
da la'ang mngon par zhen pa chod do// shAri'i bus sbas pa/ tshadang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rnam banang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam bgang dag dang/
rtags gang dag dang/ mtshan ma gang dag gis tshes rnams 'dzin pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnam ba gang dag dang/ rtags gang dag dang 1 mtshon cha gang dag gi re 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas kyatshos
rnams sam/ gzugs rnams sam/ sgra rnams sam/ dri rnams sam/ ro rnams sam/ reg bya rnams sa// chos rnams sum 2 nang dang phyi'i chos rnams su 'dzin bste/ de ni tshes

thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes khyago/ tshe dang ldan kha shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na gi nga yin zhes zer ba na u0f7a/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// gang las ring du song zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu zhung bo rnams dang/ khams rnams dang/ skye mched

rnams dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las ring du song/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang/ lta bar gyur pa thams cad las ring du song/ 'gro ba drug lasa'ang du song bas/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes

bgo/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du

song ba lta/ de'i phyir rang du song ba zhes bya'o// nad stod kha nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nye dingad ti spyod pas ri du song ba ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang/
mang dazhu khar spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ kha bags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du/
song ba ste/de phyir shes rab kyi las rol tu phyin kha bad ring du song ba zhig bya'o// stobs rnams dang/ 'jigs ba rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

btsobargyud bo dag las 'di du song ba ste/ de'i yuneshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las 'di du song ba na/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi

ba 'dired du sod pa zhes bya ko/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam gra das des na/ 'di lta lta/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan kha shA ri'i bu gang yang khyed la da sa da du 'i

khar rtog pa ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshadad ldan pa shA ri'i bu ba de la byang chub sa bas dpa ba sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi lcog ces bya bar
dam rtog go/ gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar ma rtog go/ gzugs bdag ces bya ba dad/ bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs zhi zhes

ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/
gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dad/ son pa yod ces bya ba nye bar ma rtog go/ gzugs dbenazhes bya ba dang/ ma dben zhes bya bar nyo bar ma rtog go/ de 'azhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du

byed rnams dang/ rnam bar shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar ma rtog go/ rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar ma ga go/ rnam par shes pa bdag ces

bya kha dang/ bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma shi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/

rnam par shes ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bas mi rtog go/ rnam par shes ba smon pa yod ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa

dben zhes bya ba dang/ ma dben zhes bya bar nye bar ma rtog go/ de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ 'artson 'grus

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phun pa rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar ma rtog go/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la bde zhes bya ba dang// sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhis bya ba dang stod zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes
bya ba dang/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa yod ces bya ba dang/ smon pa tshud ces bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya ba dang/ ma dben zhes bya 'ar nye bar ma rtog go/

de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang/ ma sdug ces bya bar nyi bar ma rtog go/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyidi stong pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi rtag ces bya khar nye bar

mi rtog go/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya bar bar ma rtog go/ dben zhes bya ba dang/ mi dben zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar ma rtog go/ de bzhin du dran pa nye
bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar ma rtog go/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yang dag par song ba rnams dad/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang//
stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'bags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang 2 sangs
(rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ ting nge 'dzani thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang/ ma rtag ces
bya bar nye bar ma rtog go/ bde zhes bya 'ding ) sdug bsngal zhes bya bdad/ bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang ) ma zhi zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi

stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang po ) mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa yod ces bya ba dang/ so na pa med ces bya ba dang ) dben zhes bya ba dang/ ma dben zhes bya bar nye bar ma rtog

sta tsho dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog bar byed do// shA ra'i bus smras la ) tsho dang lhan
ba rab 'byor ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das ba da ltar gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang lags ba de ni gzugs ma lags so// tshor ba dang// 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes

ba'i ma skyes ba gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa tsha lags so// de bzhin du khams dang/ skye mched rnams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin ba rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad
dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chosa rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ ma bags ba rnams dang/ so so yang dag brtag rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzan rnams dang 1 gzungasakyi sgo rnams dang/ sangs

[d/ ]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dad/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags so zhes: rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang

ldan ba sA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo/ datshadang ldan pa shA ra'i gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te skya ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs desan gzugs kyi

skya ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu tshod dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu

rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyidi gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te skya ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu rnamagrangs des narnam par shes pa'i skyo ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin

no/ tsho dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nasbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo// spyan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skya ba med do// tshe dang ldan

pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 2 btson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi phyi rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni

shag rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skya ba med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhi no// tsho dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid na na da stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo// nang stong ba nyid kyi

stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar na dngos po med pa'i de banyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong

ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stod pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan ba kA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyidi stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa

gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo/ )dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa

nyid gang yin pa de na dran pa nyer gzhag pa rnams ma yin te skya ba med do// tsho dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du ya de dag bar skyong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan
lag dang/ lam dang/ stobasabacu dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi sgo dang/ sas rgyas kyi tshig dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

narnamapa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam

tsa[z/ ]grangs desan rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sku bamed pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nyid phyir khyod 'di skad du 'di
ltar gzugs kyi 'grig pa gang lags pa de na gzugs ma lags so// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i 'grab ba gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma
lags so// de bzhin du khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang// stobs
rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams drung/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar spyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de nazim
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidi malags shes zer/ rab 'abyor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu'adaltar 'khrub pa gang yin pa dang/ gzugs gang yin pa dang/ gnyis su dbyer med pa gang
in pa dang/ 'grab pa gang yin pa dang/ tshor ba dang 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang/ gnyis sudabyer med pa gang yin pa'i ris de dag thams cad ldan pa'ang
ma yan/ tshaldan ba'ang ma yin zhing/ gzugs med po// bstan du med pa// thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// khams dang/ skye mched dad/ rten cing
pa @#// 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ ba rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ stobs bcu dang/ 'jigs pa rnams dang/ sa
sa yang dag par sdig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba bco brgyad dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyakyang de bzhin te/ de ltar na 'gri pa gang yanipa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa: nyar gang yin pa dang/ gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pamedabaste/
'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des nagazugs kyi 'greb pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshor ba dang// 'du shes dang/ 'du byed

rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de na rnam par shes pa ma yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pagang yin pa de nirnam pa thams cad mkhyen
nyid ma yin no// shA ri'i bus skyes pa// tshe dang ldan pa zab 'phyor ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/ gang yang gzugs gis bgyi ba dan gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so// de bzhin du ba/
dang 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa zhes bgyib de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so// gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i sa ba

cal 'du'ang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so zhes smra/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yade la/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba
med pa nyid kyang gzugs se// gzugs nyid kyang skye ba med pa'o// skye 'a med pa'ang gzhan ma yinal/ chor ba dang 1 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/

skyel med pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu snum gradz+dza des na gang yang gzugs shes bya ba da ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin
no[u0f10]gang yang tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no// khams dang/ skye mched rnams dang/ rten cing
'brel bar 'byung ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ stebs bsu dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa

mas dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang de ba zhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltab rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/ skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med

ba nyani kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam pa thams can mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de niganyis
su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'dasal/ tshe dang ldan rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi byang nubasams/

dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinar laspyodacing/ chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par bgyid pa de'i tsho/ shinatu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs kyi skye bumamachiso pa mthong lags go/ shinatu

ts+tso rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa zhigyi bam mchis pa mthong lags so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slodadu/ bdag gi skye ba ma mchis pa
mthongalags so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sems canadang/ srog dang/ gso ba dang/ skyes bu dang/ gang zag dang shed las skyes dang/ shed budang/ byed pa po dang/ tshor ba
po dang/ shes pa po dang/ mgong ba po 'akyi bam mchis pa mthong lags so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i skye ba mamachis pa

mar lags so// shin turnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sbyinepa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// de bzhin du shinaturnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshul khrims M kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ btson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skyo bas mchis pa mthong lags so// shin tu

wa 0/ rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ ra stong pa nyid kyi skye bamamachis pa mthong lags so// shin turnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bal gyi skye ba ma mchis pa'atho la gas so//

shani tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba mamachisapa mthong lags so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang//
dbang po dang 3 stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lan dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ soso yang dag par rig pa dang/ gzungs dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang/

sangs rgyas kyi chog ma'adres pa bco brgyad dang/ rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyiskye bamamachis pa mthong lags so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so'i skye bo'i skyo bas mchis pa mthong
lags so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du so so'i skye bo tshos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// shAn rnam par dag pa'i skad du/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa 'i choganamA

dang lanacig phyir 'ong pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'tshos mos dang/ phyirami 'ongab dang/ phyi ngo mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang

spyirang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skya ba ma
gamachis pamathong lags so// shA ri'i bus smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na gzugs ni skye ba med pa yin/ tshor ba dang/ 'dushes
zadang 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dang skya ba med pa yin/ khams rnams skyob med pa yin/ skyer chod rnams skye bamed pa yani/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med pa yin de la

rol tu phyin pa rnams skye ba med pa yin/ stong pa nyid thams cad skye ba med pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun skye ba med pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs gyi sgo rnams skye ba
med pa yin/ stobs bcu dang ) mi'ajigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad skye ba mad pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skyob
mdapa yin/ so so'i skye bo'ang skye ba med pa yin/ so so 'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang skyo bamad pa yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang )
lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang phyir mi 'ong pa dang/ phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ dgra bcom pa'i chos rnamasadang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ rang sangs rgyas
kyi chosanaMms dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyang skye bamed pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin no// tshodang ldan pa/

tsha rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyang skye ba med la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du'ang skye ba med pa yin na ni/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor nyan thos kyis kyang nyan thos kyi byang chub thob zin pa ram 'gyuraram/

de bzhin du so so'i skye bos kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par mi 'gyur ram// 'gro ba rnam pa la'ang tha dad pa med par

'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen pos byang chub rnam pa lnga'ang thob thon par 'gyur ro// chodang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad skye ba med pa yinan/ ci'i phyir rgyun du zhugs
pas ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya ) lan cig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dodachags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gtimug bsrub pa'i phyir 'am bsgom par bya// phyir mi 'ong pas ni zla

ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ dgra bcom pas ni gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga sbyang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thig

pa pa rnams kyis ni rang byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpalasems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi ched du dka' ba spyad pa spyod cing/ sngag bsngal

gang yin pa de dag nyams su myongabar byed/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par
@#// sangs rgyas/ ci'i phyi de bzhin gshegs pas nitshos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa// tshodang ldan panA ri'i bu kho bon chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa dang/

mngon par rtogs pa yodapa la mi 'dod do// kho bo ni ma skyes pa la rgyun du zhugs pa nyid yong ba mi 'dod go/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sogs dar ba mi 'dod do// lan cig phyi'i 'ong ba dang/ lan cig
phyi'i 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyi'i mi 'ong ba dang/ phyi'i mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ dgra bcomo pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang/ skye ba med pa la rang byang nub dang/
rang sangs rgyas yod par mi 'dod do// tshodang ldan ng shA ri'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyad pa spyod par mi 'dod do// byang chub sems dang 'a soms dpa' chen ngo 'ang dka' ba'i
'du shes kyis mi spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar dka' ba'i 'du shos la gnas pa sazhi mas can dpag mod/ grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par mi nus
pa'i phyir ro// tshodang ldan ra shA ri'i bu 'on kyang phar 'du shes bskyed pa dang/ mar 'du shes bskyed pa rang/ bu 'du shesabaskyod pa dang/ bdag tu 'du shes bskyed nga sa semasu
can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par nus so// tshodang ldan pa shA kri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' soms dang 'a chen pos 'di snyam du sems bskyod par bya ste//
ji ltarab dagabadag ces bya'ang de ni thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med cing ma dam gsar de bzhin du/ phyi dang nang gi chos rnams la'ang de ltar sems bskyad par bya'o//
gal te de lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed par 'gyuran/ dka' ba'i 'du shes skyed par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dang 'a sems rar 'chen po ni thams cad kyi
thams cad rnam pathams cad kyi thems tsod du chos 'ga' yang mi len cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu kho bon skye ba med pa la de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod do/ 'aglu na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang/ chos kyi'akhor lo bskor ba yod par mi 'dod do// chos ma skyes pas kyang thob par bya ba ma skyes pa 'thob nga ram 'dod do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/

tsho dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes pa 'thob bam/ 'on te chos skyes pas 'thob pa ma skus pa 'thob/ rab 'byor gyis smras r [7 ]tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni skyes

pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa ma skyes nga 'a thob par yang ma 'dod do// ma skyes pa'i chos kyis thob par bya ba skyes pa 'thob par ya nga ma 'dod do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan ng rab 'byor ci 'thob
pa'ang med la mngon pa rtogs pa'ang med dam ) rab 'byor gyis smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'thobar 'ang yod/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang yod de gnyis kyi lco'agyas ni ma yin no// tshe dang
galdan pa shAri'i bu 'a thob pa dang/ mngon par rtogs pa dag ni 'jig rten tha snyadakyis gdags pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyi 'ong ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'am//
dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas ma/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi tshe snyad kyis gdags pa yin te/ don dam par ni' thob pa'angamad/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang
mad rgyun du zhugs pa 'ang med/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'ang mad/ phyir mi 'ong ba'ang med/ dgra bcom pa'ang med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med ) sangs rgyas kyang
mdago/ sha ri'i dus smras pa// tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor 'thob pa dang/ mngon par rtogs pa ji ltar 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du gzugs med pa 3 bstan du med pa// thogs ba med pa ste// 'di ltar

mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa bzhin du skye ba med pa 'ang de lta yin nam/ rab 'byor gyasems pa/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan ng ba'i bu rnam grangs des na skye ba'ang/

mi skye la/ skya bamadang 'ang mi skyo 'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skyes so tshos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod par khyod sdobs sam/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byob chosam skyes pa rnams kyi

skye bamed pa'ang brjod par spobs sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshos ma skyes so tshos ma skyes so zhes pa bya bar brjod par khyod spobs sam zhes zer pa ni de tsho dang ldan pa shA zi'i bu

chos ma skyes so chos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod pa'i spobs pa'ang kho bo la zhe dado// chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa brjod pa'i spobs pa'ang kho bo la mad do// de ci'i phyi zhen/ tshe dang ldan pa shA Ti'i bu

'dit+tar tshos ma skyes pa gang yin pa dang/ skye bamed pa gang yin pa dang/ spobs pa gang yin pa dang/ brjod pa gang yin pa dang/ mi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin//
mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing/ gzugs canam yin pa// bstan du mdapa/ thogs pa me dpa ste 3 'di ltaramtshan nyade med par mtshan nyidi gcig pa'i khyi go/ shA ri'i bus smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa
rab 'byor brjod pa'ang skye bamad/ spobs pa'ang skye ba med/ chos kyang skyo ba med de/ gang dag las brtsams te brjod par bya ba'i chosaradag kyang skye ba med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa//

tshodang ldan pa shAri'i bu do de bzhin te/ brjod pa ni skyo bamadapa'o// spobs pa ni skya bamed pa'o// chos ni skye bamadar 'o// gang dag las brtsams te brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa'o//
de ci'i phyir zhe ne/ gzugs skye ba med pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang/ de bzhin du khams rnams dang/ skye mched
rnams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang da ting nge 'dzin thams cad
dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco

za brgyad kyang skye ba med pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang skye bamed pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de de bzhin/ brjod pa skye ba med do// spobs pa
sgyu skye ba med// chos skye bzhed do/ gang dag las btsams te brjod por spobs pa'i tshog de dag kyang skye ba med do// phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brol par 'byung ba dang/
pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang ) stong pa nyidi thams cad dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ stobs rnams dang mi 'jigs pa

rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du skye ba mad do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med do// de lta

na 'jigs rten gyi tho snyad kyis 'gro ba lnga po dag thu dad pa yan gyi/ donadam pa nam yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ tshodang ldan pa shAri'i

blta bu ji ltar thob pa dang/ mngon par rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi phrasnyad du yod pa de bzhin du/ 'gro ba lnga ro dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis tha dad kyi donadam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na tshe dang

kha ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar don dam par nilas kyi rnam par smin pa'ang med/ tshe dba'angamed/ 'gag pa'i nga med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang med/ rnam par byang ba'ang med pa'i phyi'i 'o// shu'i 'bus

smag ra/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byoraci chos ma skyes pa skye 'am/ 'on te chos skyes pa ste/ rab 'byor gyisas ra/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i du kho bo nitshosam skyes pa skye bar yang mi 'dod la// chos skyes
pa sku bar yang ma 'dod do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod chos ma skyes pa gang skye bar mi 'dod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa// tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni gzugs/
ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod do// kho bo'i tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa skye bar ma 'dod do// de bzhin du khams rnams dang//

skyemached rnams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ byang chu kyi phyogs kyi sa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ stobs rnams dwang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag

pararig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chosama'adres pa rnams dang byang chub m skyes pa 'thob par ma 'dod do// mngon par rtogs pa mi 'dod do// shA ri'i bus smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos

skyes pa gang skye bar mi 'dod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni gzugs skyesal ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid skye bar mi 'dod do// tshodang ldan poshA ri'i bu kho bo ni tshor ba dang/
'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa skyes pa ngo nyid kyis stong pa nyid skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sbyate/ kho bo ni byang chub kyi bar du/

skyes ra ngobo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// shA ri 'i bus smras pa/ mo dang ldan pa 'ba'abyog ci skyo ba med pa'i chos skye 'am/ skye ba'i chos// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye ba

med pa'ang mi skye la/ skyepa'ang mi skyo 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar skye ba gang yin pa dang/ skye ba med pa'i chos gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang ldan ng 'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'i ngam

yin te/ skya ba med pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshodang ldan ng shAri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs skyo ba med pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam pa ngashes pa skye ba med pa dang/

de bzhin du khams rnams dang/ skye mched rnams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ tig
T+ThAng 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyadadang/ de bzhin

du sbyar te/ lus kyi 'du byer rnams dang/ ngag gi 'du byed rnams dang/ yid kyi 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med ra'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnamagra=

00/ des na brjod pa skye ba med/spobs pa skye ba med/ chos skyabamed ) gang dag las brtsams te brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skyo ba med do// shA ri'i bus smas pa/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos smra ba rnams kyi

mchog tu bzhag pa'o// de ci'i phyipazhe na/ 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byoban gang ning gang yongs su dris pa de dag de nyare las nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'di ltar chos thams cad
lami gnas pa'i phyi'o// shA ro'i bus smras pa/ tsho dang ldan pa rab 'byor jiltar na chos thams cad la meganas pa yin/ ra ba 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis
stong ste/ de ni nang ma'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol nAlang miganas/ gnyis kamed par yang ma dmigs so// tshodang ldan b shAri'i bu tshor bdang/ 'du shes dang 2 'du byeda rnams dang/ rnamu par shes

pan rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de'i nang na'ang miganas/ phyi rol na'angami gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang ma desaMgs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang ma'ang

miganas/ phyi rol na'ang mnas// gnyis kamed par yang midamags so// tshodang ldan pa shAri'i bu de bzhin du rnapa dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yidi nirang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rinanang na'ang mi
gnas/ phyi rol na'ang miganas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs nirang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/
gnyis ka med par yang ma dmags so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ rig bya dang/ chos rnams na rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de na nang na'ang ma gnas//

phyi rol na'ang ma gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang ma dmagis so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong sta/ de ni nang na'ang ma nas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas//

gnyis ka med par yang ma demagasaso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ btson 'grus kya pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu

phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa narang bzhin rgyas stong ste/ de na ning na'ang ma gnas/ phyi rol na'ang ma gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang ma demags so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa

nyid ni rang bzhin rgyas stong ste 3 de na ning na'ang ma gnas/ phyi rol na'ang ma gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang ma demags so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 'di stong pa nyid kyi bar na rang

bzhin gyis stong ste/ de na ning na'ang ma gnas/ phyi rol na'ang ma gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang ma dmags so// tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu dran pa zhe bar gzhag pa rnams na rang bzhan gyis stong ste/ de na nang na'ang
ma gnas/ phyi rol na'ang ma gnas/ kanyis ka med par yang ma dmigs so// de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/
00 byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ lam na rang bzhan gyis stong sta/ de dag ni nang na'ang ma gnas/ phyi rol na'ang ma gnas ) gnyis ka med par yang ma dmags so// stobs rnams dang/ ma 'jags

pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rtag pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad na ring bzhani rgyas stong ste/ de dag na ning na'ang ma gnas/ phyi rol na'ang ma gnas/ gtas ka med par

yang na demags so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar na rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang ma gnas/ phyi rol na'ang ma gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang ma dmigs te//

tsha dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam gras des na chos thams cad na rang bzhan gyis stong pa'i phyir ma gnas ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shAra'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug
la spyod pas gzugs yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang par bya'o// khramasa rnams dang/ skye mched rnams dang/ rten cing
'brel par 'byung ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzus kyi sgo rnams dang/ stobs
bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du longs su sbyang bar bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
mtshan/ @#// bar du yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ji ltar byang chub kyi

za lam yongs su sbyong bar byed/ rab 'byor rgyas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa na 'dzag rten pa'ang yod// 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod do// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ rtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na 'jig rten pa'ang yod/ 'jig rten

pa sa 'dus pa'ang yod do/ shAri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i skyon pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa na gang yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa na gang yin/ rab 'byon gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
rgyu ba shari'ilu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bon sbyin pa po dang/ sbyin bdag tu gyuratsang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ bkren pa dang/ stug 'phongs pa dang/ 'gron pa dang/
slongs mo pa zas 'dod pa rnams la na zas skom 'dod pa rnams la na skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la na bzhon pa 3 gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/ me tog 'dod pa rnams lan me tog/ me tog 'khrung
'don pa rnams la na me tog 'phrang 3 spos 'dod pa rnams la na skyes/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams lan rgyug pa/ gnas 'dod pa rnams la na gnas/ mal cha dang stan 'dod pa rnams la na mal cha dang stan//

0/ tshig mas 'dod pa rnams la ni'atshog chas/ sman 'dod pa rnams la na sman dang/ ma'i yi khyad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag sbyin par byed cing/ bu 'dodapa rnams la ni bu sbyan par byed/ bu mo 'dod pa/
rnams la na bu mo sbyin par byed/ chung ma 'dod pa rnams la na chung ma sbyin par byed/ rgyal sridi 'dod pa rnams la na rgyal srid sbyin par byed/ mgo 'dod pa rnams la ni mgo sbyin par byed/ mog 'dod
ba rnams la na mag spyan par byed/ yan lag dang nying lag 'dod pa rnams la na yan lag dang nying lakasmin par byed/ sha rang/ khrag dang 3 rkang 'dod pa rnams la nisha dang de khrag dang/ rkang sbyin
bar byed la/ de la'ang gnas shing yongs su gtong par byed de/ rje 'di snyam du bdag na sbyin ba byed pa'o// 'di ni len pa'o// 'di na sbyin pa'o// bdag ni ser sna med pa'o// bdag ni ston
bdag go/ bdag na bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o// bdag ni sas rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o// bdag na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'o snyam du sems shing ) sbyin pa/
de'ang byin nas dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad thun mong du byas shing ) bdag ga sbyan pa'i 'bras bu 'dis sems can 'di dag tshe 'di la'ang bde bar 'gyur zhing/ len pa med par
yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur tsag ces/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do// de na chags nga gsum la chags shang sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ gsum
gang zhe na/ da lta sta/ bdag tu 'du shes pa dang/ gzhan du 'du shes pa dang/ sbyani par ng du shes pa ste chags pa gsum po de dag la chags shing sbyin ba sbyin par/

byed da/ de na 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'ad ltar 'jig rten las ma 'phagasatsang ma 'dar ste/ de'i
phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de la 'jig rten las 'dus pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta sta/ 'khor gsum yos su dag pa'o// de la 'khor
gsum longs su dag pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu 'di la byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyani ba sbyin pan/ 'dag tu mi dmags/ len par mdams/ sbyin b.ram dmigs shang
de de'i rnam par smin pa la mngon par dga' ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yos su dag pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa
shAri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ sbyin pa de sems can thams cad la snyoms par byedakyang/ sems can thams cad kyang ma ngamigs/ bdag kyang

ma demags/ sbyin pa'ang ma demags la/ sbyin pa de 'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed tsang/ byang chub kyang ma dmags pa de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu

07 'dzag rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shAra'i bu 'di ltar 'jig rten las

g.yo zhing 'phags la 'da' ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'apha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 3 brtson 'grus
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi b.rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa bam po bco brgyad pa/

tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten pa yang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod de/ de la 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa/
shA ri'i bu 'ad la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag gas ser sna'i sems tshar bcad do zhes dmigs pa la gnas nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de yang bdag dang sams can dang/
sbyin pa'i 'du shes la gnas shang/ de bdog pa thims cad yongs su gtong// dmags pa la gnas nas phyi dang nang ga dngos po 'am/ zin pa dang/ ma zin pa dang/ ci bdog pa thams
cad yongs su gtong ba dang/ de sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas shang/ lus dang/ ngag dang// sems kyi dmags pa la gnas te/ bdag tu lta ba la gnas/ sems can du lta ba dang/
dge bar lta ba la gnas shing ) tshul khrims dang/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de dag la brnyan la/ tshul khrims dag sems can thams cad dang thunamong du byas shing byang chub
dmagis nas dmags pa'i tshul gyis byang chub tu yongs su sde ba dang/ de bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod la/ bdag dang sems can dang/ bzod par lta ba la gnas shing ) sems can
thams cad kyis nyes bar byas pa bzod par byed la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
yongs su rdo ba dang/ de lus dmags shing bsod nams kyi tshogs dmags la/ ye shes kyi tshogs dmigs shang bdag dmags la/ sems can rnams dmags te/ byang chub dmigs
shing brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de brtson 'grus rtsom pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang/ de byams pa dang/ sAdi rje dang ) dka' ba dang ) btang snyoms sgom par byed cing/ bsam
gtan rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang 3 ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la'ang snyoms par 'jug la ldang bar byed tsang/ de dag ri myong par
yang byed la/ de dag gis rlom sems su'ang byed cing ) dmags pa'i lta ba can du gyur nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can dang thun mong du byas shang 1 byang chub tu yongs su rdo ba de
tsha0 na 'jig rten ba 'a 'i// de gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar dmags/ tshor ba dang/ 'du she dang ) 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam nga ra shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar dmigs pa'ang ) de bzhin/
du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du dmags nas stong pa nyid sgom ste/ de dmags pa la spyod cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sams can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ de'ang
dmagis pa 'a tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sde ba dang 2 dmags pa'i tshul rgyas stog pa thams cad so sor 'chags pa dang/ bdag dang gzhan dag
gi bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yarangab dang/ bodag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir dmages nas thabs ma yin pas sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa dang/ phung po gsum pa'i
bsod nams thabs ma yin pas sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba de na 'jig rten pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes
bya'o de la 'jig rten las 'das pa 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na ) bdag dang/ sams can dang/ sbyin par bya ba ma dmigs pa'i shes rab 'khor gsum yongs su
dag pas/ byang chub kyi phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang/ bdag dang/ sems can dang/ tshul khrims dang/ byang chub ma demags te/ 'khor gsum
yongs su dag pas/ byang chub kyi phyir tshul khrims yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang/ bdag dang/ 'bod pa dang/ byang chub ma demagis te/ 'khor gsum yongs su
dag pa sa/ byang chub bya phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang/ bdag dang/ lus drang/ sems dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsod nams dang/ ye
shes ma dmags te/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas/ byang chub kyi phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang/ bdag dang/ sems can dang/ bsams/
gtan dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma dmagis te/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas/ byang chub kyi phyir bsams gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa

ba dang sems can thams cad mi dmigs pas/ byang chub kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang yongs su spo ba rtag med pa dang/ yongs su g+ho
ba bla na med pa dang/ yongs su spo ba la mnyam pa dang mnyam bdang/ yongs su sngo ba bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang/ yongs su sngo ba mtshungs pa med pa dang/ yongs su sngo ba dpag tu med pas bla nA
mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa ste/ den 'jig rten las 'das pa'angeshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir na 'jig rten nga zhes bya/ ci'i
0 phyir na 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya zhe na/ de la 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba na/ gang dag gas 'jig rten du 'gyur ba dang/ gang dag 'jig rten grub par byed pa dang/ gang dag gis 'jig/
rten dang mnyam pa dang/ gang dag kas 'jig rtan gyi phyir sbyin pa dang/ gang dag gas 'jig rten las 'byung bar ma 'gyur ba dang/ gang dag 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ gang dag
'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o// de la 'jig rten las 'das pa gang zhe na/ gang dag gis 'jig rten sgrol ba dang/ gang dag 'jig rten sal bar byed
pa dang ! 'jig rten gang dag gis sbrel bar byed pa dang/ gang dag 'jig rten ma yin par 'gyur ba dang/ gang dag gis 'jig rten las 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ gang dag 'jig rten
las sgrol ba dang/ gang dag 'jig rten du sgrol bar byed pa ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po pha rol tu/

phyin pa drug la spyod pa// de ltar byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong bar byed do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang yanaM rab 'byoragyis

smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin no// yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrulakyi rkang pa bzhi dang/
dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ rnam par thar nga 'asgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med
pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ nang stong pa 'di dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang ) de bzhin gshegs/
pa' stobs bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhadeng/ so so yang dag par rag pa bzhi dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcobargyud dang/ byams pa chen po dang 3 sAng rje chen bo ste/ tshadang ldan

ba shAr ra bu de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o// shA ra'i bus s+sas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de pha rol tu phyin pa gang gi skyes bu'i rtsal yan/

rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skyes bu'i rtsal yanano// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
ra parnanyan thos kyi chos rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang/ dge ba'i chos thams cad skyed par byed pa/

yan pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang/ sangs rgyas
kyi tshes rnams dang ) dge ba'achos thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing yang dag par 'dzin par byed pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pang+ka' ri'i bu ston gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/

pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i

bu ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'de la bslabs nas// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na bzhugs te/
'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'di la bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// tshe dang ldan pa
shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa na ) gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nem nur med cing rmongs pa med par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po den/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su ma gtang ba'i phyir 'daltar gnas pa 'dis gnas par rig par bya ste/ de'ang me
00/ @#// gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas pashang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po yid la byed pa de dang ma bral bar rag par bya'o//
shA ri'i bus smras pa 3 tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'ad lta ste/ sAng rje chen po yid la byed pa'i yadi la byed pa de dang ma bral bar gnas pa des gnas pa de byang chub sam sa dpa' sams dpa' chen ngo
yane bar 'dod na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar na sems can thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' yan par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshadang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can thams

cad na yidi la byed pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu legs so legs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus yang dag pa'i tshig brjod pas don de nyid yongs su
gzung ba na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dmigs su phangs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir ) yadi la byed pa med par rig par bya/ sams can stong
pa 'di kyi phyir/ yadi la byed pa stong pa nyid du rag par bya/ sams can dbon pa'i phyir/ yadi la byed pa dben par rig par bya/ sams can ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa ngo bo nying med

par rig par bya zhing/ sems can mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir/ yade la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rag par bya ba'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu
gzugs med pa'i phyir/ yade la byed pa med par rage par bya/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i/ yadil byed pa stong pa 'di du rag par bya/ gzugs dben pa 'di kyi phyi'i ) gdi la byed pa
dben pa nyid du rag par bya/ gzugs ngo bo 'di med pa'i phyir/ yadi labyed pa ngo bo 'di med par rag par bya/ gzugs mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab med pa'i phyir/ yadi la byed pa mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rag par bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa med par rag par bya'o//
rnam par shes pa stong pa nyade kyi phyir/ yadi la byed pa stong pa 'di du rag par bya'o// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ yade la byed pa dben pa nyid du rag par bya'o// rnam pa shes pa ngo bo da
med pa'i phyir/ yade la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rag par bya'o// rnam par shes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir/ yadi la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba mad
par rage par bya'o// de bzhin du khams rnams dang/ skye mched rnams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ bden pa dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang//
stong pa 'di thams cad dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzus kyi sgo thams cad dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir/ yad la byed pa med par rig par bya'o//
de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nya dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo 'di med pa dang/ rnam

za pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyi'i/ yade la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs
